gameModeConfirmDesc.en:: Are you sure you want to play this activity?

desc_CR.en:: Universal currency used which is accepted by the Iyatequa and all sorts of independent traders.

desc_RP.en:: Insights and knowledge gained by delving into the secrets of the universe.

desc_HC.en:: Shards of a very rare and valuable material.

desc_LP.en:: Prestige is gained by completing daily and weekly assignments, and through leveling up. It can be used to buy special items.

desc_AC.en:: Earned by clan members through certain activities. Can be used by members to buy items in the clan market.

desc_AS.en:: Earned by the clan as a whole. Required to requisition items that can be used by the whole clan.

desc_Z0.en:: Earned during various events. Can be exchanged for event items in the market.

desc_Z1.en:: Earned during the Yaot season event. Can be exchanged for special Yaot items during the event.

desc_Z2.en:: Earned during the Tanoch season event. Can be exchanged for special Tanoch items during the event.

desc_Z3.en:: Earned during the Iyatequa season event. Can be exchanged for special Iyatequa items during the event.

desc_Z4.en:: Earned during the Amassari season event. Can be exchanged for special Amassari items during the event.

chapterdesc_chapter_001.en:: We are stranded in a new galaxy. We need to get our bearings before we continue.

chapterdesc_chapter_002.en:: We are cut off from the infrastructure of our home. We need to get our on-ship production online and bolster our fleet.

chapterdesc_chapter_003.en:: Our expedition ship was not made for long journey. We need to switch to an exploration-class flagship.

chapterdesc_chapter_004.en:: The local progenitor ruins might hold the answer to what happened at Wiracoda Gate. We should investigate.

chapterdesc_chapter_005.en:: The asteroids in the deeper parts of this galaxy hold special ores we should gather for advanced constructions.

chapterdesc_chapter_006.en:: We should reinforce our entire fleet with the new ships constructed from the materials we have found.

chapterdesc_chapter_007.en:: The emperor of the Tanoch has granted us an audience.

chapterdesc_chapter_008.en:: We should continue searching for answers and improving our fleet.

desc_qm_t0_tutMissions.en:: Our arrival in this galaxy was met with tragedy.

desc_qm_t0_introStation.en:: We were given the coordinates of a local Hiigaran settlement. We should go there.

desc_qm_t0_introMarket.en:: The market can be accessed at stations and inside the flagship, though the selection of items in the flagship market is smaller. For now, we need to pick up some local currency to barter with the locals.

desc_qm_t0_introFabricator.en:: Our fabricators are operational again. We should produce more strike craft in case we run into more hostiles.

desc_qm_t0_introEquipStrikecraft.en:: We need to ready our strike craft inside our hangars.

desc_qm_t0_introScanning.en:: We have been asked to take care of a local threat to the Lazarus Station. We need to find out where it is.

desc_qm_t0_introSignals.en:: We have found hostile signals in the system. We need to clear it out and return to Lazarus Station.

desc_qm_t0_v2_introScanning.en:: We have been asked to take care of a local threat to the Lazarus Station. We need to find out where it is.

desc_qm_t0_v2_introSignals.en:: We have found hostile signals in the system. We need to clear it out and return to Lazarus Station.

desc_qm_t0_introScanBelts.en:: We've been asked by Lazarus Station to help with resource scarcity. We'll need to find suitable mining opportunities by scanning for mineral-rich asteroids in nearby systems.

desc_qm_t0_introMining.en:: We found a suitable spot for mining. Use the resource collector to mine the mineral rich asteroids.

desc_qm_t0_support.en:: Now that we have the needed minerals, we should go back to Lazarus Station to deliver them.

desc_qm_t0_introBridge.en:: Gideon S'jet has offered his Progenitor expertise. We should appoint him as head of science on the bridge.

desc_qm_t0_introShipyard.en:: We have clearance to use the shipyards of Lazarus Station. We should build an additional assault frigate there to bolster our fleet.

desc_qm_t0_introEquipEscorts.en:: Our new assault frigate needs to be staffed and readied. We can do that at any station through Fleet Configuration.

desc_qm_t0_scientist_Baaekh_A.en:: Baaekh S’jet was one of the foremost scientists on Progenitor culture. According to Gideon she has data that can help us with our own research into the Progenitors.

desc_qm_t0_scientist_Baaekh_B.en:: We found Baaekh S'jet, but she can't come out of hiding until we have distracted the hostiles in the area.

desc_qm_t0_relic.en:: With information provided by Baaekh S’jet, we now know a potential location of a Progenitor Relic in Toasiim that must be retrieved.

desc_qm_t0_scientist_Hyeaa_A.en:: Hyeaa Somtaaw was an expert in Progenitor Materials sciences. He has established an independent lab at Nokuuna. According to Gideon, he has data that can help us with our own research into the Progenitors.

desc_qm_t0_scientist_Hyeaa_B.en:: Hyeaa Somtaaw wants to investigate our fabrication processes, find a way to improve it by incorporating Progenitor technology. In return he will share his data with us.

desc_qm_t0_facProgenitors.en:: To understand why our Communicator cannot influence Progenitor devices in this galaxy, we must gather more information from specialists in Progenitor science that may be stranded here also.

desc_qm_t0_facProgenitors_A.en:: Baaekh S’jet was one of the foremost scientists on Progenitor culture. She was last reported in the Rao Tissad system on a remote study mission.

desc_qm_t0_facProgenitors_B.en:: Hyeaa Somtaaw was an expert in Progenitor Materials sciences. He has established an independent lab at Nokuuna.

desc_qm_t0_facProgenitors_C.en:: Suzaak Soban is a fringe researcher in Progenitor sciences. Her mobile laboratory was last reported two weeks ago in the vicinity of Fer Lamaan.

desc_qm_t0_facProgenitors_D.en:: Thaanh Naabal is an expert on Progenitor AI and computer systems. He was last reported to be assembling his own team of specialists at Mitorai, for an undertaking into uncharted space.

desc_qm_t0_Jolja.en:: After examining the Progenitor Relic, Gideon wants us to find a Progenitor Terminal in Iniim. If we access this, we may have some answers about what happened at Wiracoda Gate.

desc_qm_t0_pickKiith.en:: The local Hiigaran survivors wish to know what Kiith we affiliate with. There are advantages for declaring for a specific Kiith.

desc_qm_t0_pickName.en:: The Hiigaran survivors want to know your name, commander.

desc_qm_t0_joinClan.en:: We can increase our firepower and capabilities by joining with other battle groups.

desc_qm_t1_newOres.en:: The inner systems may have different resources. We should check out the asteroids for mining spots.

desc_qm_t1_introRefining.en:: The new ores require refining to be usable for construction purposes. Luckily we have refining facilities on board.

desc_qm_t1_facHiigaran.en:: Lazarus station asked us to help some Hiigaran outposts on the frontier.

desc_qm_t1_facHiigaran_A.en:: Long-range sensors located near another hyperspace gate have registered the presence of a Hiigaran fleet that emerged here. We are asked to this location and try to help any survivors as best as we can.

desc_qm_t1_facHiigaran_B.en:: To supply the needs of the Hiigaran fleet, we've been dispatched to look for a great mining source. Intel indicates this will put us into direct conflict with the Fleet of Rams.

desc_qm_t1_facHiigaran_C.en:: One of the only planetary settlements under Hiigaran control has been scouted by the Fleet of Rams. Until the planetary defenses are strengthened, they need military equipment to supply the defense.

desc_qm_t1_facHiigaran_D.en:: Hiigaran forces are working to clear systems to set up for colonization. The system in question is of special importance. We've been asked to go there and assist in securing the area.

desc_qm_t1_strikeCraft.en:: We have found a way to incorporate the new materials into our ship design.

desc_qm_t1_RColEquip.en:: The new ores are more difficult to mine. We should build resource collectors that are equipped to deal with these denser metals.

desc_qm_t1_RColMine.en:: We should put our new resource collectors to the test and stockpile some ores.

desc_qm_t1_advCombat_01.en:: Our Hiigaran allies have prepared a combat area to test our improved strike craft.

desc_qm_t1_killEnemyShips.en:: These inner systems are crawling with enemies. We should thin their numbers. Enemies are found in asteroid clusters and signals.

desc_qm_t1_introPromoteOfficer.en:: Training our officers will increase their performance significantly. To train an officer we need to find insignias. Insignias can be gained from discharging officers and may be rewarded from completing signals.

desc_qm_t1_rankUpOfficer.en:: We should promote our most experienced officers to further improve their performance. Promoting an officer increase their special ability or may even grant them a second.

desc_qm_t1_escort.en:: We should bolster our fleet with frigates made from the new metals.

desc_qm_t1_advCombat_02.en:: We received a message that Meropis, a Iyatequa communications station, is asking for support in an expected Cangacian attack.

desc_qm_t1_doSignals.en:: The Cangacians have been repelled, but we should disrupt their activities by hunting down hostile signals in the area.

desc_qm_t1_facCangacian.en:: Cangacians are attacking colonies. We should help them in whatever way we can.

desc_qm_t1_facCangacian_A.en:: The world of Huaca is looking for help. They are opposing conscription from Supay’s Fleet of Rams, the punishment of which is brutal assault.

desc_qm_t1_facCangacian_B.en:: To oppose the Fleet of Rams, we were asked to undergo a mission to survey and map one of their three largest systems. We should also sabotage their efforts when the opportunity presents itself.

desc_qm_t1_facCangacian_C.en:: We're asked to to assist the system of Acheron. They do not have a refinery set up, so we need to go there and refine metals for their construction facilities to use.

desc_qm_t1_facCangacian_D.en:: The Fleet of Rams is assembling an assault force that is aimed at a cluster of neutral systems. Intel shows that another Cangacian band plans to engage Supay’s commanding lieutenant here. We're asked to create a distraction to weaken the Fleet of Rams in the resulting battle.

desc_qm_t1_introCraftFlagship.en:: We have an Explorer-class flagship blueprint utilizing the new minerals found in this region.

desc_qm_t1_introEquipFlagship.en:: Once the flagship construction has finished, we should move over to the new flagship, including our ships and officers. This is done via the fleet configuration.

desc_qm_t1_killCangacians.en:: While we wait for the flagship construction to finish, we might as well make this galaxy a safer place.

desc_qm_t1_advCombat_03.en:: The Iyatequa have flagged a location for suspicious hostile activity. They've asked us to investigate on their behalf.

desc_qm_t1_killProgenitors.en:: The Progenitor remnants present a danger to the people living in this galaxy. We should thin their numbers.

desc_qm_t1_craftTurret.en:: The new flagship follows modular design principles, allowing us to outfit it with turrets as we choose. First we should build a weapon turret.

desc_qm_t1_mountTurret.en:: Now that we have a turret module, we should mount it on our flagship. Turrets can be managed in the external module view of our flagship.

desc_qm_t1_fw_pledge.en::
The Sarassian Sea is a contested region of space home to three different factions. Each faction aims to control the region and offers rewards to those who help it achieve that goal.

<color=#FBB03F>Pledge to a Sarassian faction and help it become the dominant faction in a season to gain unique rewards. You can access the Sarassian Wars menu either from the HUD (top left) or at a Sarassian station.</color>

desc_qm_t1_fw_emitter.en::
We have been given a special device that emulates distress signals to lure outlaws out of their hiding spots. We should place it and wait.

<color=#FBB03F>Complete Sarassian signals in order for the system to gain influence for your pledged faction. If a faction's influence reaches 50%, it gains control over the system.</color>

desc_qm_t1_fw_mission.en::
The signal emitter has attracted a fleet of outlaws, thinking we are easy prey. If we repel the outlaws, the system's inhabitants will be more inclined to align themselves with our contractor.

<color=#FBB03F>Complete Sarassian signals in order for the system to gain influence for your pledged faction. If a faction's influence reaches 50%, it gains control of the system.</color>

desc_qm_t1_fw_influence.en::
Our contractor is pleased with our performance and has acknowledged our contribution. They have promised to reward us later based on how well we did.

<color=#FBB03F>Completing Sarassian missions also grants you contribution points. You receive Sarassian Coins at the end of a cycle dependent on your contribution. Sarassian Coins can be exchanged in the market for resources and items.</color>

desc_qm_t1_fw_cycle.en::
Our contractor has promised us a bonus should we help it become the dominant force in the Sarassian Sea.

<color=#FBB03F>A cycle lasts for seven days. If your pledged faction is dominant at the end of a cycle, you will receive that cycle's dominance rewards.</color>

desc_qm_t1_fw_season.en::
We managed to keep our contractor dominant, now we need to make sure it stays this way.

<color=#FBB03F>Sarassian Wars happens in seasons, with each season being four cycles long. If your peldged faction is dominant at the end of the season, you will receive the season's end reward.</color>

desc_qm_t1_rareEarths.en:: When refining ores in the refinery there is a chance for rare earths to appear in addition to the refined metals.

desc_qm_t1_upgradeTurret.en:: The rare minerals we have extracted can be used to improve our modules.

desc_qm_t1_upgradeTurret_3.en:: A module can be upgraded multiple times, vastly increasing its power.

desc_qm_t1_upgradeTurret_4.en:: A module can be upgraded multiple times, vastly increasing its power.

desc_qm_t1_upgradeTurret_5.en:: A module can be upgraded multiple times, vastly increasing its power.

desc_qm_t1_upgradeTurret_6.en:: A module can be upgraded multiple times, vastly increasing its power.

desc_qm_t1_upgradeTurret_7.en:: A module can be upgraded multiple times, vastly increasing its power.

desc_qm_t1_upgradeTurret_8.en:: A module can be upgraded multiple times, vastly increasing its power.

desc_qm_t1_upgradeTurretMax.en:: Once a module has been upgraded to level 9, it is at its maximum level and cannot be upgraded further.

desc_qm_t1_facProgenitors.en:: To improve our scanner, we should gather data on Progenitor vessels. Once we have enough data, we can create a new scanner blueprint.

desc_qm_t1_facProgenitors_A.en:: A few locals in this system have Progenitor technology they willing to hand to us if we agree to help them with their own problems regarding hostile Progenitor vessels and shortage of resources.

desc_qm_t1_facProgenitors_B.en:: Progenitor vessels in this area are equipped with M-type fuses. We need to attack and destroy a few vessels in order to gather enough of quality for use in the prototype.

desc_qm_t1_facProgenitors_C.en:: Fleet command out of Lazarus frowns upon commanders that delve into Progenitor ruins without a minimum of protection. We need to bring our ship up to code and command will approve our ship for such operations in the future.

desc_qm_t1_facProgenitors_D.en:: To save time, rather than reconstruct a Particle density array, we can salvage one from advanced Progenitor craft. We need to attack enough Progenitor ships to find one that is in decent condition. The module will require rare earths in order to activate properly. We can gather them at the system as well.

desc_qm_t1_scannerModule.en:: Based on the data from the Progenitor fragments, our engineers have created a new scanner blueprint.

desc_qm_t1_upgradeModules.en:: In order to move deeper into the galaxy we should upgrade our scanner and drives core.

desc_qm_t1_introLiaison.en:: The Iyatequa are interested in doing business with us. Completing liaison assignments for them will allow us to increase our reputation, which allows us to buy special items and blueprints in their liaison requisitions office.

desc_qm_t1_introInternals.en:: Our flagship has a configurable interior, which we can use to boost our exploration, production or combat abilities using internal modules.

desc_qm_t1_upgradeInternals.en:: Just like with weapon turrets, we can improve our internal module's performance through upgrades.

desc_qm_t1_facIyatequa.en:: The Iyatequa have heard of our plan to meet the Tanoch and agreed to help us set up our science facilities to research better drives. For a price, of course.

desc_qm_t1_facIyatequa_A.en:: The Iyatequa asked us to perform a variety of simple activities and allowing them to monitor the related systems for their own research purposes.

desc_qm_t1_facIyatequa_B.en:: We've been told to deal with an attempted trade blockade set up by pirates. We will need to get some spare resources and some module upgrades before we face the enemy.

desc_qm_t1_facIyatequa_C.en:: Hostiles have been gathering near Iyatequa trading routes. We've been asked to investigate and root out pirates and other undesirables.

desc_qm_t1_facIyatequa_D.en:: A dealer supplying the Iyatequa has tried cutting corners and incured their wrath. We've been asked to apprehend him.

desc_qm_t2_introRP.en:: Our scientists have brought our on-ship laboratories online. We can collect the data of their findings there.

desc_qm_t2_introResearch.en:: Lazarus Base has given us access to a workshop module attached to the station. We can perform further research there and develop new technologies.

desc_qm_t2_newResources.en:: It seems the deeper we move into the galaxy the more minerals we find.

desc_qm_t2_facCangacian.en:: Several Hiigaran colonies are under attack by Cangacians. Lazarus command has asked us to help as much as we can.

desc_qm_t2_facCangacian_A.en:: This colony was attacked by vessels incorporating non-Cangacian technology. We're asked to try to reverse engineer some of it.

desc_qm_t2_facCangacian_B.en:: This colony was hit hard. We need to clear the area of remaining pirates and help with rebuilding.

desc_qm_t2_facCangacian_C.en:: This colony repelled the attackers and gathered some intel. They need our help to decrypt it and find safe places for mining.

desc_qm_t2_facCangacian_D.en:: The most recent attack. Intel shows it was just a scouting mission. We need to help with setting up quick defenses and take out the assault fleet before they can strike.

desc_qm_t1_scannerOvercharge.en:: Some objects are too hidden to find them with our scanner under regular circumstances. Luckily, we can use special batteries to overcharge the scanner beyond its normal abilities to be able to find those.

desc_qm_t2_findPirateHideout.en:: We need to find the system from where the recent Cangacian activity originates. Reports indicate the system might be near Saraal. We should go there and use our long range scanners.

desc_qm_t2_strikePirateHideout.en:: We have located the pirate hideout. Now is the time to strike.

desc_qm_t2_startResearchT2Intc.en:: We can research better ship blueprints using the new materials found in this region.

desc_qm_t2_finResearchT2Intc.en:: Schematics research unlock new blueprints for the fabricators and shipyard.

desc_qm_t2_introParts.en::
The new constructions will require the use of specially fabricated parts.

The blueprints for small Hull, Weapon and Machinery parts can be found in the market.

desc_qm_t2_strikeCraft.en:: Now that we have finished the research and crafted the necessary parts, we can craft an interceptor squadron.

desc_qm_t2_facHiigaran.en:: Lazarus Station was recently attacked. Command asked us to help with rebuilding efforts.

desc_qm_t2_facHiigaran_A.en:: To repair Lazarus Station, new minerals are needed. We are asked to look for new places to mine and help set up the fabrication systems.

desc_qm_t2_facHiigaran_B.en:: After the recent attack, we need to secure the borders of Hiigaran space.

desc_qm_t2_facHiigaran_C.en::
We are asked to lead several high profile campaigns against enemy forces to rally more Hiigaran fleets and raise awareness to the rebuilding efforts of Lazarus Station.

(The blueprints for small Weapon and Machinery parts can be found in the market.)

desc_qm_t2_facHiigaran_D.en:: The attackers still have their bases of operation. We need to clear them out to prevent future attacks.

desc_qm_t2_craftRCol.en:: Mining the new ores can be done faster with special resource collectors equipped with better mining gear.

desc_qm_t2_RColMining.en:: With our new resource collectors, we can mine ores much faster than before.

desc_qm_t2_craftRCon.en:: We acquired a blueprint for the Resource Controller, an escort ship we can send on independent mining missions. Like other escort ships, it must be built in the shipyard.

desc_qm_t2_introIdleMine.en:: Resource Controllers can be sent away to mine ores without our supervision. To do that, it must be assigned to an escort slot in fleet configuration.

desc_qm_t2_startResearchT2Frig.en:: We can research a better assault frigate blueprint using the new minerals.

desc_qm_t2_finResearchT2Frig.en:: Our scientists are at work developing new schematics for the assault frigate.

desc_qm_t2_introOreD.en:: Some asteroids in this region contain a rare ore we can use for advanced constructions.

desc_qm_t2_craftUncShip.en:: We acquired a blueprint for an advanced ship design. It requires the rare ore to be built.

desc_qm_t2_largeHullParts.en::
The frigate blueprint requires a large version of the hull parts.

The blueprint for large hull parts can be found in the market.

desc_qm_t2_escort.en:: With the large hull parts we can finally construct the frigate.

desc_qm_t2_introLiaison.en:: Doing assignments for the liaison office will allow us to requisition better blueprints and better equipment.

desc_qm_t2_researchPulsarCorvette.en::
Uncommon, rare and epic researches are not part of the central research path and must be found in order to be researched.

The Pulsar Corvette Schematics can be found in the code fragment market.

desc_qm_t2_pulsarCorvette.en:: Pulsar Corvettes are effective against other corvettes and small escort ships.

desc_qm_t2_facIyatequa.en:: The Iyatequa have offered to liaison between us and the Tanoch if we agree to run some errands for them.

desc_qm_t2_facIyatequa_A.en:: The Iyatequa want us to deliver some resources - from our own pockets. They said the rewards will compensate for our losses. We'll see.

desc_qm_t2_facIyatequa_B.en:: We're asked to patrol the Iyatequa trading routes and clear out hostiles near them.

desc_qm_t2_facIyatequa_C.en:: This assignment seems simple enough. We simply have to find Cangacian fleets and destroy them.

desc_qm_t2_facIyatequa_D.en:: The Iyatequa want us to find a master thief of legendary reputation.

desc_qm_t2_liaisonTanoch.en:: The Tanoch liaison office will offer better items the higher our reputation is.

desc_qm_t2_largeWeaponParts.en::
Large weapon parts are required for building flagships and weapon modules.

The blueprint for large weapon parts can be found in the Tanoch liaison requisitions office.

desc_qm_t2_liaisonIyatequa.en:: The Iyatequa liaison office will offer better items the higher our reputation is.

desc_qm_t2_largeMachineParts.en::
Large machinery parts are required for building flagships and non-weapon modules.

The blueprint for large machinery parts can be found in the Iyatequa liaison requisitions office.

desc_qm_t2_startCraftFlagship.en:: Now that we have the necessary resources, we can start building our new flagship. Its larger drive core will allow us to enter Tanoch territory. Flagship blueprints are available in the market.

desc_qm_t2_finCraftFlagship.en:: The construction of our new flagship is under way. Once it's finished, we can switch over and move our squadrons and officers as well as modules to the new flagship.

desc_qm_t2_finCraftFlagship_old.en:: Our new flagship has finished its constrution. We should switch over and move our squadrons and officers as well as modules.

desc_qm_t2_strikePahrasRock.en:: Pirate's major Asteroid Base in the area has been threatening the Hiigaran settlements. Hiigaran Flagships have been gathered to strike on this Base.​

desc_qm_t2_turrets.en:: We should stay up to date on weapon technology. Researching new weapon schematics will unlock better modules.

desc_qm_t2_tanochet.en:: We can finally reach the Tanoch capital. It is time to meet the emperor.

desc_qm_t2_internalFabricator.en:: Our new flagship offers the ability to reconfigure its internal layout.

desc_qm_t2_internalRefinery.en:: Additional refinery and fabricator modules increase our economic power.

desc_qm_t2_strikeStationDefense.en:: A large Tanoch station is under attack by a large fleet of pirates. We should band together with other fleets to repel the attackers.

desc_qm_t2_facTanoch.en:: The Tanoch have asked us to run some errands for them. This could be a chance for us to gain their trust.

desc_qm_t2_facTanoch_A.en:: A Tanoch planetary government is experiencing a resource shortfall, and has asked for help with procuring raw material.

desc_qm_t2_facTanoch_B.en:: Pirates are attacking Tanoch systems. We've been asked to drive them back.

desc_qm_t2_facTanoch_C.en:: A Tanoch world is having trouble getting resources from the Empire so they’ve asked anyone for help.

desc_qm_t2_facTanoch_D.en:: The border worlds are being threatened from Yaot assaults and are desperate for defenders. They ask us to drive the Yaot back.

desc_qm_t2_upgradeInternals.en:: Just like with weapon turrets, we can improve our internal module's performance through upgrades.

desc_qm_t2_otherInternals.en:: Our flagship is sectioned into three compartments. We can install different modules in different compartments.

desc_qm_t2_compartments.en:: Our flagship is sectioned into three compartments. We can install different modules in different compartments.

desc_qm_t2_epicSignals.en:: Occasionally we come across high energy signals. It might be worth checking out, but it could also be a potential danger. We should proceed with caution.

desc_qm_t2_facYaot.en:: We have received assignments from both Tanochetlan and Lazarus station. They asked us to investigate the Yaot threat.

desc_qm_t2_facYaot_A.en:: The Tanoch want us to actively engage the Yaot fleets to disrupt their activities in Tanoch space.

desc_qm_t2_facYaot_B.en:: We are looking for evidence of a missing Progenitor hyperspace gate in the area which should be there but isn’t. According to Tanoch intelligence the Yaot are also seeking this object.

desc_qm_t2_facYaot_C.en:: A Hiigaran flagship has gone missing in Tanoch space. Preliminary evidence points towards Yaot involvement. Lazarus wants us to investigate.

desc_qm_t2_facYaot_D.en:: The Yaot are the first major antagonistic power we have encountered. We need to make sure our crew is properly trained and ready to handle the upcoming battles.

desc_qm_t2_templeTonaati.en:: We are following Vaygr fleet to find out their hidden plan.

desc_qm_t3_researchJumpCap.en:: Our scientists have come up with new theories on how to increase the power of our engines. With the new technology we should be able to enter space that was previously inaccessible to us.

desc_qm_t3_scouting.en:: With our improved hyperjump technology, we should upgrade our engines and sensors to explore the new areas.

desc_qm_t3_scouting_scanBelts.en:: Fleet command wants accurate maps of nearby asteroid clusters in order to chart resources and hazards. Contribute to this effort by scanning asteroid clusters.

desc_qm_t3_scouting_scanJovian.en:: New scanning protocols for scanning gas giants are being tested. Contribute to this test by fully scanning a gas giant.

desc_qm_t3_gasMining.en:: We found a new type of resource that warrants a closer look. We should take some samples for study. To harvest gas, simply send a Gas Collector into the atmosphere of a gas planet. Be careful. Deeper layers will deal more damage to your ships! The blueprint for the Gas Collector can be found in the Market.

desc_qm_t3_yaotLiaison.en:: The Yaot have opened their liaison office to us.

desc_qm_t3_facYaot.en:: The Yaot are interested in opening relations with us and wish to begin a dialogue.

desc_qm_t3_sideYaot_A_1.en:: The Yaot present a simple request to map and gather resources in order to test our capabilities and their trust in us.

desc_qm_t3_sideYaot_A_2.en:: The Yaot have asked us to collect further resources and clear the mining areas of hostiles.

desc_qm_t3_sideYaot_A_3.en:: The Yaot are interested in learning our capacity for materials refining. We'll be compensated well.

desc_qm_t3_sideYaot_B_1.en:: The Yaot have a supply line they want protected, and are willing to hire us to clear it of hostiles.

desc_qm_t3_sideYaot_B_2.en:: The Yaot wish to commission us to guard this patrol route until their own patrols can relieve us.

desc_qm_t3_sideYaot_B_3.en:: The Yaot are impressed with our combat capabilities and want to see how we fare against stronger enemies.

desc_qm_t3_sideYaot_C_1.en:: The Yaot have made more contracts available to us on a trial basis. We should engage them.

desc_qm_t3_sideYaot_C_2.en:: The Yaot are becoming more comfortable with employing us. More work for them will go a long way to improving relations.

desc_qm_t3_sideYaot_C_3.en:: The Yaot trust us enough to employ our services on a contract basis. More work is available.

desc_qm_t3_facTanoch.en:: We have been contacted by the Chicuat people within the Tanoch empire. They have been denied Imperial services and are asking us for help.

desc_qm_t3_sideTanoch_A_1.en:: Next to no Imperial resources are reaching the Chicuat worlds. They are asking us to provide what we spare.

desc_qm_t3_sideTanoch_A_2.en:: The Chicuat refineries are busy with the ores we have provided. Meanwhile, an agricultural colony providing most of the food in the sector is running on systems that are barely holding together. They have asked us for spare parts.

desc_qm_t3_sideTanoch_A_3.en:: The economic system has been stabilized, but without proper defenses, raiders will undo everything we've done. We should provide them with some fighters of their own and give their militia some training.

desc_qm_t3_sideTanoch_B_1.en:: Without Imperial patrols, Chicuat space is vulnerable against raiders. They have asked us to make a sweep across their space to clear the sector of hostiles.

desc_qm_t3_sideTanoch_B_2.en:: Most hostiles have been chased off, but some bold bands of the Fleet of Rams have refused to be intimidated. It is time to make a statement.

desc_qm_t3_sideTanoch_B_3.en:: The Chicuat officials have seen our results and several of them want to see us in action. They hope to learn from us how to organize their defenses better.

desc_qm_t3_sideTanoch_C_1.en:: Our contact has suggested running some errands for the Tanoch in the name of the Chicuat people. Doing so would hopefully increase the Chicuat's standing within the Empire.

desc_qm_t3_sideTanoch_C_2.en:: The Empire is reacting to our support of the Chicuat people. While we wait to learn more about the outcome, the Chicuat have asked if their officers can cross-train with ours.

desc_qm_t3_sideTanoch_C_3.en:: After lengthy negotiations with the Chicuat, the Empire reluctantly has agreed to a relief operation, sending resources to worlds in need. Naturally they ask us for support instead of sending their own materials...

desc_qm_t3_starTotek.en:: We are closing in on possible Vaygr transmissions close to the star.

desc_qm_t3_strikeBreach.en:: We found an enemy base that is heavily fortified. Breaching its defenses will not be easy.

desc_qm_t3_facHiigaran.en:: Lazarus Base calls us back to the Hiigaran colonies to establish a presence there and keep the peace.

desc_qm_t3_sideHiigaran_A_1.en:: Hiigaran resource efforts are very short handed, so we’ll be going to assist gas collection in deep space.

desc_qm_t3_sideHiigaran_A_2.en:: Our assistance has been helpful so far, but we are asked to provide and analyze some ore samples from the deeper regions of the galaxy.

desc_qm_t3_sideHiigaran_A_3.en:: The logistics have been set up for the most part, but we are asked to help with some deliveries.

desc_qm_t3_sideHiigaran_B_1.en:: Lazarus base has established a quota for all commanders hunting loose pirates in Hiigaran space.

desc_qm_t3_sideHiigaran_B_2.en:: Most pirates have gone into hiding, but we are asked to make sweeps of local space, to flush out the remaining hostiles.

desc_qm_t3_sideHiigaran_B_3.en:: The hostile presence has been reduced to a manageable level, but Progenitor craft threaten research vessels. We need to get rid of them and analyze some of the debris.

desc_qm_t3_sideHiigaran_C_1.en:: Lazarus has sent us some trainees to get some practical experience on our ship.

desc_qm_t3_sideHiigaran_C_2.en:: Many of the trainees are going to become pilots and navigators, but have so far trained in controlled or virtual flight simulators. They need some real experience.

desc_qm_t3_sideHiigaran_C_3.en:: The final course is the graduation level for the trainees, who must see actual combat. You are to take the crew into battle and complete the course. Once finished, they return to Lazarus to finish up their coursework.

desc_qm_t3_facIyatequa.en:: Ekekko informed us about exclusive work needed by the Iyatequa, and the traders will pay well for this assistance. This is below the table work on various jobs they don’t widely advertise for. They do not say what the ultimate purpose of this work is, though.

desc_qm_t3_sideIyatequa_A_1.en:: A small world in the Empty Quarter is looking for trustworthy connections. They offer an assortment of various tasks.

desc_qm_t3_sideIyatequa_A_2.en:: A wealthy socialite has heard of our accomplishments and wants some things done. Discreetly, of course.

desc_qm_t3_sideIyatequa_A_3.en:: Our contact in the Empty Quarter is looking for new opportunities and has been pleased with our work so far. They want us to scout out new areas of space in order to expand their influence.

desc_qm_t3_sideIyatequa_B_1.en:: The Iyatequa plan to set up new trading routes in space currently riddled by pirates. They asked us to clean up the area.

desc_qm_t3_sideIyatequa_B_2.en:: Some pirates apparently didn't get the hint yet. We should show them the Iyatequa mean business.

desc_qm_t3_sideIyatequa_B_3.en:: Most pirates have dispersed, but just to make sure they do not come back we should increase our reputation so future raiders will think twice before setting up nests here.

desc_qm_t3_sideIyatequa_C_1.en:: A local world wants help building and supplying a space station. We are asked to test possible mining sites and clear them of hostiles.

desc_qm_t3_sideIyatequa_C_2.en:: Mining ships have departed for the asteroids we have charted, but the internal systems require special gases. We are asked to sample the gases at promising jovians.

desc_qm_t3_sideIyatequa_C_3.en:: The mining sites have been prepared, but the Iyatequa asked us with further assistance through supplies and mining craft.

desc_qm_t3_facCangacian.en:: Reports at the Tanoch border are coming in stating that the Fleet of Rams, Supay’s army, is on the move at last.

desc_qm_t3_sideCangacian_A_1.en:: We are asked to intercept as many Cangacian fleets as we can.

desc_qm_t3_sideCangacian_A_2.en:: The Cangacians continue to probe the Tanoch defenses. We should look for suspicious activity.

desc_qm_t3_sideCangacian_A_3.en:: Supay's fleets may have holdouts in systems we have not been looking yet. We should find those and flush them out.

desc_qm_t3_sideCangacian_B_1.en:: To counter these attacks our crew must be well trained.

desc_qm_t3_sideCangacian_B_2.en:: Our crew is analyzing the attack patterns to find ways to predict where the Fleet of Rams may strike next.

desc_qm_t3_sideCangacian_B_3.en:: Several smaller worlds on the border have sent us some of their recruits, in hopes they could get some practical experience from our battles with the Cangacians.

desc_qm_t3_sideCangacian_C_1.en:: Several mining fleets of the border systems have taken losses and are asking us to provide them with safe locations to find resources.

desc_qm_t3_sideCangacian_C_2.en:: The remaining mining fleets are flocking to the new mining spots, but they require gases for advanced weaponry.

desc_qm_t3_sideCangacian_C_3.en:: The border worlds' new mining lanes are buzzing with activity, but they need supplies to build up defenses against future raids.

desc_qm_t3_sijinLighthouse.en:: We detected a possible signal from the missing Khar-Kalaad.

desc_qm_t4_researchJumpCap.en:: Crossing the Nightmare Gulf requires an upgrade to our hyperjump technology. After some scans of the gate at Sijin Lighthouse, our scientists think they are able to make the leap possible.

desc_qm_t4_iliyinLighthouse.en:: We have arrived at another lighthouse in uncharted territory. Be prepared for anything.

desc_qm_t4_moonResources.en:: Crystals are a new type of resource that can be combined with refined metals into a composite material needed for advanced constructions. So far we have only been able to find them by chance in <color=#FBB03F>signals and liaison missions</color>.

desc_qm_t4_amassariLiaison.en:: The Amassari have opened their liaison office to us.

desc_qm_t4_brightTemple.en:: The Amassari here may contain answers about the nature of the Progenitor observer.

desc_qm_t4_postBrightTemple_1.en:: We should take this time to become better acquainted with the Amassari and their culture. Performing tasks for the assorted groups will accomplish this.

desc_qm_t4_postBrightTemple_2.en:: A new technique for refining was discovered from the Amassari. Test this process by refining rare earths.

desc_qm_t4_postBrightTemple_3.en:: Our crews need a new round of training to become familiar with Amassari practices and tactics.

desc_qm_t4_hataldan.en:: The fallen capital of the Amassari, and last known position of the Observer.

desc_qm_t4_postHataldan_1.en:: The search begins for Kidara and the stolen Observer. We must examine any objects we can find scattered around for clues about her whereabouts.

desc_qm_t4_postHataldan_2.en:: Destroying Kiithless ships and scavenging their databanks could fill some gaps in our intelligence about the Kiithless. The hunt continues!

desc_qm_t4_postHataldan_3.en:: A cryptic clue that emerged from harvesting Kiithless vessels may have a solution if we can piece together a saga from the Hagthar Empire. Collect relics from these ancient people.

desc_qm_t4_nightmareGulf.en:: The Hagthar knew of pockets and safe regions close to this massive interstellar storm. We now know the way to Kidara's hideout in The Nightmare Gulf. It's time to end this.

desc_qm_t4_strikeNightmareGulf.en:: The Hagthar knew of pockets and safe regions close to this massive interstellar storm. We now know the way to Kidara's hideout in The Nightmare Gulf. It's time to end this.

desc_qm_t4_tanWin_DefendBase.en::
We received emergency communication from the Chicuat Elders. They anticipate a raid on one of their remote trading stations. Toci asks us to take on the defense in order to relieve the weakened and overextended Chicuat forces.

<color=#FBB03F>This mission can be played in a party. Invite your friends to help you if you are struggling with it. To create a party, open the social panel in the upper right corner. Then tap on the fourth tab from the top on the right.</color>

desc_qm_t4_tanWin_AttackBase.en::
Intelligence from the Chicuat points to a Tecuban base operating around an uninhabited planet. We must go there and eliminate this base to stop the raids.

<color=#FBB03F>This mission can be played in a party. Invite your friends to help you if you are struggling with it. To create a party, open the social panel in the upper right corner. Then tap on the fourth tab from the top on the right.</color>

desc_qm_t4_tanWin_Relic.en::
In our search for the Vaygr involved with the Tecuban, we aquired one of their communication frequencies. If we contact the Vaygr now, we should be able to trace their signal and hyper jump to their exact location.

<color=#FBB03F>This mission can be played in a party. Invite your friends to help you if you are struggling with it. To create a party, open the social panel in the upper right corner. Then tap on the fourth tab from the top on the right.</color>

desc_qm_t4_tanWin_Academy.en::
We finally learned Jochik Kaan's intentions. He sparked the flames of war to weaken the Chicuat defenses and steal the Baetyl from Tlapallan Academy, one of their key centers of learning. We must travel there at once, before it is too late.

<color=#FBB03F>This mission can be played in a party. Invite your friends to help you if you are struggling with it. To create a party, open the social panel in the upper right corner. Then tap on the fourth tab from the top on the right.</color>

desc_qm_t4_yaoSpr_Conjunction.en::
Chocoan has provided the coordinates to the next astral conjunction event. Strong hostile forces are to be expected in this system. Our goal is to both protect the civilian pilgrims and find out more about the suspected secret agenda of the Yaot Elders.

<color=#FBB03F>This mission can be played in a party. Invite your friends to help you if you are struggling with it. To create a party, open the social panel in the upper right corner. Then tap on the fourth tab from the top on the right.</color>

desc_qm_t5_particles.en::
Our scientists report that they have found traces of a special type of volatile particle. Its properties look promising. They want us to obtain a sample and stabilize it so they can work with it.

<color=#FBB03F>Unstable particles can be found as finds in Tier 5 systems or may be found after completing T5 strikes.</color>

desc_qm_t5_upcraftModule.en::
The science division reports that they need specialized equipment to handle the particles. We should build dedicated development labs in our starbase.

<color=#FBB03F>The blueprint for the development lab can be found in the market. The module must be mounted on the starbase.</color>

desc_qm_t5_stabilizeParticles.en::
Our scientists have moved into the development lab. We can begin analyzing the particle that we found.

<color=#FBB03F>Particles come in different rarities. Before they can be used, they must be stabilized in the development lab.</color>

desc_qm_t5_upcraftBlueprints.en::
The particle has been fully stabilized and first tests show promise. Our engineers already have some ideas of how to incorporate its properties into our technology.

<color=#FBB03F>Most Tier 5 blueprints cannot be found and must be improved from their Tier 4 versions. This process is done in the development lab and requires stable particles.</color>

desc_qm_t5_upcraftRareBlueprint.en::
Theoretical models show that there are more potent variations of the particle out there. If we can stabilize one, we could enhance our technology even further.

<color=#FBB03F>Particles come in different rarities. Higher rarities are required to improve blueprints further.</color>

desc_qm_t5_upcraftEpicBlueprint.en::
Our engineers think they have a pretty good grasp on how to incorporate the particles we find into our technology. They have provided us with plans for even more powerful blueprints. All we need is another particle.

<color=#FBB03F>Multiple development labs can be mounted on the flagship or starbase to speed up the particle stabilization and the blueprint enhancement process.</color>

desc_qm_orb_t3_components.en::
<color=#FBB03F>The blueprints for starbase components can be found in the liaison requisitions offices.</color>

Our engineers have come up with a plan to build a starbase, which will serve as our base of operations. Before we can do that, however, we need to construct the necessary components.

desc_qm_orb_t3_orbital.en::
<color=#FBB03F>The blueprint for the starbase can be found in the regular market.</color>

Now that we have the components, we can build the starbase proper. Once the pieces have been constructed, it can be quickly assembled in orbit around celestial objects.

desc_qm_orb_t3_placeOrbital.en::
<color=#FBB03F>Place or relocate your starbase by selecting a celestial object in the target list inside the star system view.</color>

Our finished starbase is ready and can be placed in orbit of a planet or moon.

desc_qm_orb_t3_modules.en::
<color=#FBB03F>The regular fabricator and refinery module can be mounted on the starbase, but there are specialized starbase modules. Blueprints for some of those can be found in the liaison requisitions offices.</color>

Now that our starbase is finished, we can start filling it up with modules.

desc_qm_001.en:: We have made it to the other side. Now we need to gather what we came here for and then return home.

desc_qi_001_b.en:: Ekekko has given us the coordinates to a trading station. We should check it out.

desc_qi_001_a.en:: We should fill as many vacant positions on our ship as we can before we continue.

desc_qi_003_c.en:: The trading station offers plenty of goods. We should take a closer look.

desc_qi_002_a.en:: Processing raw resources is vital for our continued survival.

desc_qi_002_b.en:: If we want to survive in this galaxy, we need to bring our on-ship production systems online.

desc_qi_002_c.en:: We need to keep a contingent of fighters ready to answer to potential threats.

desc_qi_003_a.en:: The trading station has allowed us to use its shipyards to bolster our fleet.

desc_qi_003_b.en:: The more ships in our fleet, the more we are prepared for hostile surprises in this galaxy.

desc_qm_002_pirates.en:: The area is plagued by pirates. We might learn about their use of progenitor technology.

desc_qi_004_buildFlagship.en:: We have enough resources, that we can build a new flagship.

desc_qi_004_equipFlagship.en:: Our new flagship is ready to be staffed. We should make it our new base of operations.

desc_qi_003_d.en:: Outfitting our flagship with additional and better modules at trading stations is essential.

desc_qi_scanning.en:: We should use our scanner to find nearby progenitor ruins. Maybe they will provide some answers.

desc_qm_002.en:: Our Progenitor communicator didn't work on Wiracoda Gate as expected. We need to find out why.

desc_qi_003_e.en:: Upgrading our flagship's modules at a trading station increases our defensive capabilities further.

desc_qi_003_startResearch.en:: Our science department has set up the laboratory. We should set them to work on new technologies.

desc_qm_tan_missions1.en:: Some factions within the Tanoch have recently become more hostile.

desc_qm_T2_ores.en:: We've heard of places with new types of ore that would allow us to construct better ships. We should scan these systems and take some samples.

desc_qm_T2_buildStrikeCraft.en:: The Interceptor T2 blueprints are available at the station market.

desc_qm_tan_missions2.en:: Hostilities with the renegade Tanoch continue.

desc_qm_T2_buildFrigate.en:: The Assault Frigate T2 blueprints are available at the station market.

desc_qm_tan_missions3.en:: The Tanoch emperor has officially denounced the actions of the renegade Tanoch and has declared them a threat to the stability of the galaxy.

desc_qm_T2_buildFlagship.en:: We need a better flagship if we are to survive in this galaxy. A blueprint of an improved Explorer-class flagship is available at the station market. The blueprints for weapon and machinery parts can be found in the laision requisitions of the Tanoch and the Iyatequa respectively.

desc_qm_003.en:: We have received an invitation to the Tanoch homeworld, a major power of this galaxy.

desc_qm_004.en:: We are following Vaygr fleet to find out their hidden plan.

desc_qs_exploration_01.en:: We should explore this galaxy further. Who knows what we could find.

desc_qs_exploration_02.en:: We have made discoveries that will keep our scientists busy for months.

desc_qs_exploration_03.en:: This galaxy is full of danger and opportunity. We should analyze and prepare.

desc_qs_economy_01.en:: Building up a fleet requires a constant supply of materials.

desc_qs_economy_02.en:: We should not let our fabrication modules go idle.

desc_qs_economy_03.en:: Building bigger and greater ships will require bigger and greater materials.

desc_qs_battle_01.en:: Space is full of danger. We need to be prepared.

desc_qs_battle_02.en:: We need allies if we are to survive in this galaxy.

desc_qs_battle_03.en:: Only great challenges yield great rewards.

desc_qs_unlockStrikes_t1.en:: As we venture further into this galaxy, we will encounter greater and greater threats. We need to be prepared.

desc_qs_unlockStrikes_t2.en:: As we venture further into this galaxy, we will encounter greater and greater threats. We need to be prepared.

desc_qs_unlockStrikes_t3.en:: As we venture further into this galaxy, we will encounter greater and greater threats. We need to be prepared.

desc_qr_013_gamescom.en:: A lot of pirate activity has been reported in this region. The local pirate faction must have a major base here.

desc_qr_013.en:: A lot of pirate activity has been reported in this region. The local pirate faction must have a major base here. Our task is to find the base, and destroy any pirate vessel and structure in this sector.

desc_qr_014.en:: We have received intel that enemy forces are planning to attack a local trading station. In order to defend the station, we must immediately move our fleet into defensive position.

desc_qr_015.en:: The presence of a large Cangacian asteroid base in this area has been threatening the Hiigaran settlements. Our task is to perform an attack on this base, destroy it and any Cangacian fleet nearby.

desc_qr_016.en:: A lot of pirate activity has been reported in this region. The local pirate faction must have a major base here. Our task is to find the base, and destroy any pirate vessel and structure in this sector.

desc_qr_017.en:: We have received intel that enemy forces are planning to attack a local trading station. In order to defend the station, we must immediately move our fleet into defensive position.

desc_qr_018.en:: The presence of a large Cangacian asteroid base in this area has been threatening the Hiigaran settlements. Our task is to perform an attack on this base, destroy it and any Cangacian fleet nearby.

desc_qr_019.en:: Sitting in a safe pocket inside an electromagnetic asteroid field, this station is a crucial base of operation. As it is heavily defended, we came up with the cunning plan to fill an old freighter with explosives and escort it to the base.

desc_qr_020.en:: Sitting in a safe pocket inside an electromagnetic asteroid field, this station is a crucial base of operation. As it is heavily defended, we came up with the cunning plan to fill an old freighter with explosives and escort it to the base.

desc_qr_021.en:: We have received intel that enemy forces are planning to attack a local trading station. In order to defend the station, we must immediately move our fleet into defensive position.

desc_qr_022.en:: The presence of a large Cangacian asteroid base in this area has been threatening the Hiigaran settlements. Our task is to perform an attack on this base, destroy it and any Cangacian fleet nearby.

desc_qr_023.en:: A base used by Kiithless raiders has been located in this area of the nightmare gulf. A large attack force will be needed to destroy it and free the Progenitor assets held at this location.

desc_qs_killPirate1_pre01.en:: Pirates known as the Cangacians are harassing trade fleets of the Iyatequa.

desc_qs_killPirate1_00.en:: More Cangacian activity is being reported.

desc_qs_killPirate1_01.en:: Give the pirates a bloody nose. Show them you're no pushover.

desc_qs_killPirate1_02.en:: Hunt down pirate ships to suppress their activities in the area.

desc_qs_killPirate1_03.en:: Beat back the local pirates by eliminating most of their forces.

desc_qs_killPirate1_04.en:: An organized pirate force has moved into the area. Show them they are not welcome.

desc_qs_killPirate1_05.en:: The Fleet of Rams has increased their presence. Meet them with equal enmity.

desc_qs_killPirate1_06.en:: The Fleet of Rams is hunting the local defenders. Oppose them with force!

desc_qs_killPirate1_07.en:: Supay himself has routed one of his fleets to the area. Engage them at will!

desc_qs_killPirate1_08.en:: Send a message to Supay, warlord of the Fleet of Rams. Destroy one of his fleets.

desc_qs_killTanoch_pre01.en:: Renegades of the Tanoch nation are disrupting the peace of the empire.

desc_qs_killTanoch_00.en:: More renegade fleets are being reported.

desc_qs_killTanoch_01.en:: Poach Tanoch patrols to weaken their activities in the area. Hostile Tanoch signals have been located in T2 systems and higher.

desc_qs_killTanoch_02.en:: Continue to attack Tanoch patrols to weaken their local status. Hostile Tanoch signals have been located in T2 systems and higher.

desc_qs_killTanoch_03.en:: Tanoch freighter crews fear your arrival. Continue the attacks! Hostile Tanoch signals have been located in T2 systems and higher.

desc_qs_killTanoch_04.en:: Tanoch freighters request action against you. Continue the attacks! Hostile Tanoch signals have been located in T2 systems and higher.

desc_qs_killTanoch_05.en:: The Tanoch patrol force recognizes you on sight. Continue the attacks! Hostile Tanoch signals have been located in T2 systems and higher.

desc_qs_killTanoch_06.en:: Tanoch warning stations alert the Empire to your presence. Continue your attacks! Hostile Tanoch signals have been located in T2 systems and higher.

desc_qs_killTanoch_07.en:: The Tanoch regard you as a fleet-level threat. Continue your assaults against them! Hostile Tanoch signals have been located in T2 systems and higher.

desc_qs_killTanoch_08.en:: The Emperor will know your name. Hostile Tanoch signals have been located in T2 systems and higher.

desc_qs_killYaot_pre01.en:: Some Yaot that are dissatisfied with the government have begun causing chaos in regional space.

desc_qs_killYaot_00.en:: More Yaot rebels have been reported.

desc_qs_killYaot_01.en:: Attack the Yaot patrols to drive them from this area.

desc_qs_killYaot_02.en:: Continue attacking the Yaot to drive them from the region.

desc_qs_killYaot_03.en:: Yaot Fleet captains recognize your silhouette. Continue the attack.

desc_qs_killYaot_04.en:: Yaot sensors are alerted to your presence. Continue the attack!

desc_qs_killYaot_05.en:: Yaot Fleet commanders are watching out for you. Continue your assaults against them!

desc_qs_killYaot_06.en:: Your name is mentioned between Yaot Fleet commanders. Continue your attacks!

desc_qs_killYaot_07.en:: You are impacting Yaot fleet operations in this area. Continue your attack!

desc_qs_killYaot_08.en:: Your threat level among the Yaot is higher than most Tanoch fleets. Continue the attack!

desc_qs_mineT1ABC_pre01.en:: We need to test our mining equipment.

desc_qs_mineT1ABC_00.en:: We should check our mining procedures and see if we could streamline the process.

desc_qs_mineT1ABC_01.en:: Start collecting asteroids to calibrate our resource refinery methods.

desc_qs_mineT1ABC_02.en:: More materials are necessary to establish our baseline. Harvest more asteroids.

desc_qs_mineT1ABC_03.en:: Our refineries have been calibrated to local nimbus materials. Begin our first production haul.

desc_qs_mineT1ABC_04.en:: Begin our second production haul for processing.

desc_qs_mineT1ABC_05.en:: Begin our third production haul for processing.

desc_qs_mineT1ABC_06.en:: Begin our fourth production haul for processing.

desc_qs_mineT1ABC_07.en:: One final haul is needed to certify the refinery for full operations.

desc_qs_mineT1ABC_08.en:: One last production haul is needed to certify the refinery for Grade 1 Procesing.

desc_qs_mineT2ABC_pre01.en:: We need to test our mining equipment on these new types of minerals.

desc_qs_mineT2ABC_00.en:: We should check our mining procedures on these new types of minerals.

desc_qs_mineT2ABC_01.en:: Engineering has proposed minor upgrades to the refinery process. Harvest larger asteroids for testing.

desc_qs_mineT2ABC_02.en:: Engineering is ready to implement these minor changes. Continue supplying larger resources.

desc_qs_mineT2ABC_03.en:: Engineering wants to test further refits to the refinery. Supply additional resources for testing.

desc_qs_mineT2ABC_04.en:: Continue refinery trials. Provide larger resources.

desc_qs_mineT2ABC_05.en:: Continue refinery trials. Provide larger resources.

desc_qs_mineT2ABC_06.en:: Continue refinery trials. Provide larger resources.

desc_qs_mineT2ABC_07.en:: Continue refinery trials. Provide larger resources.

desc_qs_mineT2ABC_08.en:: One final load is necessary to approve the new refit to the refinery.

desc_qs_mineT3ABC_pre01.en:: We need to test our mining equipment on these new types of minerals.

desc_qs_mineT3ABC_00.en:: We should check our mining procedures on these new types of minerals.

desc_qs_mineT3ABC_01.en:: Refinery teams propose a new chemical process for resource extraction.

desc_qs_mineT3ABC_02.en:: Supply reduced manpower tests by harvesting further resources.

desc_qs_mineT3ABC_03.en:: Conducting reduced manpower stress test on refinery complex.

desc_qs_mineT3ABC_04.en:: Conducting reduced manpower stress test on refinery complex.

desc_qs_mineT3ABC_05.en:: Conducting reduced manpower stress test on refinery complex.

desc_qs_mineT3ABC_06.en:: Conducting reduced manpower stress test on refinery complex.

desc_qs_mineT3ABC_07.en:: Final test of reduced crew capacity through new refinery process. Procure resources.

desc_qs_mineT3ABC_08.en:: Final certification of refinery postprocessing procedure. Supply resources for this test.

desc_qs_scan_pre01.en:: We should explore the star systems in this new galaxy.

desc_qs_scan_00.en:: We need to fill our system charts with actual data.

desc_qs_scan_01.en:: The new sensor suite needs raw data to begin configuring the array. Begin scanning.

desc_qs_scan_02.en:: The array is ready to begin trials. Begin scanning targets.

desc_qs_scan_03.en:: Begin testing short range detection sensors. Begin scanning targets.

desc_qs_scan_04.en:: Conduct scans. Calibration will focus on short range performance.

desc_qs_scan_05.en:: Conduct scans. Calibration will focus on long range performance.

desc_qs_scan_06.en:: Conduct Scans. Calibration will focus on hyperspace oddities.

desc_qs_scan_07.en:: Conduct scans. Calibration will focus on signals moving at distance.

desc_qs_scan_08.en:: Final comprehensive test of all sensor systems.

desc_qs_finishGenerated_pre01.en:: We should look out for possible signals in deep space. They could represent opportunities for us.

desc_qs_finishGenerated_00.en:: We should actively search for signals in deep space.

desc_qs_finishGenerated_01.en:: Signals investigation for pathfinding and reconnaissance.

desc_qs_finishGenerated_02.en:: Further investigate mysterious signals for pathfinding and reconnaissance.

desc_qs_finishGenerated_03.en:: Hunt for anomalous signals to unlock further discoveries and rewards.

desc_qs_finishGenerated_04.en:: Establish signal gain and investigation methods.

desc_qs_finishGenerated_06.en:: Special teams designated for signal investigations response.

desc_qs_Keid_01.en:: Keid is struggling under the weight of enemy attacks and depleted resources. Help them take back control of the system.

desc_qs_Keid_02.en:: The people of Keid suffer from a lack of resources. Support them by collecting and refining resources.

desc_qs_Keid_03.en:: Donate your hard-earned resources and credits so that the people of Keid may fight on.

desc_qs_Ytep_01.en:: Help the people of Ytep take back control of the system by pushing back enemies.

desc_qs_Ytep_02.en:: Collect enough parts and ships to support the war effort in Ytep.

desc_qs_Ytep_03.en:: Donate T2 parts and ships to help the people of Ytep fight after you are gone.

desc_qs_Exile_01.en:: Destroy pirates and complete strikes to prove your strength.

desc_qs_Exile_02.en:: Gather resources and craft units to demonstrate your independence and self-reliance.

desc_qs_Exile_03.en:: Travel across the galaxy and discover new locations to help chart the unknown.

desc_qt_daily_buy.en:: You can buy resources or items in the market as well as in the liaison requisitions.

desc_qt_daily_mine.en:: Ores can be mined in asteroid clusters, while gas is harvested from jovians.

desc_qt_daily_refine.en:: Refining ores is required to turn them into usable metals for the production process.

desc_qt_daily_craft.en:: You can fabricate all sorts of products in your flagship's factories.

desc_qt_daily_gainRP.en:: Research points are passively collected in your flagship's laboratories. They are needed to conduct research.

desc_qt_daily_insignias.en:: You can earn insignias by completing missions. They are needed to promote your officers, which increases their attributes.

desc_qt_daily_liaison.en:: Completing missions gives you XP to level up.

desc_qt_daily_destroy.en:: Destroyed enemy vessels sometimes leave salvage behind which may contain resources.

desc_qt_daily_signals.en:: Some objects require to be scanned several times to reveal them fully.

desc_qt_daily_dailyMission.en:: A strike is a great opportunity to test your strength and train your coordination with other commanders.

desc_qt_daily_dailies.en:: Most daily and weekly assignments grant Prestige, which can be used in the prestige section of the market to acquire special blueprints and other items.

desc_qt_w_craft.en:: You can fabricate all sorts of products in your flagship's factories.

desc_qt_w_systemScan.en:: Some objects require to be scanned several times to reveal them fully.

desc_qt_w_refine.en:: Refining ores is required to turn them into usable metals for the production process.

desc_qt_w_pay.en:: Ores can be mined in asteroid clusters, which are rich in metals.

desc_qt_w_research.en:: Research is conducted inside your flagship's laboratories.

desc_qt_w_upgrade.en:: Module upgrades need rare earth materials and can only be done at a trading station.

desc_qt_w_completemissions.en:: New signals may appear through scanning after you have cleared out a few.

desc_qt_weekly_dailies.en:: Daily assignments refresh once a day, make sure to claim your reward before that happens.

desc_qt_weekly_reputation.en:: Completing liaison assignments improves your standing with that particular faction, which in turn unlocks new items in their liaison requisitions.

desc_qt_weekly_research.en:: Research is conducted inside your flagship's laboratories.

desc_qt_weekly_clanQuests.en:: You can only complete clan assignments while you are inside a clan. Completing these grants you clan credits as well as clan supplies for the whole clan.

desc_qt_weekly_levelOfficers.en:: After reaching enough levels, officers will gain a new rank, which increases their abilities.

desc_qt_weekly_upgrades.en:: Module upgrades need rare earth materials and can only be done at a trading station.

desc_qt_weekly_missions.en:: New signals may appear through scanning after you have cleared out a few.

desc_qt_weekly_adventurism.en:: Completing missions gives you XP to level up.

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_daily_A_tx.en:: Signals can be found through scanning. A better sensor module increases the chance to reveal a signal.

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_daily_B_tx.en:: Rare earths are an occasional by-product of refining. They are required for upgrading modules.

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day01_A_t1.en::
We received priority communication from Lazarus Base concerning Gideon S'jet. The transmission is encrypted with a specific vibration that can only be found on Hiigaran fabricators. We need to construct any item to match the encryption.

<color=#FBB03F>Small items such as strike craft, modules and parts can be built in the fabricator. Larger items such as escort ships and flagships must be constructed at shipyards provided at larger stations.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day01_A_tx.en::
We received priority communication from Hiigaran Command of Lazarus Base concerning Gideon S'jet. We need to decrypt it in our laboratory first before we can read it.

<color=#FBB03F>Research points are produced and collected in the on-ship laboratories, or in the starbase laboratories.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day01_B_tx.en::
The list given to us by Gideon includes many components found only in Progenitor ships. The easiest way to collect them is to harvest them from downed Progenitor units.

<color=#FBB03F>Progenitor ships can be found in signals. They are strong enemies, but their salvage contains resources that cannot be found in the salvage of other ships.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day01_C_tx.en::
Progenitor Cognition Nodes are a fragile component often found floating in free space near ancient wreckages.

<color=#FBB03F>Progenitor relics can be found in relic signature signals.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day02_A_t1.en::
Ekekko can bring us in contact with traders specialized in Progenitor technology. But knowing the Iyatequa, everything has a price. We should mine minerals to recuperate the losses we'll have to pay.

<color=#FBB03F>Ore can be mined from asteroids in asteroid fields. Collectors of a lower tier than the asteroids they are mining will yield less ore.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day02_A_tx.en::
Ekekko can bring us in contact with traders specialized in Progenitor technology. But knowing the Iyatequa, everything has a price. We should mine minerals to recuperate the losses we'll have to pay.

<color=#FBB03F>Type D ore is not abundant enough to form asteroid clusters on its own. Instead, asteroids with D type ore can be found within clusters rich with other types of ore.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day02_B_t1.en::
To impress the Iyatequa traders and buy the Progenitor components for Gideon, we will have to work on our reputation.

<color=#FBB03F>You can earn insignias by completing missions.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day02_B_tx.en::
To impress the Iyatequa traders and procure the Progenitor components for Gideon, we will have to work on our reputation among a certain clientele.

<color=#FBB03F>Completing liaison assignments for a faction increases your reputation level for that faction. Liaison assignments are posted in the liaison office.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day02_C_tx.en::
In order to raise funds to acquire the needed Progenitor components for Gideon, we must sell some of our stored items on the local market.

<color=#FBB03F>Items and resources can be sold for credits in the market at stations.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day03_A_tx.en::
We need to search for recent communications data in this sector to pick up a lead on Guahai's Yaot fleet. We should find what we are looking for on recently destroyed ships.

<color=#FBB03F>The strength of enemies is dependent on a signal's or asteroid cluster's tier and subtier. The subtier is the number next to the tier icon.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day03_B_tx.en::
We are in search of the missing data disk Guahai mentioned in his transmission. We might be able to find it in salvage crates from local outlaws.

<color=#FBB03F>When you destroy an enemy vessel, there is a chance that you will gain salvage from that ship. This salvage can be opened in your storage for additional rewards.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day03_C_t1.en::
The data disk gave us a lead on the Progenitor component the Yaot call the Stambah. It seems to be located inside a sector with strong enemy activity.

<color=#FBB03F>Signals of higher rarities are hard to find and the enemies are much stronger, but the rewards are better than that of regular signals.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day03_C_tx.en::
The reconnaissance disk gave us a lead on the Progenitor component the Yaot call the Stambha. Enemy activity is high in the target location.

<color=#FBB03F>Strikes are difficult missions that require a strong fleet from several commanders to beat.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day04_A_tx.en::
Gideon has emerged from his laboratory. He talks of the possibility to build a device that could change the fortunes of Hiigarans in Nimbus. However, we must search for a final component.

<color=#FBB03F>Scannable objects, such as signals, can be found through scanning. A better or upgraded sensor module increases the chances of success.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day04_B_t1.en::
Gideon is in need of raw materials to construct his secret device. We have to mine some minerals for him.

<color=#FBB03F>Ore can be mined from asteroids. Collectors of a lower tier than the asteroids they are mining will yield less ore.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day04_B_t2.en::
Gideon is in need of raw materials to construct his secret device. We have to mine some minerals for him.

<color=#FBB03F>Ore can be mined from asteroids. Collectors of a lower tier than the asteroids they are mining will yield less ore.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day04_B_tx.en::
Gideon is in need of raw materials to construct a secret device. We should look for a jovian planet to collect some gas.

<color=#FBB03F>Gases are used for the fabrication of Tier 3 and 4 parts. Special gas collectors can harvest them from the dangerous atmosphere of jovians.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day04_C_tx.en::
According to Ekekko, the last component on Gideon's list might be in the hands of a powerful enemy. The search for additional information is sending us into the most dangerous areas of this sector.

<color=#FBB03F>Signals of higher rarities are hard to find and the enemies are much stronger, but the rewards are better than that of regular signals.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day05_A_t1.en::
We want to make contact with Tepin Papan, commander of the Tanoch Empire. To open up a communication channel, we should do some hired work for the local authorities.

<color=#FBB03F>There are different types of assignments available in your assignment log.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day05_A_tx.en::
We want to make contact with Tepin Papan, commander of the Tanoch Empire. To find a communication channel, we should do some hired work for the local authorities.

<color=#FBB03F>Completing liaison assignments for a faction increases your reputation level for that faction. Liaison assignments are posted in the liaison office.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day05_B_t1.en::
Tepin Papan has offered to provide information on Gideon's last component if we help him with a security issue he currently faces.

<color=#FBB03F>The strength of enemies is dependent on a signal's or asteroid cluster's tier and subtier. The subtier is the number next to the tier icon.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day05_B_tx.en::
Tepin Papan has offered to provide information on Gideon's last component if we help him with a security issue he currently faces.

<color=#FBB03F>Many liaison assignments require you to complete missions. Some even require you to complete multiple missions.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day05_C_t1.en::
Tepin Papan wants us to retrieve some stolen goods. We should begin salvaging crates in the areas indicated by Tanoch data.

<color=#FBB03F>When you destroy an enemy vessel, there is a chance that you will gain salvage from that ship. This salvage can be opened in your storage for additional rewards.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day05_C_tx.en::
According to Tepin Papan, some of the Tanoch sectors require assistance. We should seek out their liaison offices and complete assignments.

<color=#FBB03F>Completing liaison assignments for a faction increases your reputation level for that faction. Liaison assignments are posted in the liaison office.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day06_A_tx.en::
While Lazarus Base is processing the reports on the stolen Progenitor component, Gideon wants us to train a crew to handle the device he's constructing.

<color=#FBB03F>Insignias are used to level up and promote officers. They can be gained from discharging officers and are earned through completing signals.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day06_B_tx.en::
With Gideon's new program, we should start training the crew that will man his enigmatic device.

<color=#FBB03F>Each officer level increases an attribute of that officer by a certain amount. When an officer reaches a new rank, their skill increases or they might even gain a second skill.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day06_C_t1.en::
It is time to put our newly trained crew to the test. We received a task from Lazarus Base to engage a hostile fleet nearby.

<color=#FBB03F>Signals of higher rarities are hard to find and the enemies are much stronger, but the rewards are better than that of regular signals.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day06_C_tx.en::
It is time to put our newly trained crew to the test. We received a task from Lazarus Base to engage a hostile fleet nearby.

<color=#FBB03F>Strikes are difficult missions that require a strong fleet from several commanders to beat.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day07_A_tx.en::
Guhai is a high ranking Yaot official and Lazarus Base has advised us to follow his instructions for now. His first transmitted task needs us to mine resources.

<color=#FBB03F>Ore can be mined from asteroids. Collectors of a lower tier than the asteroids they are mining will yield less ore.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day07_B_tx.en::
We continue to follow Guahai’s orders. His next task for us is to produce refined material.

<color=#FBB03F>Most ores need to be refined to be used for constructions. The refining process may result in rare earths as well.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day07_C_t1.en::
Guahai requires us to build specific items for his fleet, as repayment for stealing their cultural item.

<color=#FBB03F>Small items such as strike craft, modules and parts can be built in the fabricator. Larger items such as escort ships and flagships must be constructed at shipyards provided at larger stations.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day07_C_tx.en::
Guahai requires us to build specific items for his fleet, as repayment for stealing their cultural item.

<color=#FBB03F>Parts are needed to craft most items, such as ships and modules, in T2 and higher. Except for the Tier 2 ones, parts are fabricated from the previous Tier.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day08_A_tx.en::
Lazarus Base has informed us that the Tanoch reports on the stolen Progenitor component point towards an infamous pirate group called The Fleet of Rams. We should hunt down Cangacian vessels for more information.

<color=#FBB03F>The Cangacians are pirates that harass trade routes and colonies. We may find them in signals in most areas of the galaxy. They have been sighted raiding mining fleets in asteroid clusters as well.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day08_B_tx.en::
The last item Gideon needs to build his device is in the possession of Catequil, Lieutenant of the Fleet of Rams. We have to find communications data from hostile ships to locate his position.

<color=#FBB03F>When you destroy an enemy vessel, there is a chance that you will gain salvage from that ship. This salvage can be opened in your storage for additional rewards.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day08_C_t1.en::
Our engineers were able to triangulate Catequil's transmission. We must chase him down to attain the last Progenitor component for Gideon.

<color=#FBB03F>The Cangacians are pirates that harass trade routes and colonies. We may find them in signals in most areas of the galaxy. They have been sighted raiding mining fleets in asteroid clusters as well.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day08_C_t2.en::
Our engineers were able to triangulate Catequil's transmission. We must chase him down to attain the last Progenitor component for Gideon.

<color=#FBB03F>The Cangacians are pirates that harass trade routes and colonies. We may find them in signals in most areas of the galaxy. They have been sighted raiding mining fleets in asteroid clusters as well.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day08_C_tx.en::
Our engineers were able to triangulate Catequil's transmission. We must chase him down to attain the last Progenitor component for Gideon.

<color=#FBB03F>Strikes are difficult missions that require a strong fleet from several commanders to beat.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day09_A_t1.en::
While Gideon is finalizing the construction of the Progenitor Negotiator, one of our officers must be trained to utilize it in action.

<color=#FBB03F>Each officer level increases an attribute of that officer by a certain amount. When an officer reaches a new rank, their skill increases or they might even gain a second skill.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day09_A_tx.en::
While Gideon is finalizing the construction of the Progenitor Negotiator, we should increase our fleet's power to protect it in action.

<color=#FBB03F>External modules, such as turrets or sensors, can be upgraded in the External Module screen which will increase their power. Upgrading one level costs credits and RE.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day09_B_t1.en::
We have to fabricate several items to modify a common freighter for Gideon's special operation.

<color=#FBB03F>Small items such as strike craft, modules and parts can be built in the fabricator. Larger items such as escort ships and flagships must be constructed at shipyards provided at larger stations.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day09_B_t2.en::
We have to fabricate several items to modify a common freighter for Gideon's special operation.

<color=#FBB03F>Parts are needed to craft most items, such as ships and modules, in T2 and higher. Except for the Tier 2 ones, parts are fabricated from the previous Tier.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day09_B_tx.en::
Before we embark on Gideon's special operation, we should further increase our fleet's power to ensure we are ready for any eventuality.

<color=#FBB03F>Internal Modules can be upgraded in the Internal Module screen which increases their attributes. Upgrading one level costs credits and RE.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day09_C_t1.en::
We are instructed to perform one final operations readiness test. All forces must be fully prepared for whatever Gideon is planning.

<color=#FBB03F>Signals of higher rarities are hard to find and the enemies are much stronger, but the rewards are better than that of regular signals.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day09_C_tx.en::
We are instructed to perform one final operations readiness test. All forces must be fully prepared for whatever Gideon is planning.

<color=#FBB03F>Strikes are difficult missions that require a strong fleet from several commanders to beat.</color>

desc_qe_anniversary_2023_day10_A_tx.en::
Gideon has finally revealed his plan. From the Progenitor components we collected he constructed a communication device to retake control of Wiracoda Gate. We are trying to go home.
