dia_tanWin_2023_day08_end_1.en:: Commander, we retrieved more communications data between the criminals and Heyoka. We were able to trace his last location to a system called Acatla.

dia_tanWin_2023_day08_end_2.en:: Acatla? How can this be? That is well within Chicuat borders. Commander, I implore you, please investigate immediately!

dia_tanWin_2023_day09_end_1.en:: Hiigaran combat power is impressive, Commander. The Chicuat have always suffered persecution within the Empire. It feels very good to have a powerful ally for once.

dia_tanWin_2023_day09_end_2.en:: We understand the desperation. Only a century ago, we were just six hundred thousand exiles fighting an interstellar empire to retake our lost homeworld. We stand by your side in this conflict.

dia_tanWin_2023_day11_end_1.en:: It has been rumored the Vaygr are sheltering in Tecuban space. I will learn what I can, but these Vaygr have the patrongae of the Emperor. It will be difficult.

dia_tanWin_2023_day11_end_2.en:: The Vaygr are friends of the Emperor? Perhaps this is why the Empire is turning a deaf ear to our current plight. We may be hated, but never has the Empire ignored us as they have in this time.

dia_tanWin_2023_day12_end_1.en:: Commander, we are not finding any hard evidence of the Vaygr's activity around these systems. We're only picking up whispered rumors among the locals.

dia_tanWin_2023_day12_end_2.en:: The people have been through a lot lately. They're scared and uncertain. We'll need to gain their trust if we want to get someone to talk.

dia_tanWin_2023_day13_end_1.en:: Commander, our plan to gain the trust of the local people has worked. Our best lead comes from a nearby outpost.

dia_tanWin_2023_day13_end_2.en:: That is great news. They claim to have information that could match our description of the Vaygr. But they want us to help them with something before they hand it over.

dia_tanWin_2023_day14_end_1.en:: Commander, we received the information from the locals. It seems someone overheard a frigate crew boasting about working for powerful outsiders. This could be the Vaygr!

dia_tanWin_2023_day14_end_2.en:: I'm glad we could do something for the local people. Let's hunt down the Vaygr now and find out what they are scheming with the Tecuban!

dia_tanWin_2023_day15_end_1.en:: Commander, onboard one of these vessels we found communications data with a Vaygr frequency. This is the lead we've been waiting for.

dia_tanWin_2023_day15_end_2.en:: It's disturbing how many here are drawn to Vaygr promises of power, though I am not surprised. The Tecuban have even less than we do, and have more to gain from such an alliance.

dia_tanWin_2023_day17_end_1.en:: Commander, I've expended every avenue to gather more information. To probe further would risk my position, and I cannot help my people if I'm dismissed from my post. I'm sorry I can't be of more help.

dia_tanWin_2023_day17_end_2.en:: Even our allies in the Empire can no longer help us. What does Jochik have to gain through brutalizing my people? What does he want?

dia_tanWin_2023_day17_end_3.en:: My friends, if the answer can't be aquired through proper channels we should turn to the local markets. Let the power of coin open the door between you and the answer you seek.

dia_tanWin_2023_day18_end_1.en:: It's a deal, friends! A reputable source claims to have spoken to Jochik himself. He's seeking a very specific relic from the Makers, though I did not catch it's specifics.

dia_tanWin_2023_day18_end_2.en:: My people have hidden many objects of the Makers we retain for study and safekeeping. Jochik delivers pain, suffering, and ruin to my people all to attain an object of the Makers? Monster!

dia_tanWin_2023_day19_end_1.en:: Commander, we found a lot of data logs concerning Progenitor objects on these ships. We'll need to process them quickly. I'm sending them to the lab now.

dia_tanWin_2023_day19_end_2.en:: At your service, Commander. What a fascinating quantity of data. I'll do my best to come up with answers as soon as possible.

dia_tanWin_2023_day20_end_1.en:: Commander, the Tecuban raiders are well armed and confident. Heyoka and Jochik must be coordinating closely for this operation.

dia_tanWin_2023_day20_end_2.en:: All of this carngae for the greed of one and the ambition of the other! We must stop them, my people cannot withstand their assault for much longer!

dia_tanWin_2023_day21_end_1.en:: Thanks for your assistance, Commander. With the provided information, I was able to pinpoint the particular object in question. Jochik is seeking a very rare object the Tanoch call a Baetyl.

dia_tanWin_2023_day21_end_2.en:: Curse the Vaygr! They're after the Baetyl? It's placed at the Tlapallan Academy. It's one of our most populated learning centers! We must inform the Elders immediately!

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day01_end_1.en:: Hello, good friend! After some prying, I've learned Cangacian pirates have been hired by my fellows to raid some Yaot Pilgrims entering the area. What more, I cannot say.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day01_end_2.en:: Yaot pilgrims in the Empty Quarter? Commander, this might be of interest to Hiigaran security. We should find out more about what's going on.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day02_end_1.en:: Greetings, friend! My fellow tradesmen, of course, say nothing to me about their plans. But plenty of Cangacian marauders were eager to boast of their exploits.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day02_end_2.en:: Commander, the pirates believe there is valuable treasure on the Yaot pilgrim ships. But for now they were only able to capture basic civilian goods.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day03_end_1.en:: Commander, we can't find any traces of the Yaot pilgrimage. The area is swarming with pirates. They must know something we don't.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day04_end_1.en:: Commander, some of the containers we've recovered have casualties. Many were deceased, but we also recovered survivors in critical condition.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day04_end_2.en:: This is abhorrent... these can only be Yaot civilians! I am ordering them taken to medical away.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day05_end_1.en:: Commander, we talked to the Yaot survivors. They were indeed part of the pilgrimage. They gave us their normal comm frequency, so we can contact the formation leader directly.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day05_end_2.en:: A warm blessing to you, Hiigarans. I am Chocoan Coatl, Envoy of the Yaot Federation and Shepard of this Conjunction. I thank you for saving the lives of my fellow pilgrims.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day05_end_3.en:: Greetings Envoy Coatl. We greet you on behalf of the Hiigaran colonies in this area. Your pilgrimage has caused an uprising of pirate activity here. Our authorities are worried about the security situation.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day05_end_4.en:: We are but simple Pilgrims Commander, bound by our faith to visit conjunctions seen in our sky. Until now we had no need for escort, for none took an interest in our mission. This seems to have changed without reason.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day05_end_5.en:: Commander, we can't leave these civilians defenseless against the pirates. It's unethical to stand by and allow it, we must help them.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day06_end_1.en:: Blessings, Hiigarans. You have my thanks for these parts for our vessels. I am seeing to their distribution now.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day06_end_2.en:: Commander, as requested we have tracked the delivery of the provided parts. It seems like some ships are clearly being prioritized over others.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day06_end_3.en:: Interesting. Could these be the treasure ships the pirates were talking about? We need to find out more.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day07_end_1.en:: Commander, we have a direct communication from the Cangacian pirates.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day07_end_2.en:: You continue to meddle in affairs that are none of your business! I will have my treasure, and you will stop foiling my plans!

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day07_end_3.en:: Treasure? What treasure could be aboard these civilian ships? Have you no conscience terrorizing the innocent?

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day07_end_4.en:: Innocent? You Hiigarans are so naive with your trust it's offensive. If you stand in my way again, I will crush you along with these charlatans you defend!

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day08_end_1.en:: You gift us with your compassion, commander. Most would not go out of their way to defend a stranger.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day08_end_2.en:: We Hiigarans were once nearly defenseless refugees ourselves. But what is this pilgrimage, what drives you?

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day08_end_3.en:: Our people have made these voyages for centuries. Our history tells us great events coincide with the conjunctions, which must be witnessed. Some of them tell us of the presence of the Makers among us still.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day08_end_4.en:: This is fascinating... but I don't understand why your group would be targeted. Do you carry something special when observing the conjunction? An artifact of some kind?

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day08_end_5.en:: I'm afraid details such as these... must remain unspoken for now. I have much work to do, coordinating with the Elders. We will speak again.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day09_end_1.en:: Hiigaran commander, we have received your request for further information. The Yaot Federation cannot comment on the pilgrimages of the conjunctions. This is strictly a civilian affair, and outside the official business of the Federation. Good day.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day09_end_2.en:: That seemed unusually terse. We might need to think outside the box and find our other contacts for further information.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day10_end_1.en:: Hello Commander! Thank you for the artifact, this will buy the information you seek. You're looking for more information on these conjunction pilgrimages?

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day10_end_2.en:: Yes. We're protecting the civilian pilgrims on their travels. Many believe some sort of treasure among their ships. We suspect some kind of involvement from the Yaot Elders.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day10_end_3.en:: Interesting. Our intelligence concurs with your assessment. We have also suspected the Yaot have some other purpose behind these pilgrimages, something that has direct oversight from their council of Elders.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day10_end_4.en:: Could this be some secret agenda by their leadership? Are they searching for something? Searching for treasures?

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day10_end_5.en:: The only other thing I can tell you is that our scouts detected ruins of the Makers there previously. What they do with them, we don't know. Good hunting!

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day11_end_1.en:: Commander, we've picked up a classified investigation report on the Yaot pilgrimage from one of the hostile vessels. Decryption process initiated.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day11_end_2.en:: Most interesting. This is a detailed report on the procedure of the pilgrim's convoy at astral conjunction events. I want this evaluated as quickly as possible!

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day12_end_1.en:: Commander, we've collected ore from the asteroids near the astral conjunction site. The material is transferred into the laboratory to be examined.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day12_end_2.en:: Commander, I have been monitoring the situation and I will assist in the examination. If there is anything here involving the Progenitors, I will find it.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day13_end_1.en:: Blessings upon you, Commander. My people wish to convey their deepest thanks for your assistance. We are ready to engage the conjunction event in Ze Tavaan. May the Makers be with us.

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day13_end_2.en:: Envoy Coatl, this is Cangacian territory. It is almost certain the Cancagians will be waiting there in ambush. Is this event really so important to your people's faith that it's worth risking their lives?

dia_yaoSpr_2024_day13_end_3.en:: The decision... is not mine to make. We are guided by the wisdom of the Elders. But should you wish to provide escort, the people would be relieved to know we are under your protection.

dia_amaSum_2024_day01_end_1.en:: Donating these parts has granted us a lot of goodwill from the local Amassari. At least we've managed to convince them we're not the Kiithless.

dia_amaSum_2024_day02_end_1.en:: Most of what we've found isn't Progenitor... but Hagthar. Artifacts we've brought aboard date to the time of the Amassari's ancestors.

dia_amaSum_2024_day02_end_2.en:: This must be what the Kiithless are doing here: Attacking the Amassari to steal relics belonging to the Amassari's forebears. We need to put a stop to it.

dia_amaSum_2024_day03_end_1.en:: Hiigarans! I am Jothru Omassi. The Sadosar Amassari have chosen me to be an envoy to you during your stay here. I request permission to board and share my knowledge.

dia_amaSum_2024_day03_end_2.en:: An Amassari guide could be useful if we're spending more time here. I've already assigned lodgings for him and he's being directed to medical for an examination now.

dia_amaSum_2024_day04_end_1.en:: Your people have been most helpful to us in ways other Amassari are not. Many fear what the outsiders could bring to us, but there are many who celebrate your presence also.

dia_amaSum_2024_day05_end_1.en:: It's going to be a long and intense operation in order to find these things. I feel better having the ship ready for this expedition.

dia_amaSum_2024_day06_end_1.en:: The Hagthar pretty thoroughly blew their technology into dust during their ancient war. There's not much left to go on. What we found might have more cultural significance than technical...

dia_amaSum_2024_day07_end_1.en:: Hiigarans that don't originate from one of the original Kiith are not only iconoclasts, but they employ some radical strategies. It was useful in our war against the Vaygr, but it's coming at a cost now.

dia_amaSum_2024_day08_end_1.en:: These leads also brought us closer to some Hagthar technological patches. Engineering has pulled up some debris we happened to pass and thinks there might be something important we can deduce from it.

dia_amaSum_2024_day09_end_1.en:: One of the important lessons taught in the fleet academy is to make sure resources are plentiful. There's no worse place than being caught without any RUs to spend when we need it.

dia_amaSum_2024_day10_end_1.en:: The Sulasu family are one of the only Nacarid Amassari open to accepting bribes from outsiders. I assue you, they were just as pleased to accept your help as well as your target assignment list.

dia_amaSum_2024_day11_end_1.en:: We're just in time. New intelligence points to the Kiithless restructuring their supplies in the region in order to regain their footing. If we hit them now, we might be able to break their resolve in the Hather plains.

dia_amaSum_2024_day12_end_1.en:: Well done, but the Kiithless aren't done yet. We received word that mobile assets pulled out just before our strikes. They're planning something with their saved assets.

dia_amaSum_2024_day13_end_1.en:: We're stocked and ready for whatever the Kiithless have in store for us.

dia_amaSum_2024_day14_end_1.en:: Intelligence suggests the Kiithless were attempting to piece together a Hagthar navigational computer, and they've deduced they need a final piece.

dia_amaSum_2024_day14_end_2.en:: They're after Thassin's Needle. Only three have ever been found. To my people, they represent a better future that could be.

dia_amaSum_2024_day14_end_3.en:: We must protect this at all costs.

dia_amaSum_2024_day15_end_1.en:: That was the last, desperate reach of the Kiithless. They'll need to regroup for a while before they can challenge the Amassari again.

dia_amaSum_2024_day15_end_2.en:: It is a thing to raise a hand in defense of another Amassari, but another to respect our herritage. I wish to join your crew commander, I have many talents to offer beyond Amassari space.

desc_trader_pay_tX.en:: Provide the Iyatequa with valuable materials.

desc_tanoch_pay_tX.en:: Help the Tanoch reinforce their fleets with resources.

desc_yaot_pay_tX.en:: Provide the Yaot with raw materials.

desc_amassari_pay_tX.en:: Provide the Amassari with raw materials.

desc_tr1_donation_refined_tX.en:: Provide the Iyatequa with valuable materials.

desc_tan_donation_refined_tX.en:: Help the Tanoch reinforce their fleets with resources.

desc_yao_donation_refined_tX.en:: Provide the Yaot with raw materials.

desc_ama_donation_refined_tX.en:: Provide the Amassari with raw materials.

desc_tr1_single_missions_tX.en:: Remove pirates and other hostiles from Iyatequa trade routes.

desc_tr1_double_missions_tX.en:: Remove pirates and other hostiles from Iyatequa trade routes.

desc_tan_single_missions_tX.en:: Help the Tanoch make the galaxy a safer place.

desc_tan_double_missions_tX.en:: Help the Tanoch make the galaxy a safer place.

desc_yao_single_missions_tX.en:: Patrol the Yaot territory and look out for hostiles.

desc_yao_double_missions_tX.en:: Patrol the Yaot territory and look out for hostiles.

desc_ama_single_missions_tX.en:: Patrol the Amassari territory and look out for hostiles.

desc_ama_double_missions_tX.en:: Patrol the Amassari territory and look out for hostiles.

desc_tr1_destroy_p1_tX.en:: The Iyatequa will pay bounty for destroyed Cangacian vessels.

desc_tr1_destroy_vgr_tX.en:: For reasons unknown the Iyatequa have put out a bounty on Vaygr ships. It seems that they may have pissed off the traders.

desc_tr1_double_random_tX.en:: Remove pirates and other hostiles from Iyatequa trade routes.

desc_tr1_single_basicDestroy_tX.en:: Raiders from the a local warlord are operating in the area and attacking local shipping. To increase regional security, you are to attack enemy ships found in the area.

desc_tr1_double_basicDestroy_tX.en:: Raiders from the a local warlord are operating in the area and attacking local shipping. To increase regional security, you are to attack enemy ships found in the area.

desc_tr1_single_lostCargo_tX.en:: A passing freighter suffered a major containment breach in one of their holds, dumping their cargo in a large area. There’s a reward out there for collection and retrieval of the payload.

desc_tr1_single_platDef_tX.en:: A local planet is looking to hire a militia to defend some orbital platforms from an expected attack.

desc_tr1_single_escort_tX.en:: An escort contract is up to protect an Iyatequa trading group. They pay well, and likely the civilians visiting them would appreciate some reliable protection.

desc_tr1_single_bounty_tX.en:: An anonymous client has raised a bounty against Cangacian ships under the Fleet of Rams flag. Seems like someone was willing to pay for reliable opposition against their raids.

desc_tr1_single_defendBase_tX.en:: Another space station has refused the terms of the Fleet of Rams. They’re expecting to be attacked very soon for this defiance, and are asking for any help to assist them in fending off the attack.

desc_tan_destroy_p1_tX.en:: The Tanoch always have a listed bounty for Cangacian vessels.

desc_tan_destroy_yao_tX.en:: The Tanoch Empire has an open bounty upon any Yaot invaders in their space.

desc_tan_destroy_vgr_tX.en:: The Chicuat Tanoch have put out a contract specifically to hunt Vaygr in this area. Our interests are aligned.

desc_tan_double_random_tX.en:: Help the Tanoch make the galaxy a safer place.

desc_tan_single_basicDestroy_tX.en:: The Tanoch Imperial fleet is stretched thin, and a local power is seeking to hire mercenaries to attack roaming ships preying on shipping in the area.

desc_tan_double_basicDestroy_tX.en:: The Tanoch Imperial fleet is stretched thin, and a local power is seeking to hire mercenaries to attack roaming ships preying on shipping in the area.

desc_tan_single_lostCargo_tX.en:: Loose cargo has been identified in a marked location. The owner has come forward to claim them but wishes to hire a party to recover the cargo for them.

desc_tan_single_platDef_tX.en:: Bold raiders have been making threats against a planet held by the Chicuat Tanoch. No Imperial assistance is offered, so they are looking for help.

desc_tan_single_escort_tX.en:: A Tanoch official is paying a very high price in order to secure an escort more capable than the Imperial fleet.

desc_tan_single_bounty_tX.en:: The Tecuban Tanoch raids have started up again. The Chicuat Tanoch have pooled together to offer a bounty to put a stop to it.

desc_tan_single_defendBase_tX.en:: A distress call has been received from a Chicuat Tanoch station, reporting they are under attack and their defenses are crumbling. We must move to assist!

desc_yao_destroy_p1_tX.en:: The Yaot will pay for pirates removed from their operational areas.

desc_yao_destroy_tan_tX.en:: The Yaot have extended a bounty to freelancers against any Tanoch ships sighted in their space.

desc_yao_destroy_vgr_tX.en:: Vaygr ships spotted among the Yaot is reason for concern that the two powers may begin colluding. Attacking them could give the Vaygr second thoughts.

desc_yao_double_random_tX.en:: Patrol the Yaot territory and look out for hostiles.

desc_yao_single_basicDestroy_tX.en:: A privateer group has been given their last warning to cease raids against Yaot shipping. Now someone is willing to pay the bounty to enforce the penalty.

desc_yao_double_basicDestroy_tX.en:: A privateer group has been given their last warning to cease raids against Yaot shipping. Now someone is willing to pay the bounty to enforce the penalty.

desc_yao_single_lostCargo_tX.en:: A Yaot shipping company is asking for help recovering cargo from a freighter that went missing in this vicinity. There’s a bounty for returning the cargo intact.

desc_yao_single_platDef_tX.en:: A Yaot settlement is being threatened by a hostile force. They are seeking assistance from any ship willing to defend them in need of credits.

desc_yao_single_escort_tX.en:: A Yaot civilian group is putting up a monetary offer to any commander who is willing to escort them safely through a dangerous area of space.

desc_yao_single_bounty_tX.en:: An offer is posted from the Yaot Council of Elder to attack a specific group of ships, thought to be dissidents.

desc_yao_single_defendBase_tX.en:: A Yaot civilian commercial station is coming under attack from a raiding party. Proceed there to assist in the defense!

desc_ama_destroy_prog_tX.en:: The Amassari are willing to pay to clear any progenitor sites of hostile drones.

desc_ama_destroy_hgd_tX.en:: The Amassari have extended a bounty against any looting Hiigarans found in their space.

desc_ama_double_random_tX.en:: Patrol the Amassari territory and look out for hostiles.

desc_ama_single_basicDestroy_tX.en:: Amassari from the Nacarid family, for reasons unknown, are stepping up raids against fellow Amassari. There’s a reward posted for attacking them.

desc_ama_double_basicDestroy_tX.en:: Amassari from the Nacarid family, for reasons unknown, are stepping up raids against fellow Amassari. There’s a reward posted for attacking them.

desc_ama_single_lostCargo_tX.en:: The Amassari have good information on valuable salvage located in a particular area. The first to retrieve it can claim a substantial reward.

desc_ama_single_platDef_tX.en:: Few Amassari posts have defense installations, making them targets for increased attack. An Amassari group wants to fend off an incoming surge against them.

desc_ama_single_escort_tX.en:: A convoy of the Thant Amassari family has requested special protection.

desc_ama_single_bounty_tX.en:: Some Amassari are becoming resentful of outsiders in their space. There is a bounty for attacking outsiders or those who are associating with them.

desc_ama_single_defendBase_tX.en:: One of the rare and valuable space habitats belonging to the Amassari has been targeted by scavengers. The inhabitants are requesting help from anyone who can assist.

desc_tr1_donation_relic_tX.en:: There is always a buyer for Progenitor relics. The Iyatequa have connections. Find Progenitor Relics in relic signature signals and bring them back to the Iyatequa.

desc_tan_donation_relic_tX.en:: The Tanoch revere the Progenitors, and reward anyone who safely brings them a relic. Find Progenitor Relics in relic signature signals and bring them back to the Tanoch.

desc_yao_donation_relic_tX.en:: The Yaot are looking for any advantage they can get in their war with the Tanoch. Progenitor technology might just give them that edge. Find Progenitor Relics in relic signature signals and bring them back to the Yaot.

desc_ama_donation_relic_tX.en:: The Amassari are always on the lookout for integrating new technologies and parts into their fleets. Progenitor relics are especially sought after. Find Progenitor Relics in relic signature signals and bring them back to the Amassari.

desc_tr1_donation_collectable_u_tx.en::
The Iyatequa freely accept and trade in perceptively dead currencies and items. Nothing goes to waste with these traders, everything has a use.

<color=#FBB03F>Dead currency can be found in lost caches within Iyatequa territory or in Cangacian salvage.</color>

desc_tan_donation_collectable_u_tx.en::
History of the deep past is a constantly shifting subject. Icons like this can help the Tanoch gain a more tangible connection to their lost history.

<color=#FBB03F>Religious icons can be found in lost caches within Tanoch territory or in Cangacian salvage.</color>

desc_yao_donation_collectable_u_tx.en::
Entire generations have been lost to deep space in the various wars between the Yaot and the Tanoch Empires. The Yaot would pay dearly to bring back anything from these lost sons and daughters.

<color=#FBB03F>Tokens of the eldest can be found in lost caches within Yaot territory or in Cangacian salvage.</color>

desc_ama_donation_collectable_u_tx.en::
The Amassari prize personal connections to the past, and so take a great interest in these mundane mementos of the wealthy from their ancestors.

<color=#FBB03F>Talent Murals can be found in lost caches within Amassari territory or in Kiithless salvage.</color>

desc_trader_missions_tX.en:: Remove pirates and other hostiles from Iyatequa trade routes.

desc_tanoch_missions_tX.en:: Help the Tanoch make the galaxy a safer place.

desc_yaot_missions_tX.en:: Patrol the Yaot territory and look out for hostiles.

desc_amassari_missions_tX.en:: Patrol the Amassari territory and look out for hostiles.

desc_tr1_pvp_hiigaran_tX.en:: Increase your reputation as an able body guard by fighting against other Hiigarans.

desc_tan_pvp_hiigaran_tX.en:: Increase your reputation as an able captain by fighting against other Hiigarans.

desc_yao_pvp_hiigaran_tX.en:: Increase your reputation as an able warrior by fighting against other Hiigarans.

desc_ama_pvp_hiigaran_tX.en:: Increase your reputation as an able warrior by fighting against other Hiigarans.

desc_clan_pay_tX.en:: If our clan is to grow, we need to support it with materials.

desc_clan_pay_gas_tX.en:: If our clan is to grow, we need to support it with materials.

desc_clan_pay_moon_tX.en:: If our clan is to grow, we need to support it with materials.

desc_clan_missions_tX.en:: Patrol the clan's territory to secure its safety.

desc_clan_destroy_tX.en:: Pirates and other unwanted individuals are disrupting trading routes and extort colonies. A bounty has been put on their head.

desc_clan_destroy_prog_tX.en:: The Progenitors may be long gone, but their ships still hold valuable technology.

desc_clan_pvp_tX.en:: The other clans are testing their strength against each other. We should should them that we are no pushovers.

test_dialog_gary.en:: Do you know a guy named Chris? He's just the best!

test_dialog_wip.en:: This mission is currently under construction. Please come back later.

default_finish_mission_succ.en:: Excellent work! We are ready to leave on your command.

default_finish_mission_fail.en:: Critical Mission Failure! Jumping to safe distance.

preGame_dialog_selectKiith_1.en:: Welcome Commander! Please <color=#FBB03F>state your Kiith (faction)</color> before we begin.

preGame_dialog_selectKiith_2.en:: Good Morning Commander, all of the basic check out and we're ready to begin...

attack_start_1.en:: Hostile ships have locked on to us. Bringing the ship to battle stations.

attack_nextwave_1.en:: A new hostile group has entered the region. Prepare for contact.

attack_finish_1.en:: Hostile ships destroyed, the area is secure.

attack_finish_2.en:: Hostile fleet destroyed! It will take some time for them to come back.

attack_failure_1.en:: Hostile ships are fleeing, but they will be back soon!

desc_station_tr1_name.en:: A common trading station, offering shipyard and refitting services.

desc_station_hgn_name.en:: A common trading station, offering shipyard and refitting services.

desc_station_tan_name.en:: A common trading station, offering shipyard and refitting services.

desc_station_yao_name.en:: A common trading station, offering shipyard and refitting services.

desc_station_ama_name.en:: A common trading station, offering shipyard and refitting services.

desc_station_p1_name.en:: A safe haven for anyone that pays. As long as money is changing hands, everybody is safe.

station_hgn_start_dialog_1.en:: Welcome back, Commander - the shipyard is awaiting your build tasks. While you wait for these to finish, you could visit the station market.

station_tr1_start_dialog_1.en:: Welcome, Hiigaran! We just recently upgraded our shipyard - we'd be happy if you commission a new ship. And while you wait, browse through the market or visit our other amenities.

station_tan_start_dialog_1.en:: Hiigaran Flagship - You may use our shipyard for new commissions, or visit our market. If you want, you can meet our local delegate in their liaison office or visit the requisitions.

station_yao_start_dialog_1.en:: To the Hiigaran flagship: You are allowed to use our shipyard and visit the market. It is recommended you also pay a visit to the liaison office, or review our requisitions.

station_ama_start_dialog_1.en:: Hiigaran - greetings! You have come a far way from home, so please, visit our market to see what we have on offer. We would also be happy to build a ship for you in our shipyard.

safeHaven_start_dialog_1.en:: To the incoming ship: This is a neutral zone. Keep your weapons cold - and everyone can go their own way.

desc_outpost_tr1_name.en:: A small outpost, providing limited services only.

desc_outpost_hgn_name.en:: A small outpost, providing limited services only.

desc_outpost_tan_name.en:: A small outpost, providing limited services only.

desc_outpost_yao_name.en:: A small outpost, providing limited services only.

desc_outpost_ama_name.en:: A small outpost, providing limited services only.

outpost_hgn_start_dialog_1.en:: Welcome back, Commander - If you need ship services, please visit Lazarus station as we do not have a shipyard. We do however have a market.

outpost_tr1_start_dialog_1.en:: Welcome, Hiigaran! We do not offer any ship services as we don't have a shipyard - you must go to a system with a station. But, please, visit our other amenities.

outpost_tan_start_dialog_1.en:: To the Hiigaran flagship: If you seek a shipyard for services, you need to visit a larger station. If you want to browse our market or our liaison office, be our guest.

outpost_yao_start_dialog_1.en:: Incoming vessel: We do not offer any shipyard services. If you want to manufacture ships you need to go to a station. We do however offer missions in our liaison office.

outpost_ama_start_dialog_1.en:: Greetings, commander! Welcome to our little outpost. We only have some local wares at our market, for more services please visit a nearby station.

desc_belt_name.en:: A cluster of resource rich asteroids.

desc_belt_01_A_pvp_tX.en:: A cluster of asteroids under competing territorial claims. Anyone may attack anyone in this area.

desc_jovian_name.en:: Huge jovian gas giant, containing valuable gases.

Jovian_dialog_start_1.en:: Attention Commander, the atmosphere of gas giants is <color=#FBB03F>extremely hazardous</color> for all non-specialized ships.

desc_signal_BasicDestroy_p1_name.en:: Signals from pirate ships have been detected. Prepare for battle!

desc_signal_BasicDestroy_tan_name.en:: Signals from tanoch ships have been detected. Prepare for battle!

desc_signal_BasicDestroy_tec_name.en:: Signals from Tecuban ships have been detected. Prepare for battle!

desc_signal_BasicDestroy_chicuat_name.en:: Signals from Chicuat ships have been detected. Prepare for battle!

desc_signal_BasicDestroy_kpr_name.en:: Signals from progenitor vessels have been detected. Prepare for battle!

desc_signal_BasicDestroy_yao_name.en:: Signals from yaot ships have been detected. Prepare for battle!

desc_signal_BasicDestroy_sap_name.en:: Signals from Sapa Yaot ships have been detected. Prepare for battle!

desc_signal_BasicDestroy_ama_name.en:: Signals from Amassari ships have been detected. Prepare for battle!

desc_signal_BasicDestroy_nac_name.en:: Signals from Amassari Nacarid ships have been detected. Prepare for battle!

desc_signal_BasicDestroy_hgd_name.en:: Signals from Kiithless ships have been detected. Prepare for battle!

desc_signal_BasicDestroy_vgr_name.en:: Signals from Vaygr ships have been detected. Prepare for battle!

destroy_start_1.en:: Targets detected. Prepare for combat, all ships are on alert.

destroy_nextwave_1.en:: Hostile ships emerging from hyperspace. Prepare for contact!

destroy_finish_1.en:: Enemy ships neutralized! Objectives are completed here.

desc_signal_Rescue_hgn_name.en:: Our sensors have detected a Hiigaran distress signal.

desc_signal_Rescue_tr1_name.en:: Our sensors have detected a Iyatequa distress signal.

desc_signal_Rescue_tan_name.en:: Our sensors have detected a Tanoch distress signal.

desc_signal_Rescue_yao_name.en:: Our sensors have detected a Yaot distress signal.

desc_signal_Rescue_ama_name.en:: Our sensors have detected an Amassari distress signal.

Rescue_dialog_intro_hgn_1.en:: Mayday, mayday. We're under attack. Requesting immediate assistance.

Rescue_dialog_intro_tr1_1.en:: This cargo vessel is under attack. Assistance requested.

Rescue_dialog_intro_tan_1.en:: Imperial transport under attack! Requesting immediate assistance!

Rescue_dialog_intro_yao_1.en:: Cargo convoy under attack. Mayday, Mayday!

Rescue_dialog_intro_ama_1.en:: To any who listen, we are under attack!

Rescue_dialog_hostiles_1.en:: Another wave is approaching. Protect the civilian ship!

Rescue_dialog_allyLow_tr1_1.en:: This vessel is almost spent, expedite assistance!

Rescue_dialog_allyLow_tan_1.en:: Fire on all decks! The hull is breached! Please help us!

Rescue_dialog_allyLow_ama_1.en:: Our hull is almost breached! Do something!

Rescue_dialog_win_hgn_1.en:: Thanks for the assist. Take this as a thank you.

Rescue_dialog_win_tr1_1.en:: The assistance is welcome. Mercantile compensation is granted to you.

Rescue_dialog_win_tan_1.en:: Thank you for your help! Please accept this gift and don't tell anyone where you got it.

Rescue_dialog_win_yao_1.en:: Peace, Commander. Take a little something from us, in thanks.

Rescue_dialog_win_ama_1.en:: Many thanks, Commander. Take what little we can spare out of gratitude.

Rescue_dialog_fail_1.en:: The civilian ship is lost... We failed to protect them.

desc_signal_Relic_name.en:: We've detected a progenitor signal source, possibly guarded by hostile ships.

Relic_dialog_intro_1.en:: Commander, the Relic is detected ahead. Proceed carefully, relics like these are always well defended.

Relic_dialog_position_1.en:: We’ve located the Progenitor relic. Hostiles incoming, prepare to engage the defenders.

Relic_dialog_wave_1.en:: More hostile craft emerging from hyperspace.

Relic_dialog_fin_1.en:: The relic has been retrieved and is being examined in the hangar now.

desc_signal_MiningAttack_p1_name.en:: We've detected Cangacian signals inside an asteroid cluster.

desc_signal_MiningAttack_hgd_name.en:: We've detected Kiithless signals inside an asteroid cluster.

MiningAttack_dialog_intro_1.en:: Engaging hostile mining operation. We have to act fast before the pirates escape to hyperspace with their mining vessels.

MiningAttack_dialog_killLastController_1.en:: The sector is clear of enemy mining vessels. Let's mop up the rest of the pirates.

MiningAttack_dialog_escapeController_1.en:: All enemy miners have been destroyed or escaped the combat zone. Let's mop up the rest of the pirates and clear the area.

MiningAttack_dialog_win_1.en:: Last hostile craft destroyed. Mining sector secured.

desc_signal_ProgenitorActivities_name.en:: Sensors indicate an active Progenitor derelict close. We should destroy it to stop Progenitor attacks.

progenitorActivities_start_1.en:: Sensors indicate that an active Progenitor derelict is in this sector, controlling several movers and drones. We need to destroy the derelict to end the Progenitor activity.

progenitorActivities_nextwave_1.en:: The derelict is launching another wave of drones and movers!

progenitorActivities_powerup_1.en:: Commander, we are reading strange energy signals from the derelict. We need to destroy it as quickly as possible!

progenitorActivities_destroyed_1.en:: We destroyed the derelict. We should destroy the remaining hostiles to clear this sector.

progenitorActivities_fail_1.en:: Commander, a Progenitor Keeper is arriving to defend the derelict! We have to leave or we will be destroyed!

progenitorActivities_victory_1.en:: All remaining ships are destroyed, Commander. This area should be safe again now.

travelingTrader_start_dialog_1.en:: Greetings Hiigarans! We have some special wares for sale. Take a look!

AttackBase_dialog_intro_p1_1.en:: Commander, we should be careful approaching a defended position like this. Even pirates are likely to have something prepared.

AttackBase_dialog_alert_p1_1.en:: Commander, we're being illuminated by active targeting. Hostile craft approaching.

AttackBase_dialog_wave_p1_1.en:: Seems like the pirates had a reserve. They're entering the area now.

AttackBase_dialog_win_p1_1.en:: Area secure. Since we've cleaned out this nest, it will help sector security for a while.

AttackBase_dialog_intro_ama_1.en:: One thing we've learned about the Amassari is how jealously they protect their spare parts. Proceed carefully.

AttackBase_dialog_alert_ama_1.en:: Intercepting enemy alert signal. Hostiles incoming.

AttackBase_dialog_wave_ama_1.en:: Another hostile Amassari fleet has appeared from hyperspace to reinforce this position.

AttackBase_dialog_win_ama_1.en:: Mission complete. Breaking up this raider's camp will help the rest of the Amassari here rest easy.

AttackBase_dialog_intro_tan_1.en:: This Tecuban base has been launching raiders into the vicinity to prey on undefended ship traffic. This has to stop.

AttackBase_dialog_alert_tan_1.en:: Commander, they've spotted us. Hostile ships inbound.

AttackBase_dialog_wave_tan_1.en:: Looks like their raiding parties returned early. Prepare defenses!

AttackBase_dialog_win_tan_1.en:: Base destroyed! I don't think they'll be back anytime soon. Local traffic should proceed safely.

AttackBase_dialog_intro_yao_1.en:: Commander, this dissident base is threatening the security of the Yaot federation. Engage with caution.

AttackBase_dialog_alert_yao_1.en:: Nearby vessels are targeting us. We're under attack!

AttackBase_dialog_wave_yao_1.en:: A hostile fleet has appeared. They're preparing to attack!

AttackBase_dialog_win_yao_1.en:: Base destroyed. I can't help wondering if Yaot internal security is playing us for something. We're getting paid all the same, though.

DefendBase_dialog_firstWave_1.en:: Commander, the first wave of attacks is approaching. Be ready!

DefendBase_dialog_fail_1.en:: Commander, the station's collapsed! I'm not receiving any further signals, we have to retreat!

DefendBase_dialog_intro_tr1_1.en:: Splendid, you're just in time. Form up and prepare to fend off the assault. Protect the beacon, we're requesting more aid as we speak.

DefendBase_dialog_beaconDown_tr1_1.en:: The beacon is lost, reinforcements are now impossible.

DefendBase_dialog_reinforcements_tr1_1.en:: Allied forces have arrived. All commanders engage and clear the area.

DefendBase_dialog_stationLow_tr1_1.en:: Our hull integrity is dropping. The station can't withstand much more.

DefendBase_dialog_win_tr1_1.en:: Your assistance was timely. Compensation is being arranged for your presence in our defense.

DefendBase_dialog_intro_tan_1.en:: Hiigarans! Praise the Makers! We anticipate an attack by the Yaot and our fleet is too far to respond. We need any help we can get.

DefendBase_dialog_beaconDown_tan_1.en:: We've lost the beacon. We're cut off from reinforcements.

DefendBase_dialog_reinforcements_tan_1.en:: Reinforcements have arrived. Hold the line and beat the attackers back!

DefendBase_dialog_stationLow_tan_1.en:: Commander, our station has lost a main structural support. We can't hold up much longer, do something!

DefendBase_dialog_win_tan_1.en:: Our gratitude knows no bounds for your compassion today. Thank you, Commander. May the Makers smile upon your efforts!

DefendBase_dialog_intro_yao_1.en:: Commander, we require assistance! Our fleet is too far to respond and the Tanoch are about to attack our position.

DefendBase_dialog_beaconDown_yao_1.en:: The signal beacon was destroyed. Our defense forces won't be able to send reinforcements.

DefendBase_dialog_reinforcements_yao_1.en:: Our forces have finally arrived. Coordinate the defenses and repel the attackers!

DefendBase_dialog_stationLow_yao_1.en:: Commander, our outer hull is buckling and we're losing atmosphere. The station can't last much longer!

DefendBase_dialog_win_yao_1.en:: No hostiles remaining on our scopes. Thanks for the assist, Commander. Many lives are grateful for your presence!

DefendBase_dialog_intro_ama_1.en:: Thank you for responding to our call, Commander. We expect attacks by hostile Hiigarans! Please assist our defense.

DefendBase_dialog_stationLow_ama_1.en:: We've lost the station's outer habitat pods. Our docking facilities are in disrepair. We can't escape, please help!

DefendBase_dialog_win_ama_1.en:: You prove your nobility over those who would steal your name. We are grateful for your assistance!

DefendBase_dialog_firstWave_kprEvent_1.en:: Commander, the first wave of Progenitor craft are approaching. Be ready!

DefendBase_dialog_fail_kprEvent_1.en:: Commander, the station's collapsed! I'm not receiving any further signals, we have to retreat!

DefendBase_dialog_intro_tr1_kprEvent_1.en:: Splendid, you're just in time. Form up and prepare to fend off the assault. Protect the beacon, we're requesting more aid as we speak.

DefendBase_dialog_beaconDown_tr1_kprEven.en:: The beacon is lost, reinforcements are now impossible.

DefendBase_dialog_reinforcements_tr1_kpr.en:: Allied forces have arrived. All commanders engage and clear the area.

DefendBase_dialog_stationLow_tr1_kprEven.en:: Our hull integrity is dropping. The station can't withstand much more.

DefendBase_dialog_win_tr1_kprEvent_1.en:: The Makers have been driven off. Thank you, for coming to our aid in these trying times. We shall compensate you for your effort.

DefendBase_dialog_intro_p1_kprEvent_1.en:: Praise the Makers, we need all the help we can get. Join up and prepare to repel the assault!

DefendBase_dialog_stationLow_p1_kprEvent.en:: We're about to lose the station's primary reactors and have major breaches in the hull. Please help us!

DefendBase_dialog_win_p1_kprEvent_1.en:: We can't thank you enough for driving off the Makers. Why are they attacking us? What have we done to deserve this fate?

DefendBase_dialog_intro_tan_kprEvent_1.en:: Hiigarans, hostile Makers are approaching. The Imperial fleet is too far away, we need assistance!

DefendBase_dialog_beaconDown_tan_kprEven.en:: We've lost the beacon. We're cut off from reinforcements.

DefendBase_dialog_reinforcements_tan_kpr.en:: Reinforcements have arrived. Hold the line and beat the Makers back!

DefendBase_dialog_stationLow_tan_kprEven.en:: Commander, our station has lost a main structural support. We can't hold up much longer, do something!

DefendBase_dialog_win_tan_kprEvent_1.en:: Blessings be to you, Hiigarans, for your aid. We do not know what we have done to anger the Makers, but we thank you all the same for our lives.

DefendBase_dialog_intro_yao_kprEvent_1.en:: Hiigarans, Maker objects have been detected on the outer monitors. Our defense forces are still tied-up elsewhere. We implore you for assistance!

DefendBase_dialog_beaconDown_yao_kprEven.en:: The signal beacon was destroyed. Our defense forces won't be able to send reinforcements.

DefendBase_dialog_reinforcements_yao_kpr.en:: Our forces have finally arrived. Coordinate the defenses and repel the attackers!

DefendBase_dialog_stationLow_yao_kprEven.en:: Commander, our outer hull is buckling and we're losing atmosphere. The station can't last much longer!

DefendBase_dialog_win_yao_kprEvent_1.en:: No further enemy contacts detected. Thank you Commander, best of luck as the Maker's anger rolls over us.

DefendBase_dialog_intro_ama_kprEvent_1.en:: To any ships in range, we require assistance! The Makers have gone mad and we need help!

DefendBase_dialog_stationLow_ama_kprEven.en:: We've lost the station's outer habitat pods. Our docking facilities are in disrepair. We can't escape, please help!

DefendBase_dialog_win_ama_kprEvent_1.en:: Our people owe you their lives, Commander. Thank you for your protection! Let's hope the Makers will end their rampage soon enough.

AlienProbe_dialog_intro_1.en:: Unidentified probe signature confirmed. Let's move in and get it.

AlienProbe_dialog_fin_1.en:: The probe is aboard and transferred to storage. Objective complete.

desc_liaison_BasicDestroy_p1_name.en:: We were asked to get rid of a Cangacian fleet harassing traders in this area.

desc_liaison_BasicDestroy_ama_name.en:: We were asked to get rid of a Amassari fleet harassing traders in this area.

desc_liaison_BasicDestroy_nac_name.en:: We were asked to get rid of a Nacarid Amassari fleet harassing traders in this area.

desc_liaison_BasicDestroy_hgd_name.en:: We were asked to get rid of fleet of Kiithless Hiigarans harassing traders in this area.

desc_liaison_BasicDestroy_vgr_name.en:: We were asked to get rid of fleet of Vaygr harassing traders in this area.

desc_liaison_BountyHunt_p1_name.en:: We were contracted to hunt down a Cangacian bounty.

desc_liaison_BountyHunt_tan_name.en:: We were contracted to hunt down a Tanoch bounty.

desc_liaison_BountyHunt_tec_name.en:: We were contracted to hunt down a Tanoch Tecuban bounty.

desc_liaison_BountyHunt_yao_name.en:: We were contracted to hunt down a Yaot bounty.

desc_liaison_BountyHunt_sap_name.en:: We were contracted to hunt down a Sapa Yaot bounty.

desc_liaison_BountyHunt_ama_name.en:: We were contracted to hunt down a Amassari bounty.

desc_liaison_BountyHunt_nac_name.en:: We were contracted to hunt down a Amassari Nacarid bounty.

desc_liaison_BountyHunt_hgd_name.en:: We were contracted to hunt down a Kiithless bounty.

BountyHunt_dialog_intro_1.en:: Our target is located here. We have some time until their hyperspace engines are recharged to escape. All ships, seek and destroy!

BountyHunt_dialog_mark_1.en:: Fleet Intelligence has located our target on this ship. Attack before it can escape!

BountyHunt_dialog_win_1.en:: Target destroyed and we have proof of the kill. We can return to the station and collect the bounty.

BountyHunt_dialog_fail_1.en:: The target is engaging hyperspace. We were too slow this time.

desc_liaison_Escort_tr1_name.en:: We are asked to escort an Iyatequa freighter to a trading station.

desc_liaison_Escort_tan_name.en:: We are asked to escort a Tanoch liner to a trading station.

desc_liaison_Escort_yao_name.en:: We are asked to escort a Yaot freighter to a trading station.

desc_liaison_Escort_ama_name.en:: We are asked to escort an Amassari freighter to a trading station.

Escort_dialog_killAll_1.en:: Hostile craft destroyed, scope is clear. Proceed on mission.

Escort_dialog_intro_tr1_1.en:: Well met Hiigarans. Your support to safeguard our passage is much appreciated. Let's get to business.

Escort_dialog_allyLow_tr1_1.en:: Hiigarans, our hull is about to fail. Our cargo is precious, assist us!

Escort_dialog_fail_tr1_1.en:: The Freighter has been destroyed. I'm not detecting any survivors. Abort mission.

Escort_dialog_remaining_tr1_1.en:: Hiigarans, we cannot engage with the trading station with hostiles in the area. Dispatch our adversaries!

Escort_dialog_win_tr1_1.en:: Many thanks for protecting our business, Hiigarans. Good fortune to you and your crew.

Escort_dialog_intro_tan_1.en:: Greetings, are you our escort? It's appreciated. Our passengers will feel better with an armed ship on our side.

Escort_dialog_allyLow_tan_1.en:: Our passengers are dying and our ship is in distress! Do something!

Escort_dialog_fail_tan_1.en:: Commander... the liner... I'm not detecting any survivors. We can't stay, abort mission.

Escort_dialog_remaining_tan_1.en:: We can't unload our passengers while there are attacking ships nearby! The area must be clear before we can off-load!

Escort_dialog_win_tan_1.en:: You have the thanks of thousands of grateful passengers and crew, Hiigarans. This won't be forgotten.

Escort_dialog_intro_yao_1.en:: Greetings Commander! Your presence is very much appreciated. Our cargo is pretty unstable, we should dock quickly.

Escort_dialog_allyLow_yao_1.en:: Hull integrity is failing, we're going to lose the cargo deck if this keeps up much longer!

Escort_dialog_fail_yao_1.en:: The freighter has been destroyed. The area is flooded with radiation now, abort mission.

Escort_dialog_remaining_yao_1.en:: Hiigarans, this cargo is too volitile to unload in combat conditions. Clear the area, then we can dock.

Escort_dialog_win_yao_1.en:: Coming into dock now. Our crew owe you their lives, Hiigarans. Many thanks from all of us.

Escort_dialog_intro_ama_1.en:: You are Hiigarans? We have heard of you. We have rare cargo and need an escort. Are you willing?

Escort_dialog_allyLow_ama_1.en:: We've taken too many hits to the cargo cells, we're in danger of losing integrity!

Escort_dialog_fail_ama_1.en:: The Amassari ship has broken up. There's nothing left of them. Abort mission.

Escort_dialog_remaining_ama_1.en:: We can't dock with hostile ships in the area. Once the local space is clear we can begin docking procedure.

Escort_dialog_win_ama_1.en:: The rare parts we have onboard will allow us to open up more habitation areas for our people. On behalf of our future, thank you.

goalTxt_t_liaison_Escort_goal_reachPOISt.en:: Escort the allied ship to the station.

desc_liasion_PlatformDefense_name.en:: We have the task to defend a set of turret platforms that were heavily damage in an attack.

platDefense_start_1.en:: The turret platforms are under heavy attack and cannot hold out any longer. We must defend them until reinforcements arrive!

platDefense_nextwave_1.en:: New craft alert; hostile ships coming out of hyperspace. Defend the platforms!

platDefense_previctory_1.en:: Friendly ships coming out of hyperspace!

platDefense_victory_1.en:: We successfully defended the platforms and a maintenance team is on its way.

platDefense_fail_1.en:: All turret platforms were destroyed. We should leave this battle as long as we still can.

platDefenseEpic_start_1.en:: Commander, the computer systems of these specialized defense platforms are linked together. If we lose one platform, the other two will be destroyed too!

platDefenseEpic_fail_1.en:: One platforms was destroyed, triggering the destruction of the others. We should leave this battle as long as we still can...

desc_liaison_LostCargo_name.en:: A trading ship has lost its cargo in a recent attack, and we were asked to help retrieve it in turn for a share of the cargo.

lostCargo_start_1.en:: Commander, we are tasked to retrieve several cargo containers that we lost to Cangacian pirates in this sector. Our sensors detected them nearby.

lostCargo_nextwave_1.en:: More Cangacians are coming out of hyperspace!

lostCargo_victory_1.en:: We have collected all containers we could find. We should bring them back to the nearest station, Commander.

desc_liaison_LostCargo_ama_name.en:: The Amassari liaison officer asked us if we could scavenge some key components from a nearby debris field.

scavengeParts_start_1.en:: Commander, these fields are full of buried treasure. Please, do us the favour: Grab what you can find and bring it to us.

scavengeParts_nextwave_1.en:: More enemy ships are coming out of hyperspace!

scavengeParts_victory_1.en:: Commander, sensors show that we have collected everything that could be of importance.

desc_signal_ama_CollectProbe_01_tX.en:: We maybe have found signals of a lost sensor probe we sent into the Nightmare Gulf. Hopefully it can give us more details of what is inside this region.

probe_dialog_intro_1.en:: Commander, we have recieved pings from a lost sensor probe we sent into the Nightmare Gulf. We have isolated four positions where it could be.

probe_dialog_intro_2.en:: Caution however - we are picking up enemies looking for the probe as well. <color=#FBB03F>These asteroids create a magnetic field and give us sensor cover. </color>

probe_dialog_win_1.en:: We have collected the probe. Hopefully it gives us an insight on what is inside the Nightmare Gulf.

probe_dialog_fail_1.en:: Commander, the enemy is calling in reinforcements. We have to leave, now!

probe_noGoal_1.en:: Looks like this signal was a bust, Commander. There are three more potential locations.

probe_noGoal_2.en:: No probe here either. Two potential sights left.

probe_noGoal_3.en:: Also no probere here. There is only one spot left, Commander.

probe_timer_1.en:: We have been spotted! Defeat the enemies before they can call for reinforcement!

desc_side_DamageTest.en:: Test your loadout in simulated fights.

Debug_damageTest_dialog_intro_1.en:: Weapons are cold and in simulation mode only, Commander. Fire at will.

desc_story_A01_DuzumiGate.en:: Become familiar with your ship and prepare for the expedition to the new galaxy.

s_duzumi_1.en:: We are T-Minus 5 minutes to gate activation. Task Force Ararat, complete your final loading procedures.

s_duzumi_2.en:: Final component is on its way to the Expedition ship now.

s_duzumi_3.en:: We're behind schedule. Engineering, install the Progenitor Communicator immediately.

s_duzumi_5.en:: All commands, this is Admiral Enoch. Task Force Ararat will assemble before Duzumi gate. Departure in five minutes.

s_duzumi_6.en:: Engineering, status of the Progenitor Communicator?

s_duzumi_7.en:: The Device is integrated and operational. We are receiving telemetry from the gate, all contacts green.

s_duzumi_8.en:: Good. Command, all moorings are clear and we are ready to activate engines.

s_duzumi_9.en:: All C&C elements are green. Z-Plus thrusters engaged, we have lift-off.

s_duzumi_10.en:: Progenitor Communicator has connected to the gate. Transmitting activation code now. Gate is activating.

s_duzumi_11.en:: Our expedition to the Nimbus Galaxy is about to begin. May our fortunes be better than those who have preceeded us. Good luck everyone.

desc_story_A01_DuzumiGateTut.en:: Become familiar with your ship and prepare for the expedition to the new galaxy.

s_duzumiTut_intro.en:: Welcome aboard Commander. I hope you're ready for this epic venture. I am Joanna Naabal, your executive officer.

s_duzumiTut_cameraSwipe.en:: We'll begin a review of all ship systems before we depart, starting with camera controls. Simply <color=#FBB03F>swipe to move the camera.</color>

s_duzumiTut_cameraZoom.en:: Great! Use the camera to get an overview of your surroundings. Now <color=#FBB03F>pinch to zoom the camera.</color>

s_duzumiTut_cameraAuto.en:: Good. You can also <color=#FBB03F>enable Auto Camera</color>, which will focus on important objects automatically.

s_duzumiTut_targetList.en:: Commander, the <color=#FBB03F>Target List</color> has been activated. Use it to interact with objects, enemies, or allies in the vacinity.

s_duzumiTut_moveTargetList.en:: Now give the order to <color=#FBB03F>move to our target position.</color>

s_duzumiTut_moveTargetListFill.en:: Let's test our combat systems. We'll need them on our voyage through the Nimbus Galaxy with Task Force Ararat.

s_duzumiTut_targetDrones.en:: Practice drones are launched and en-route for their target positions. Good hunting.

s_duzumiTut_attackTargetList.en:: We have clearance to begin live-fire excercises. Awaiting your <color=#FBB03F>command to attack the drones.</color>

s_duzumiTut_praise.en:: Well done, Commander! Next we'll engage a more challenging target.

s_duzumiTut_unitTray.en:: The <color=#FBB03F>Fleet Tray</color> has been activated. It shows you all ships in our fleet. Currently that only includes our expedition flagship.

s_duzumiTut_moveDrag.en:: You can use the Fleet Tray to <color=#FBB03F>give a move command</color> to ships directly. Let's go to the next position.

s_duzumiTut_targetFrigate.en:: A target frigate is being moved into position for additional weapon testing.

s_duzumiTut_targetFrigate2.en:: Be advised that ships of capital class have greater durability.

s_duzumiTut_attackDrag.en:: Commander, you can also use the Fleet Tray to <color=#FBB03F>give an attack order</color> by aiming at targets directly.

s_duzumiTut_skill1.en:: The <color=#FBB03F>Skills</color> are online and ready for activation.

s_duzumiTut_skill2.en:: Great timing, we'll need our special abilities to engage stronger targets like this frigate. <color=#FBB03F>Activate our Missile Barrage Skill.</color>

s_duzumiTut_explosion.en:: Excellent, all systems are operational! Our vessel is ready for whatever we find in the Nimbus galaxy.

s_duzumiTut_moveTaskForce.en:: Task Force Ararat, this is Admiral Enoch. All vessels report to the nav point immediately.

s_duzumiTut_preOutro.en:: Commander, there are the other flagships! It will be an honor to fly next to Admiral Enoch and Vice Admiral Vasthi.

s_duzumiTut_outro_1.en:: Greetings Commander. I hope you're excited to be part of the expedition! Let's make history together.

s_duzumiTut_outro_2.en:: Acknowledged, vice admiral. We have onboard the Progenitor Communicator and are ready for takeoff.

s_duzumiTut_outro_3.en:: Commander, take this gift before we leave. Open it once we reach the Nimbus Galaxy, you'll need it.

desc_story_A02_WiracodaGate.en:: We have made it to the other side. Now we need to gather what we came here for and then return home.

story_Wiracoda_dialog_intro_1.en:: All commands, stay alert. Other expeditions have reported being ambushed by Progenitors. Begin perimeter search.

story_Wiracoda_dialog_moveForward_1.en:: Commander, give the order to <color=#FBB03F>move to our assigned position</color>.

story_Wiracoda_dialog_noSign_1.en:: No sign of the Progenitors yet, but they rarely announce their appearance.

story_Wiracoda_dialog_drones_1.en:: Fleet, active attack drones are sighted! We are under attack!

story_Wiracoda_dialog_drones_2.en:: Commander, you must assist the Khar-Kalaad. Eliminate the drone swarm immediately.

story_Wiracoda_dialog_attackDrones_1.en:: Commander, awaiting your command to <color=#FBB03F>attack the enemy</color>.

story_Wiracoda_dialog_useSkill_1.en:: The Drones are hard to hit. <color=#FBB03F>Use our Missile Barrage</color> to overwhelm and destroy them.

story_Wiracoda_dialog_dronesWin_1.en:: Thank you for the assist, Commander.

story_Wiracoda_dialog_tormentor_1.en:: A hostile frigate-type has emerged from hyperspace. It's not a configuration we're familiar with.

story_Wiracoda_dialog_attackTormentor_1.en:: Commander, <color=#FBB03F>attack the incoming ship and destroy it!</color>

story_Wiracoda_dialog_skillReminder_1.en:: Commander, don't forget to <color=#FBB03F>use our missile barrage</color> when it is ready again.

story_Wiracoda_dialog_tormentorWin_1.en:: Enemy ship destroyed. We're fortunate this new enemy isn't as formidable as a Keeper.

story_Wiracoda_dialog_freeBattle_1.en:: All commands, more Progenitors are appearing, but our reinforcements have emerged from the gate. <color=#FBB03F>Engage combat!</color>

story_Wiracoda_dialog_keeper_1.en:: Commander, the Keeper has appeared. Activating the Progenitor Communicator now. We'll order the Keeper to stand down and retake command of the gate.

story_Wiracoda_dialog_keeper_2.en:: Command, be advised, the Keeper is rejecting the Communicator's command. Full permissions setting has no effect.

story_Wiracoda_dialog_moveBack.en:: Impossible! The communicator should have full authority over all Progenitor devices. Maintain defensive positions.

story_Wiracoda_dialog_loosing_1.en:: Mayday! Breach in starboard fusion engine-!......

story_Wiracoda_dialog_loosing_4.en:: We sustained a critical hit, we cannot hol-!......

story_Wiracoda_dialog_loosing_5.en:: The Haarsuk has been destroyed. We're taking alarming losses.

story_Wiracoda_dialog_loosing_6.en:: Alert, more Keepers emerging from hyperspace!

story_Wiracoda_dialog_loosing_7.en:: We're being overwhelmed. This is not looking good!

story_Wiracoda_dialog_end_1.en:: Task Force Ararat, this is Admiral Enoch. Flee the area immediately. The Riif-sa will draw attention to assist your escape.

story_Wiracoda_dialog_end_2.en:: We need to go before the Keepers activate their gravity well. Initiate emergency hyperspace jump!

desc_story_A03_GulfTaln.en:: After our narrow escape from the keeper, we need to plan our next steps.

story_GulfTaln_introSequence_1.en:: Hyperspace jump successful. We sustained heavy damage. Fires are reported in engineering.

story_GulfTaln_intro_1.en:: The Progenitor Communicator failed to stop the Keepers. We need to rebuild the fleet before we can find out why.

story_GulfTaln_frigate_1.en:: Commander, Hiigaran ship coming out of hyperspace in proximity. It's one of ours.

story_GulfTaln_frigate_2.en:: This is the Acropolis. We almost didn't make it out, requesting repairs and permission to join your fleet.

story_GulfTaln_undockRC_1.en:: We must rebuild our fleet with what we have. Our Resource Collector was undamaged and reports ready. <color=#FBB03F>Undock it now.</color>

story_GulfTaln_repair_1.en:: Great. Now give the order to <color=#FBB03F>begin repairs on the Scouting Frigate.</color>

story_GulfTaln_undockInterceptor_1.en:: Commander, our only squadron of Interceptors has finished rearming and is ready to launch. <color=#FBB03F>Undock strike craft.</color>

story_GulfTaln_stranger_1.en:: An unidentified ship is emerging from hyperspace nearby. It's contacting us... with a Hiigaran frequency?

story_GulfTaln_trader_1.en:: Well and met, Hiigaran vessel. Your ship is new to us, even if your kind is not. Welcome! We are the Iyatequa.

story_GulfTaln_trader_2.en:: As a gesture of good will and to welcome you to our trade network, we are willing to share information. Please approach.

story_GulfTaln_move_1.en:: If these Iyatequa know Hiigarans, other expeditions to Nimbus must have survived. We can surely use their help. <color=#FBB03F>Let's approach the ship.</color>

story_GulfTaln_exchange_1.en:: We have docked. Along with exchanging language and cartographic information, one of the Iyatequa has boarded to serve as a guide.

story_GulfTaln_pirates_0.en:: Commander, we're detecting another hyperspace signature.

story_GulfTaln_pirates_1.en:: Iyatequa! We are the Fleet of Rams. We come for the criminal Ekekko, who must pay for his fraud! Surrender him or face the consequences!

story_GulfTaln_pirates_2.en:: You must barter with a better currency than threats, pirate. We will not surrender one of our own without accord.

story_GulfTaln_pirates_3.en:: So be it! We will collect Ekekko by force!

story_GulfTaln_help_1.en:: The Iyatequa ship is unarmed! We must protect them. <color=#FBB03F>Attack the pirates!</color>

story_GulfTaln_skill_1.en:: Commander, remember to <color=#FBB03F>use our missile barrage.</color>

story_GulfTaln_escape_1.en:: You can't hide behind the blind empathy of others forever, traders! Ekekko will face justice another day!

story_GulfTaln_farewell_1.en:: Your intervention was not necessary, but we are grateful. You consider yourselves isolated in Nimbus, but this is not so.

story_GulfTaln_farewell_2.en:: Your kind reside in the Empty Quarter. Coordinates to Lazarus, your capital, have been transmitted. Good fortune to you.

story_GulfTaln_conclusion_1.en:: The mothership Lazarus has been missing since the first expeditions to Nimbus. The other survivors must have gathered there!

desc_story_A04_RelicSignature.en:: Gideon's research is leading us to a potential location of a Progenitor artifact that must be retrieved.

story_Relic_intro_1.en:: The relic is up ahead, but there are other signals near it. <color=#FBB03F>Move closer to identify these unkown objects.</color>

story_Relic_combat_1.en:: It is a Progenitor patrol defending the relic. <color=#FBB03F>Destroy these ships!</color>

story_Relic_relic_1.en:: Commander, I located the relic. <color=#FBB03F>Send a Resource Collector to retrieve it.</color>

story_Relic_collectorMissing_1.en:: Commander, I located the relic. <color=#FBB03F>Deploy a Resource Collector</color> to retrieve it.

story_Relic_collectorLaunched_1.en:: Resource Collector launched and ready. Now <color=#FBB03F>give the order to retrieve the relic.</color>

story_Relic_end_1.en:: Objective Retrieved. The Progenitor Relic has been processed and transferred to storage.

story_Relic_end_2.en:: What a fascinating artifact. I will begin its examination immideately.

desc_story_A05_Jolja.en:: A live Progenitor Ruin is located here. Investigate and recover any active computer components.

desc_story_A05_Jolja_heroic.en:: A live Progenitor Ruin is located here. Investigate and recover any active computer components.

story_Jolja_introSequence_1.en:: Based on my scans of this debris field, a functioning Progenitor computer terminal is here.

story_Jolja_introSequence_2.en:: Hopefully we can learn why the Progenitor Communicator failed at Wiracoda gate.

story_Jolja_openSensor_1.en:: Commander, we should <color=#FBB03F>open the Sensor Manager</color> to get a tactical reading of our immediate surroundings.

story_Jolja_signatures_1.en:: Multiple Progenitor signatures detected. Our fleet is not equipped to fight them all at once. We should <color=#FBB03F>avoid them</color> as best as we can.

story_Jolja_closeSensor_1.en:: Commander, remember that you can <color=#FBB03F>close the Sensor Manager</color> when you don't need it.

story_Jolja_terminalA_1.en:: Sensors indicate this large debris fragment may contain the terminal. <color=#FBB03F>Close in to investigate</color>.

story_Jolja_terminalB_1.en:: No Progenitor computer terminal was found, but sensors identified another strong signal further ahead.

story_Jolja_waveA_1.en:: The terminal is here. Progenitor defenses are activating to protect it. Do not let them interfere with our work!

story_Jolja_waveB_1.en:: Commander, more Progenitor drones are activating to attack us. We're at risk of being overwhelmed.

story_Jolja_ally_1.en:: Hyperspace signatures detected! A keeper? No... these ships are of unknown design. Incoming message.

story_Jolja_ally_2.en:: Unidentified ship, stand by, we are here to assist you. We will clear the errant maker drones.

story_Jolja_tepin_1.en:: I am Tepin Papan of the Tanoch Empire. Starship, what is your purpose in this dangerous area?

story_Jolja_tepin_2.en:: We have just arrived in this area of the galaxy. We seek more information about the Progenitors, those who made these ruins.

story_Jolja_tepin_3.en:: Progenitors? Interesting. We know only one other who calls the Makers by this name.

story_Jolja_tepin_4.en:: The Tanoch Emperor would be most interested to meet you. You should <color=#FBB03F>pay visit to Tanochet</color>, our capital. Transmitting coordinates. Farewell!

story_Jolja_resolution_1.en:: Commander, the terminal was damaged in combat. We should accept the Tanoch's invitation and see what they can tell us.

desc_story_B01_CombatTrials.en::
During a shakedown your flagship comes under attack from pirates!
Expected enemies: Fighters, Corvettes - Threat level: 2

desc_story_B01_CombatTrials_heroic.en::
During a shakedown your flagship comes under attack from pirates!
Expected enemies: Fighters, Corvettes - Threat level: 2

s_shakedown_dialog_intro_1.en:: Welcome to Tarsus Yard Commander. The combat area is prepared and stands ready.

s_shakedown_dialog_intro_2.en:: Decommissioned ships have been provided for target practice. They are coded as enemies.

s_shakedown_dialog_intro_2b.en:: Remember that only strike craft are allowed to be utilized in this test.

s_shakedown_dialog_intro_3.en:: Thank you Tarsus Command. Flagship and escort are on standby and deactivated until further instructions.

s_shakedown_dialog_intro_3b.en:: Strike craft are ready to begin trials.

s_shakedown_dialog_tut_1.en:: Commander, Plasma Bombers are very effective against armored tagets. Use them to attack the Decommissioned Frigates.

s_shakedown_dialog_tut_2.en:: Interceptors are perfect to attack other strike craft. You should always order them to attack unarmored targets.

s_shakedown_dialog_tut_3.en:: Commander, trial timer is set for 3 minutes. Begin your combat trial on this mark.

s_shakedown_dialog_destroy_1.en:: Combat Trial successful. All targets destroyed.

s_shakedown_dialog_wave_1.en:: Commander... Cangacian hyperspace signatures detected. It looks like we've drawn some attention.

s_shakedown_dialog_wave_2.en:: All ships reactivated. Remember to utilize our strike craft as effectively as possible!

s_shakedown_dialog_fin_1.en:: The area is secure. Seems like their mistake was raiding a live-fire exercise area.

s_shakedown_dialog_fail_1.en:: Commander, your unit has failed the Combat Trial. We will rest out equipment and you can return to try again.

goalTxt_h_story_B01_CombatTrials_goal_po.en:: Move strike craft to practice targets

desc_story_B02_MeropisDefense.en::
Meropis station is under imminent threat of attack. Defend the station!
Expected enemies: Fighters, Corvettes - Threat level: 5

desc_story_B02_MeropisDefense_heroic.en::
Meropis station is under imminent threat of attack. Defend the station!
Expected enemies: Fighters, Corvettes - Threat level: 5

s_meropis_dialog_intro_1.en:: Hiigarans! Welcome to Meropis station. Your timing is most fortunate, we are about to come under attack from Cangacian Pirates.

s_meropis_dialog_intro_2.en:: They are attempting to disable our hyperspace transmitters. Please repel the attackers!

s_meropis_dialog_group_1.en:: Commander, there are two hyperspace transmitters that need to be defended simultaneously. We must split our fleet into <color=#FBB03F>groups</color>.

s_meropis_dialog_group_2.en:: Great. Assign more units to the group.

s_meropis_dialog_group_3.en:: Send units to both Hyperspace Transmitters!

s_meropis_dialog_position_1.en:: Just in time. Here they come!

s_meropis_dialog_finish_1.en:: We did it. All hostiles eliminated.

s_meropis_dialog_finish_2.en:: Many thanks to you Hiigarans for the timely defense. Our communications traffic through this node is maintained.

s_meropis_dialog_fail_1.en:: Commander, one of the transmitters was destroyed. We have failed.

goalTxt_h_story_B02_MeropisDefense_goal_.en:: Position forces at both hyperspace transmitters

desc_story_B03_ThePool.en::
Zerzua Oasis along the outer rim is a quiet location with many resources.
Expected enemies: Corvettes - Threat level: 10

desc_story_B03_ThePool_heroic.en::
Zerzua Oasis along the outer rim is a quiet location with many resources.
Expected enemies: Corvettes - Threat level: 10

s_pool_intro_1_dialog.en:: Hyperspace jump successful, we’ve arrived at the Pool. The area is littered with pirate loot, but also guarded by defensive platforms.

s_pool_tutRange_1_dialog.en:: Sensors have determined these kinetic batteries have inferior tracking equipment. Their range is limited as a result.

s_pool_tutRange_2_dialog.en:: If we attack them from a distance we can prevent damage to the fleet. Weapon ranges are marked in the sensor manager. <color=#FBB03F>Attack from a distance!</color>

s_pool_tutFalloff_1_dialog.en:: These platforms are of a different type, they are armed with poor quality missiles.

s_pool_tutFalloff_2_dialog.en:: Sensors indicate they can attack at long range, but their accuracy drops off at a distance. We stand a minimal chance of being hit at stand-off range.

s_pool_closeKin_1_dialog.en:: Don’t get too close to the kinetic batteries. <color=#FBB03F>Stay out of range</color> to avoid being targeted.

s_pool_closeMis_1_dialog.en:: Avoid getting too close to the missile platforms, at close range they can inflict heavy damage. Strike craft are most vulnerable to direct hits.

s_pool_destroy_1_dialog.en:: The area is cleared of platforms. You should familiarize yourself with weapons ranges and accuracy profiles to be prepared against anything we face in the future.

s_pool_destroy_2_dialog.en:: Commander, sensors report contacts emerging from hyperspace nearby. It’s too soon to be a friendly salvage party.

s_pool_pirates_1_dialog.en:: Thieves! Nobody steals from us bandits! Prepare to die!

s_pool_finish_1_dialog.en:: The area seems secure. If there was a bigger garrison they would have shown up by now. We can signal the Iyatequa to collect their salvage.

s_lazarus_dialog_introA_1.en:: Mayday, mayday. Lazarus is under attack. All Hiigaran commanders send assistance immediately!

s_lazarus_dialog_introB_1.en:: The Cangacians dare to attack us in our capital system? I have a bad feeling about this, Commander.

s_lazarus_dialog_combatPirates_1.en:: Let's move in and defend Lazarus base before it's too late!

s_lazarus_dialog_wavePirates_1.en:: Reading more hostile signals from multiple attack vectors. The fate of Hiigarans in Nimbus is on the line. Defend Lazarus at all cost!

s_lazarus_dialog_vaygrA_1.en:: Hyperspace jump successful. The Cangacians have dealt significant damage to Lazarus base. We will move in and deal the killing blow.

s_lazarus_dialog_vaygrB_1.en:: Hiigarans! Your presence here has been a nuisance to our master's plans for too long. We shall wipe you out here and now. Glory to the Vaygr!

s_lazarus_dialog_combatVaygr_1.en:: The Vaygr in Nimbus? How can this be? All ships prepare to repel the attackers!

s_lazarus_dialog_waveVaygr_1.en:: Call in the reinforcements. All Hiigarans must die. For our lord!

s_lazarus_dialog_end_1.en:: Sector cleared. There are no more Vaygr signals. We did it! Lazarus base prevailed. Praise Sajuuk!

desc_story_C01_Tanochet.en:: We have received a personal invitation to the Tanoch homeworld from their Emperor.

desc_story_C01_Tanochet_heroic.en:: We have received a personal invitation to the Tanoch homeworld from their Emperor.

desc_story_C01_Tanochet_event_heroic.en:: We have received a personal invitation to the Tanoch homeworld from their Emperor.

st_3_1_dialog_start_1.en:: Welcome to Tanochet. Our Emperor is eager to meet you. Proceed to our orbital station and prepare for docking.

st_3_1_dialog_yaotSpawn_1.en:: Alert! Yaot raiders detected! All ships prepare for intercept!

st_3_1_dialog_torpedo1_1.en:: Commander, torpedoes emerging from hyperspace! The Yaot appear to be targeting civilian traffic, possibly to disrupt the defenses.

st_3_1_dialog_torpedo1_2.en:: The Tanoch fleet appears to be concentrating their defenses around the stations. We need to intercept those torpedoes or hundreds may die.

st_3_1_dialog_torpedo2_1.en:: Another hyperspace torpedo has emerged on the far side of sensor range. We must intercept it!

st_3_1_dialog_torpedo3_1.en:: Commander, two torpedoes have emerged from hyperspace! They're both aiming for the civilian stations!

st_3_1_dialog_attackOver_1.en:: Starship, thank you for your assistance. Damage to the stations was minimal, and the People extend their thanks. You are welcome to dock, you have earned it.

st_3_1_dialog_finish_1.en:: Approaching station. Initiating docking procedure. Our emperor is already awaiting you.

st_3_1_dialog_failure_1.en:: Commander, one of the stations has suffered a direct hit! Casualty reports are coming through, it's not looking good.

st_3_1_dialog_failure_2.en:: The Yaot are retreating. Evidently this was a hit and run operation... but did they achieve their objective?

st_3_1_dialog_failure_3.en:: Starship, we appreciate your assistance, but our emperor has more urgent matters to attend to now. Your visit will have to wait.

desc_story_C02_TempleTonaati.en:: We have traced the Vaygr to this location. Go there and find out what they are doing in this galaxy.

desc_story_C02_TempleTonaati_heroic.en:: We have traced the Vaygr to this location. Go there and find out what they are doing in this galaxy.

st_3_2_v2_dialog_start_1.en:: We have arrived at what the Tanoch call Star Totek.

st_3_2_v2_dialog_start_2.en:: Vaygr signal traffic points to this system. They're up to something here, stay alert.

st_3_2_v2_movetoStation_1.en:: Interesting.. Theres a Progenitor structure here. Function is unknown. Tanoch maps identify this as Temple Tonaati.

st_3_2_v2_movetoStation_2.en:: We should begin our investigation there. However, it seems the temple is heavily patrolled by the Tanoch temple forces. They probably won't admit us.

st_3_2_v2_movetoStation_3.en:: Their defenses are formidable, and we don't want to commit sacrilage by attacking a Holy Site.

st_3_2_v2_movetoStation_3a.en:: Solar activity is significant beyond the station, It's too risky to travel there.

st_3_2_v2_movetoStation_4.en:: However, there are two debris field passages we can use to stay safe through the Solar radiation.

st_3_2_v2_movetoStation_5.en:: One is to the left, the other is to the right.

st_3_2_v2_movetoStation_6.en:: We cannot scan the debris fields from this distance, but it is a good guess there may be Progenitor devices active in this debris. Its still safer than turning the Temple's defenses against us.

st_3_2_v2_civilStation_reached_1.en:: Many ships are headed to the temple, likely carrying pilgrims to worship the star.

st_3_2_v2_civilStation_reached_2.en:: We've scanned Temple Tonaati. There are no Vaygr ships or transmissions here.

st_3_2_v2_explainStar_1.en:: This is interesting... the Temple has a built in field generator, creating a magnetic funnel.

st_3_2_v2_explainStar_2.en:: Not only can we use it to get close to the star through hyperspace, but it will bring us to a specific destination. We won't know until we use it.

st_3_2_v2_explainStar_3.en:: The Vaygr aren't here now, but they may have passed through this area recently.

st_3_2_v2_yaotsuddenly_1.en:: Commander, a large cluster of craft have just emerged from Hyperspace. It's... a Yaot attack force.

st_3_2_v2_yaotsuddenly_2.en:: Attention, Tanoch Defenders. I am Guahai, Zaque of the Yaot Federation. Surrender yourselves, or be destroyed.

st_3_2_v2_yaotsuddenly_3.en:: This is a civilian installation! The defenses here are too small to fend off an entire attack force!

st_3_2_v2_yaotsuddenly_4.en:: Do not doubt that we will do what is necessary in the shadow of your holy place. Surrender! We are the stronger here!

st_3_2_v2_yaotattack_1.en:: The Yaot fleet is too massive for us to even hope to stop. Even if we were to join forces with the temple defenders.

st_3_2_v2_temple_killed_1.en:: I... commander, the defenses have been destroyed by unknown means. They must have tremendous firepower at their disposal!

st_3_2_v2_temple_killed_2.en:: I am Chaquen, a Commander in the Yaot Federation.

st_3_2_v2_temple_killed_3.en:: Hiigarans, you are known to us. I say to you now: abandon these people. You are not involved in this war. Save yourselves. Leave before it is too late.
