st_3_2_v2_temple_killed_4.en:: Commander, we can't sit by and leave these people to their fate. We must defend the installation.

st_3_2_v2_boss_1.en:: The Yaot are sending another probing force towards us. Prepare for contact!

st_3_2_v2_finish_1.en:: It seems the Yaot are pulling away from the area. Odd... a force-size like that, they should have destroyed us easily.

st_3_2_v2_finish_2.en:: Commander... the field generator is disabled. The funnel is gone. The Tanoch must have destroyed it rather than let the Yaot gain possession of it.

st_3_2_v2_finish_3.en:: The Yaot must know this also, they've left the area. However, we still have the travel vector and coordinates targeted by the funnel. That should be our next destination.

st_3_2_v2_missionfail_1.en:: The station is gone... so many lives lost. We must escape before the Yaot finish us off as well!

desc_story_C03_StarTotek.en:: Something is happening at the most Holy Star of the Tanoch Empire.

desc_story_C03_StarTotek_heroic.en:: Something is happening at the most Holy Star of the Tanoch Empire.

st_startotek_intro_1_2.en:: We are in orbit over what the Tanoch call Star Totek: Their Holy star.

st_startotek_intro_2_1.en:: Totek is highly unusual. Outside temperatures are only a fraction of what we would expect for a star of this size.

st_startotek_intro_2_2.en:: Though the star has central religious significance to the Tanoch, very little scientific data is publicly known about it.

st_startotek_intro_3_1.en:: Comms are still detecting significant Vaygr signal traffic in the area. They seem to be emanating from here.

st_startotek_intro_3_2.en:: We need to discover what the Vaygr are doing here, and get a better estimation of their forces.

st_startotek_intro_3_3.en:: The presence of a Progenitor debris ring is unusual, but we can use this to get closer to the signal point. Use the debris to shield our ships from the heat of the star.

st_startotek_intro_4_1.en:: Fleet Intelligence suggests this is the safest route through the debris to the target area.

st_startotek_intro_5_1.en:: There is an area where we can risk damage to flank the Vaygr, if they're there. They won't expect us coming from this vector.

st_startotek_debri_1_1.en:: We must navigate the debris. Although Totek is a colder star, direct exposure to the corona will damage our ships. The debris will shield us.

st_startotek_debri_1_2.en:: The heat is intense enough to rapidly destroy our strike craft, which lack the armor to survive the corona's intensity.

st_startotek_debri_1_3.en:: Recommend docking our strike craft and harvesters until we are in a safer area.

st_startotek_debri_2_1.en:: Warning! We are no longer shielded from the sun. The fleet is taking damage!

st_startotek_debri_3_1.en:: Initiating Emergency hyperspace! Commander, we have to clear the range of the sun and repair the fleet before we can continue.

st_startotek_senti_1_1.en:: Attack drones detected. Be careful maneuvering here, don't let the drones draw you out into the sun.

st_startotek_senti_2_1.en:: If we go to the signal point from here, we'll be catching them by complete surprise. Do you wish to cross here?

st_startotek_senti_3_1.en:: If we cross here to the signal point, we'll catch anyone out of position. Shall we cross here?

st_startotek_senti_4_1.en:: More attack drones. Keep the fleet together Commander, don't let them draw us into the sunlight!

st_startotek_vaygr_1_1.en:: We're closing on the location of the Vaygr signal.

st_startotek_vaygr_2_1.en:: My lord, the Hiigarans are here.

st_startotek_vaygr_2_2.en:: Excellent, and very timely. They did not disappoint.

st_startotek_vaygr_2_3.en:: Hiigarans, I extend you a formal welcome to the Nimbus Galaxy.

st_startotek_vaygr_2_4.en:: Of course, I cannot let you interrupt my plans. Since I know it is already useless to ask for your surrender, instead, I'll bid you to die well.

st_startotek_battle_1_1.en:: The Vaygr are attacking. We need to push past them to see what they are planning!

st_startotek_battle_2_1.en:: Vaygr reinforcements coming out of Hyperspace!

st_startotek_salva_1_1.en:: The nodule is loaded and secured, my lord.

st_startotek_salva_1_3.en:: We are finished here, Hiigarans. I will depart now.

st_startotek_salva_1_5.en:: But I leave you with one bit of advice, and a warning.

st_startotek_salva_1_6.en:: Do not rest to your assumptions. All can change in an instant.

st_startotek_salva_1_7.en:: And you have much to learn about the extent of the Progenitor's Legacy.

st_startotek_salva_2_1.en:: He's taunting us. This raises even more questions about what the Vaygr intend to do in Nimbus.

st_startotek_salva_2_1_1.en:: For now lets focus on surviving the moment!

st_startotek_salva_2_2.en:: Based on sensor analysis, this object is a power transmission nodule. It collects energy from the star to beam to distant targets.

st_startotek_salva_2_3.en:: There are literally thousands of these arrays in orbit around Totek. It seems Jochik was salvaging a component from them... but we don't know what it is.

st_startotek_salva_2_4.en:: We won't find more answers here. We need to continue investigating local systems and inquire among the Tanoch.

goalTxt_h_story_C03_StarTotek_LastEnemyK.en:: Finish off the remains of Jochik's forces

desc_story_D01_SijinLighthouse.en:: We detected a possible signal from the missing Khar-Kalaad.

desc_story_D01_SijinLighthouse_heroic.en:: We detected a possible signal from the missing Khar-Kalaad.

st_farshore_intro_jo_1.en:: We've arrived at the location of the Khar-Kalaad's distress signal.

st_farshore_intro_jo_2.en:: I've marked the Khar-Kalaad's exact position on the Sensor's manager. We should investigate.

st_farshore_intro_jo_3.en:: We have no response to outgoing signals, so either Vice Admiral Vashti is keeping a low profile, or it's a trap. Proceed with caution.

st_farshore_ally_va_1.en:: Greetings Commander, it has been a long time.

st_farshore_ally_jo_2.en:: Vice Admiral! It's good to see you alive! We lost all contact after the battle at Wiracoda Gate.

st_farshore_ally_va_2.en:: We were forced to conduct major repairs after that battle. We maintained a low profile afterward, in order to avoid attracting attention.

st_farshore_ally_va_3.en:: By then you had already gotten the attention of the local powers. While you forged ahead we gathered more information about the Progenitors of this galaxy. This lead us here.

st_farshore_ally_va_4.en:: We signalled you now because we need your assistance. This is a Progenitor Lighthouse, one that we believe contains map information of the local Progenitor systems.

st_farshore_ally_va_5.en:: Though we have disabled the defenses, we need your communicator to access the main computer.

st_farshore_ally_jo_3.en:: We've had dubious luck using it in the past. Are you sure it's wise to try it?

st_farshore_ally_va_6.en:: It's our best chance to access this data. Consider it an order from a superior officer of Task Force Ararat.

st_farshore_ally_jo_4.en:: We could use that data, and the Vice Admiral is still technically our commander.

st_farshore_start_jo_1.en:: In order to establish a connection we'll need to dock a resource controller with the Lighthouse. Target is designated.

st_farshore_hodor_jo_1.en:: Our salvage team has docked with the Lighthouse. They're connecting with the Khar-Kalaad's team now.

st_farshore_hodor_va_1.en:: Commander, we have incoming hyperspace signatures at distance.

st_farshore_hodor_jo_2.en:: We can't seem to catch a break, can we?

st_farshore_hodor_tan_1.en:: Intruders, this site is holy. Surrender your vessels and prepare to be boarded.

st_farshore_hodor_jo_3.en:: These are Tanoch Temple guardians. We must have offended some Tanoch religious taboo by coming here.

st_farshore_hodor_eng_1.en:: Connection is being completed now, command. Cryptography is trying to input signal.

st_farshore_hodor_jo_5.en:: We don't have much time. Another wave is incoming.

st_farshore_hodor_eng_2.en:: Commander, Cryptography reports there's no cartographic data here.

st_farshore_hodor_eng_3.en:: Yes Vice Admiral. We're continuing to investigate.

st_farshore_hodor_jo_6.en:: We can't take much more of this.

st_farshore_hodor_eng_4.en:: Command, this tower is a navigational aid. It's used to cross the nearby unstable nebula to reach the other side.

st_farshore_eye_va_1.en:: More ships are approaching through hyperspace. We cannot delay, any longer and we won't be able to escape safely.

st_farshore_eye_eng_1.en:: We're close to gaining navigational data to guide us to the other end of the bridge network. We need more time!

st_farshore_eye_jo_1.en:: Commander... something... odd is happening right above us!

st_farshore_eye_jo_2.en:: There's no corresponding craft of this type in our database on the Progenitors.

st_farshore_eye_va_3.en:: The light house is projecting a massive quantum tunnel! Reading coordinates...

st_farshore_esc_jo_1.en:: Our engines aren't powerful enough to pursue the Progenitor object.

st_farshore_esc_jo_2.en:: We have its destination vector. When we have a powerful enough engine, we can pursue.

st_farshore_fail_jo_1.en:: Commander, the Khar-Kaalad has been hit! We must withdraw!

desc_story_D02_IliyinLighthouse.en:: We have arrived at another lighthouse in uncharted territory. Be prepared for anything.

desc_story_D02_IliyinLighthouse_heroic.en:: We have arrived at another lighthouse in uncharted territory. Be prepared for anything.

st_iliyin_intro_1.en:: Hyperspace jump completed. Looks like the lighthouse guided us successfully through the maelstrom.

st_iliyin_intro_2.en:: No sign of any recent activity here. This region of space is uncharted to everyone we've met so far in Nimbus.

st_iliyin_intro_4.en:: The make and composition of the ruins is unknown.

st_iliyin_intro_5.en:: This is amazing, no other empire we've encountered has been able to build into the Progenitor Ruins as we have.

st_iliyin_investigation_1.en:: These people might have information about the Progenitors we haven't collected yet. We must investigate.

st_iliyin_investigation_2.en:: Salvage team aboard, our science teams are investigating what we found. Results in a moment.

st_iliyin_investigation_3.en:: Commander, my sensor officer has detected hyperspace signatures emerging at some distance. Be on alert, we're not alone here.

st_iliyin_the_amassari_3.en:: Linguistics is trying to work on a translation database now.

st_iliyin_breakwater_1.en:: Until we can communicate we must stand our ground.

st_iliyin_breakwater_2.en:: More craft incoming. Their armor is stronger than any ship we've encountered in Nimbus. This will be tough.

st_iliyin_breakwater_3.en:: More of these crafts have emerged from Hyperspace. We may have angered a local power for them to be sending reinforcements.

st_iliyin_breakwater_4.en:: Commander, translation is up. We have a workable dictionary to communicate with.

st_iliyin_breakwater_5.en:: This is Vice Admiral Vashti, of the Hiigaran battlegroup Ararat. We mean you no hostility, please cease your attacks!

st_iliyin_breakwater_6.en:: Outsiders are forbidden among the trees of our ancestors! Submit, or die!

st_iliyin_breakwater_7.en:: So much for diplomacy. Let's get out of here!

st_iliyin_breakwater_8.en:: Commander, I am transmitting our destination coordinates. We can-

st_iliyin_breakwater_9.en:: Commander! I'm picking up a Hyperspace gravity well forming in the vicinity.

st_iliyin_anchors_1.en:: The Hyperspace Inhibitors are located here. They must be disabled if we have any hope of escape.

st_iliyin_anchors_2.en:: They don't seem to be impervious to our weapons. Disable them!

st_iliyin_anchors_5.en:: That's the last Inhibitor, we're clear to depart.

st_iliyin_anchors_6.en:: Command be advised, Progenitor attack drones are active in the area.

st_iliyin_anchors_7.en:: They don't appear to be reacting to anything specific, but they stand in our way.

st_iliyin_countdown_1.en:: That's the last Hyperspace Inhibitor, the effect will clear in a minute. Defend the fleet until then!

st_iliyin_push_1.en:: The effect will clear in a few minutes. Defend the fleet until then!

st_iliyin_push_3.en:: Commander! Mothership-class signature appearing above us!

st_iliyin_observer_5.en:: Traveler, we are the family Alut of the Amassari. The Observer has blessed you, attacking you was our error.

st_iliyin_observer_6.en:: What was that thing? Where was it going?

st_iliyin_observer_7.en:: The Observer is a herald of change. It comes to us in times of great upheaval, we know nothing more beyond this.

st_iliyin_observer_8.en:: Where can we learn more about the Observer?

st_iliyin_observer_9.en:: Travel to Bright Temple, some distance inward. The Family Talot there will tell you more.

st_iliyin_fail_jo_1.en:: Commander, the Khar-Kaalad has been hit! We must withdraw!

goalTxt_h_story_D02_IliyinLighthouse_col.en:: Collect a sample of the ruins.

goalTxt_h_story_D02_IliyinLighthouse_goa.en:: Defend the fleet against the unknown attacker.

desc_story_D03_BrightTemple.en:: The Amassari here may contain answers about the nature of the Progenitor observer.

desc_story_D03_BrightTemple_heroic.en:: The Amassari here may contain answers about the nature of the Progenitor observer.

st_btemple_intro_1.en:: Commander, we have arrived at the Bright Temple.

st_btemple_intro_2.en:: Hopefully the Talot, the Amassari family living here, can tell us more about the Observer.

st_btemple_approach_1.en:: This site is holy to the Amassari. We should approach with caution.

st_btemple_challenge_2.en:: Amassari of Bright Temple, we are the Hiigarans. We-

st_btemple_challenge_3.en:: Aliens! You return to pillage our temples and desecrate our lands! May our gods smite you for your barbarity!

st_btemple_challenge_4.en:: They've cut the communication link! We are under attack!

st_btemple_retreat_1.en:: Pull back and regroup. We cannot negotiate under these circumstances.

st_btemple_escape_1.en:: We should escape and regroup, but the Amassari have activated Hyperspace Inhibitors to pin us. We must destroy them!

st_btemple_cavalry_1.en:: Hyperspace Inhibitors destroyed. We can retreat at will. Wait... The temple is under attack from another force. They're... Hiigaran?

st_btemple_blackHgn_1.en:: Finally cracked this chestnut! All teams, move in. We'll begin salvage operations as soon as we finish mopping up.

st_btemple_blackHgn_2.en:: They're broken! A bounty for anyone who can sink a squatter's ship. Leave no survivors!

st_btemple_blackHgn_3.en:: The Kiith? It would be you to appear and spoil my victory.

st_btemple_blackHgn_4.en:: I should have known we would encounter the Kiithless eventually. They have nothing but disdain for us Kiith clans. Tread carefully.

st_btemple_fail_1.en:: Commander, the Khar-Kaalad has been hit! We must withdraw!

desc_story_D04_Hataldan.en:: The fallen capital of the Amassari, and last known position of the Observer.

desc_story_D04_Hataldan_heroic.en:: The fallen capital of the Amassari, and last known position of the Observer.

s_hataldan_intro1_1.en:: Hyperspace jump complete. This is Hataldan, capital of the ancient Hagthar Empire, the ancestors of the Amassari.

s_hataldan_intro2_1.en:: The Observer is here. Tread carefully, the Amassari seem to be arranged in some sort of ritual.

s_hataldan_intro3_1.en:: As if these barbarians are any threat to us. We are here for the Observer, what do we care if we offend them?

s_hataldan_approach_1.en:: The Observer itself is sending us coordinates. I think it's an invitation to approach.

s_hataldan_interlude_1.en:: This many keepers in one place makes me nervous. Stay alert commander.

s_hataldan_observer1_1.en:: Children of Hiigara, you are welcomed. Your quest is known to us.

s_hataldan_observer2_1.en:: The ancient roads are broken, only few remain standing between your world and ours. They are remembered in a place called-

s_hataldan_abduction1_1.en:: All units, close in and secure the objective. Target hyperspace coordinates for fallback position Delta, Aurex.

s_hataldan_abduction2_1.en:: Vice Admiral Kidara, stop this! You're endangering us all!

s_hataldan_abduction3_1.en:: That's not my problem, Vice Admiral. I'm sure you Kiithid will figure it out. Meanwhile, I have a job to do. Fleet, hyperspace in five!

s_hataldan_empTut_1.en:: The Observer was the only thing keeping the Keepers from attacking. We can't let them destroy the Amassari!

s_hataldan_empTut_2.en:: Commander, my ship is equipped with an EMP weapon designed to disrupt the Keepers. We completed it after Wiracoda.

s_hataldan_empTut_3.en:: We can stun the Keepers for a short time and render them vulnerable. We only have 3 charges, make them count!

s_hataldan_fight_1.en:: The keepers are here. Avoid contact until the EMP is ready. First charge energizing now.

s_hataldan_empFired_1.en:: First EMP fired. The Keepers are stunned, it worked! Inflict as much damage as possible!

s_hataldan_empFired_2.en:: Second EMP fired. Keepers are shutting down. All ships engage!

s_hataldan_empFired_3.en:: Third EMP fired. This is our final chance to destroy the keepers, hold back nothing!

s_hataldan_empOff_1.en:: The Keepers are showing signs of reactivation! Prepare for incoming fire until the second charge is energized.

s_hataldan_empOff_2.en:: The Keepers are reactivating! Expect the attacks to resume any moment.

s_hataldan_fightWon_1.en:: The final keeper is destroyed, area cleared! We did it!

s_hataldan_conclusion_1.en:: Hiigarans, I am Elder Kotlan of the Lyad. Your bravery does not go amiss, but neither does the behavior of your ally. What are your intentions?

s_hataldan_conclusion_2.en:: We were betrayed by one of our own. On our honor as exiles, we will free the Observer and punish its captor.

s_hataldan_conclusion_3.en:: If you do this on behalf of the Makers, your name will be spoken and remembered by all Amassari. Good fortune to you.

s_hataldan_failKill_1.en:: The keepers are calling to other Progenitor automations, we must leave immediately. Initate emergency hyperspace jump!

s_hataldan_failKharKalaad_1.en:: Commander, the Khar-Kaalad has been hit! We must withdraw!

s_hataldan_failAmassari_1.en:: Commander, we failed to defend the Amassari ships. Critical mission failure!

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_introA_1.en:: Hyperspace jump complete. The Nightmare Gulf is still disrupting sensors. We would never have found this place without the Hagthar.

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_introB_1.en:: The Kiithless have built a stronghold in the nebula. There are heavy defenses. This must be Kidara's main base.

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_introC_1.en:: The Observer is here. It is being chained by EMP-beams of custom design. We must destroy these platforms to set the Observer free.

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_engage_1.en:: Kidara doesn't seem to be here, but I wouldn't rule out an ambush. Begin the attack!

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_kidaraSpawnA_1.en:: I knew you arrogant Kiithid couldn't resist one last attempt to stop our plans. It will not matter. I will crush the Amassari and bring glory to Hiigara.

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_kidaraSpawnB_1.en:: Your recklessness will kill us all! You can't just brute force your way to enlightenment, Kidara! The works of the Progenitors still contain many dangers!

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_kidaraSpawnC_1.en:: Kidara, please see reason! This path to power is the path to ruin! It destroyed the ancient Hiigarans! It destroyed the Hagthar!

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_kidaraSpawnD_1.en:: Lies and cowardice. The secrets of the Progenitors are ours. If you will not join me, then die and be forgotten as you should have been on Kharak!

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_kidaraSpawnE_1.en:: It's either Kidara's way or ours. We must stop her!

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_torpedo_1.en:: Commander, torpedoes incoming. Don't let them hit us!

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_destruct_1.en:: I curse you with my last breath, Kiithid! You'll die here with me. You will never see our Homeworld again!

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_freeObserver_1.en:: The Observer awakens. Now we shall end this conflict, together.

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_station_1.en:: You may destroy my station, but I will fight to the last!

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_failKharKalaad_1.en:: Commander, the Khar-Kaalad has been hit! We must withdraw!

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_win_1.en:: Even to the end, Kidara couldn't allow others to win. The zeal of these Kiithless is disturbing.

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_win_2.en:: She could have been so much more if she just set aside her pride for the sake of others. Now she's gone, along with all who followed her.

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_win_3.en:: What matters is that the Observer is freed. The Amassari are coming in. They're celebrating.

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_observerA_1.en:: Children of Hiigara. Continuity resumes. What was unbalanced is now steadied. The path resumes its shape.

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_observerB_1.en:: The road of the ancients is fractured. All paths to Archara are blocked by ancient order. Only one road remains that will lead you home.

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_observerC_1.en:: All paths converge at Ya' Axtche. Begin your quest at the Five Watchers. All other paths you find will fail.

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_end_1.en:: What you have done today is worthy of tales and legends, you have returned the Observer to us. Our thanks to you is without end.

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_end_2.en:: We had to make our transgression right. But we have to ask, what is Ya' Axtche? What did the Observer mean?

s_nightmareGulf_dialog_end_3.en:: It is an ancient word, one of our oldest, from before the days of our ancestors. Ya' Axtche is the World Tree, the beating heart of the universe.

desc_event_iyaFal2023_Escort_tX.en:: The missing captain has been located at an unnamed asteroid. Retrieve him at all costs.

e_iyaFall2023_escort_intro_1.en:: Hiigaran vessel, this is Captain Mahel. Praise Sajuuk you arrived, I couldn't break cover without an escort.

e_iyaFall2023_escort_intro_2.en:: We're here to assist and extract you, Captain.

e_iyaFall2023_escort_intro_3.en:: I must transmit crucial data using this base's equipment, but the Iyatequa are on to me. I can't go without escort.

e_iyaFall2023_escort_go_1.en:: We'll cover you. Begin your run.

e_iyaFall2023_escort_wave1A_1.en:: Cangacians incoming! They are coming for the bounty on my head. The Iyatequa don't want the information I have getting out.

e_iyaFall2023_escort_wave1B_1.en:: Attention, a new wave has come out of hyperspace behind us.

e_iyaFall2023_escort_mines_1.en:: Commander, we've detected a mine field ahead. We must clear the path to give Captain Mahel a straight shot to the station.

e_iyaFall2023_escort_wave2_1.en:: Commander, another wave has appeared. The bounty must be huge to send a fleet this big just for me.

e_iyaFall2023_escort_countdown_1.en:: I've docked. My crew has hooked up the transmitter... sending now.

e_iyaFall2023_escort_wave3_1.en:: More ships have emerged from Hyperspace. The Iyatequa really want this information burried.

e_iyaFall2023_escort_killAll_1.en:: Looks like the Cangaicans ran out of ships. All hostiles destroyed, proceed on mission.

e_iyaFall2023_escort_win_1.en:: Transmission to Lazarus base completed. It's done, the word is out.

e_iyaFall2023_escort_win_2.en:: The Cangacians are retreating. What information did you have?

e_iyaFall2023_escort_win_3.en:: The Iyatequa have been selling our Progenitor control codes.

e_iyaFall2023_escort_win_4.en:: If the powers here can command Progenitor units like we used to, it's going to be disasterous for the balance of power in this area.

e_iyaFall2023_escort_allyLow_1.en:: Commander, our ship is in danger! Please assist!

e_iyaFall2023_escort_fail_1.en:: Mahel's ship is destroyed! Abort mission!

e_anniversary2023_Wiracoda_intro_1.en:: Wiracoda Gate. I never imagined we'd return so soon. We were so optimistic when we first arrived here...

e_anniversary2023_Wiracoda_intro_2.en:: Time is of the essence. The Freighter containing the Negotiator must be a specific distance to the gate in order to activate. Move quickly, Commander!

e_anniversary2023_Wiracoda_go_1.en:: Admiral Enoch perished here ordering us to return home. We would honor his wishes by completing his final command.

e_anniversary2023_Wiracoda_connection_1.en:: The Freighter is in position. Standby, we are beginning system interlinks.

e_anniversary2023_Wiracoda_progIncoming_.en:: Progenitor defenses are reacting to our presence. Hold them off, don't yield this time!
Defend the Negotiator at all cost. We cannot lose it. It's our only chance to return home.

e_anniversary2023_Wiracoda_progRetreatin.en:: Commander, the Progenitors are relenting... they're becoming passive to our presence.

e_anniversary2023_Wiracoda_control_1.en:: The Negotiator is working. A little longer and we will regain control of the gate... and our route home.

e_anniversary2023_Wiracoda_cateIncoming_.en:: Hiigarans! You think you can steal the Chintamani from me and not suffer the consequences? Prepare to die!

e_anniversary2023_Wiracoda_deviceLost_1.en:: No... what have you done, fools! The Negotiator... you've ruined everything!

e_anniversary2023_Wiracoda_combat_1.en:: Commander, the Cangacian pirates are out for revenge. All ships, engage!

e_anniversary2023_Wiracoda_cateFiller_1.en:: You shoud have never come into our galaxy. I'm going to stuff your cold corpses through that hole that brought you here!

e_anniversary2023_Wiracoda_MalikComment_.en:: What in Sajuuk's name is going on?

e_anniversary2023_Wiracoda_cateRetreatin.en:: The accursed Hiigarans have angered the Makers. We'll leave them to their fate. All ships retreat!

e_anniversary2023_Wiracoda_standGround_1.en:: The cowards are fleeing. We must stand our ground. We might be able to retrieve the Negotiator's parts!

e_anniversary2023_Wiracoda_regeneration_.en:: Commander, the Keeper has just self-repaired! This ability is nothing I've seen before.

e_anniversary2023_Wiracoda_escape_1.en:: Commander, we cannot win this fight. As long as this Keeper regenerates itself, we don't stand a chance. I'm afraid we must flee the gate once again.

e_anniversary2023_Wiracoda_deviceKilled_.en:: Commander, the Progenitor Negotiator was destroyed. We failed the special operation. We must retreat immediately!

e_halloween2023_Rashidun_intro_1.en:: Hyperspace jump completed. Is this another gate? It's not on any known charts. We're not reading the errant Keeper on sensors.

e_halloween2023_Rashidun_intro_2.en:: These two corrupted derelicts emanate enormous energy. They must be the source of the Keeper's abnormal powers. We have to destroy them!

e_halloween2023_Rashidun_combat_1.en:: Commander, as long as the Keeper is energized, it will have the ability to self-repair. Avoid it for now and focus on destroying the derelicts!

e_halloween2023_Rashidun_outro_1.en:: We did it! The Keeper is eliminated. The malignant command signal has ceased. The Progenitors will halt their active phase at once.

e_halloween2023_Rashidun_outro_2.en:: Excellent work, Commander. You put a stop to the Progenitor incursion. You saved the galaxy.

e_halloween2023_Rashidun_outro_3.en:: We ended what we began by accident, but the door back home remains closed. We cannot give up on this quest. There will come another day.

e_halloween2023_Rashidun_malikRegenA_1.en:: The keeper is regenerating itself. It is pointless to attack it for now. Focus on the derelicts!

e_halloween2023_Rashidun_malikRegenB_1.en:: The keeper is still regenerating itself. It is pointless to attack it for now. Focus on the derelicts!

e_halloween2023_Rashidun_malikWeakened_1.en:: Commander, the Keeper is taking more damage than before. It's self-repair ability is weakening! Destroy the last derelict!

e_halloween2023_Rashidun_derelictWave_1.en:: Commander, the derelict is spawning a wave of hostile units!

e_halloween2023_Rashidun_derelictDownA_1.en:: The first derelict is destroyed. The energy field is weakening, but we must destroy the other one as well!

e_halloween2023_Rashidun_derelictDownB_1.en:: All derelicts neutralized. We did it! The energy field is dissipating. The Keeper is vulnerable now!

e_tanWin2023_DefendBase_intro_1.en:: Hyperspace jump completed. There's no sign of the raiders yet, we should take defensive positions.

e_tanWin2023_DefendBase_intro_2.en:: We're fortunate to make it in time. Today my people will be protected and we may learn more about our attackers as well.

e_tanWin2023_DefendBase_firstWave_1.en:: There they are. Hostile units are on approach vectors. Prepare for contact!

e_tanWin2023_DefendBase_win_1.en:: The raid has failed, we've held the line. Salvage teams are already scanning the debris for anything of interest from the attacking ships.

e_tanWin2023_DefendBase_win_2.en:: Commander, these vessels belong to the Tecuban. But why would they carry out raids against us? They've never been this desperate.

e_tanWin2023_DefendBase_win_3.en:: What are the Tecuban? Are they a people like the Chicuat, subjects of the Empire?

e_tanWin2023_DefendBase_win_4.en:: Yes. Like us, they are a people who live within the Empire. But they have never been openly hostile to us or any other. Perhaps they are taking advantage of the recent chaos?

e_tanWin2023_DefendBase_win_5.en:: Commander, we can't repel these raids forever. Like it or not, we'll need to get more involved in this internal dispute within the Empire.

e_tanWin2023_DefendBase_stationLow_1.en:: Commander, our station can't withstand much more of this. My people are dying, do something!

e_tanWin2023_DefendBase_fail_1.en:: Commander, the station just disintegrated. We've failed... we must withdraw.

e_tanWin2023_AttackBase_intro_1.en:: We've found the base. It's active with many hostiles in the area. We're outnumbered, but if we engage carefully we can maximize the element of surprise.

e_tanWin2023_AttackBase_intro_2.en:: This base is larger than I expected, which is troubling. Wipe it from this system to send a message. These raids will no longer be tolerated!

e_tanWin2023_AttackBase_alert_1.en:: Commander, we're being illuminated by active targeting. Hostile craft approaching.

e_tanWin2023_AttackBase_wave_1.en:: More enemy craft emerging from hyperspace.

e_tanWin2023_AttackBase_boss_1.en:: More enemies... strange... are that Vaygr craft? What are they doing here?

e_tanWin2023_AttackBase_vaygr_1.en:: Hiigarans! Eliminate them immediately, there must be no witnesses!

e_tanWin2023_AttackBase_win_1.en:: All threats neutralized. There was no sign of Heyoka, but the Vaygr appearing here raises a lot of questions.

e_tanWin2023_AttackBase_win_2.en:: Who are these Vaygr? I have heard of the name, but nothing more.

e_tanWin2023_AttackBase_win_3.en:: The Vaygr are enemies of ours from a war almost two decades ago. Somehow they're here in Nimbus too.

e_tanWin2023_AttackBase_win_4.en:: So the Tecuban have allied with these Vaygr to pillage my people? This... this is worse than I imagined.

e_tanWin2023_AttackBase_win_5.en:: You have powerful allies now as well. If the Vaygr are involved, this is our fight too. Together we'll get to the bottom of this.

e_tanWin2023_Relic_intro_1.en:: Commander, the Vaygr are ahead. They appear to be patrolling a Progenitor artifact.

e_tanWin2023_Relic_intro_2.en:: Why are these Vaygr interested in objects from the Makers?

e_tanWin2023_Relic_intro_3.en:: To fulfill an ancient prophecy, originally. Like us the Vaygr understand how to use these ancient devices.

e_tanWin2023_Relic_contact_1.en:: Hiigarans! You are meddling in affairs that are not of your business. May death be your reward!

e_tanWin2023_Relic_wave_1.en:: More Vaygr are emerging from hyperspace, Commander.

e_tanWin2023_Relic_boss_1.en:: You are far from home, Hiigarans! You will die here forgotten!

e_tanWin2023_Relic_boss_low_1.en:: Curse you, Hiigarans! You will never spoil the plans of Jochik Kaan, heir to the rightful Saju-ka!

e_tanWin2023_Relic_win_1.en:: All hostiles defeated. So Jochik Kaan is pulling the strings in this conflict. He must have some deeper plan here for the Vaygr to be this involved.

e_tanWin2023_Relic_win_2.en:: Yet another ruthless leader behind the attacks upon my people? It is not enough for the Tecuban to turn against us?

e_tanWin2023_Relic_win_3.en:: We must discover what Jochik Kaan is trying to achieve here. Once we do, we'll put a stop to it.

e_tanWin2023_Academy_intro_1.en:: Commander, the Vaygr are already in-system. Are we too late?

e_tanWin2023_Academy_heyoka_1.en:: You've obstructed my plans for the last time, Heyoka! I have no use for disobedient fools!

e_tanWin2023_Academy_situation_1.en:: The Vaygr are attacking the Tecuban? What is happening?

e_tanWin2023_Academy_hiigarans_1.en:: My lord, the Hiigarans have arrived. They are approaching for battle.

e_tanWin2023_Academy_combat_1.en:: All my enemies have gathered... no matter. We will crush them all and take what we came for.

e_tanWin2023_Academy_academyLow_1.en:: The Academy is under attack! Commander, do something!

e_tanWin2023_Academy_failAcademy_1.en:: The Academy has fallen... we can't stop Jochik. All ships, retreat immediately!

e_tanWin2023_Academy_jochikDownA_1.en:: Reposition the flagship. Deploy the reserves. Destroy the Hiigarans!

e_tanWin2023_Academy_jochikDownB_1.en:: Savor your insignificant victory today, Hiigarans! I will crush you the next time we meet. Consider that a promise.

e_tanWin2023_Academy_JochikReturn_1.en:: Jochik has returned. All forces, engage his ship immediately!

e_tanWin2023_Academy_tepin_1.en:: Commander, I've come to assist you! Our people shall not fail today!

e_tanWin2023_Academy_failTepin_1.en:: Tepin Papan's vessel was destroyed. We can't stop Jochik. All ships, retreat immediately!

e_tanWin2023_Academy_win_1.en:: The Tlapallan Academy is safe. My people are protected and our enemies are on the run... I can't believe we prevailed.

e_tanWin2023_Academy_win_2.en:: The Tecuban have retreated. It seems Heyoka tried to get to the relic before Jochik did, and paid the price.

e_tanWin2023_Academy_win_3.en:: His greed brought him to pillage the future of my people for his own gratification. I don't mourn his death.

e_tanWin2023_Academy_win_4.en:: Our people are safe for now, but the Chicuat need a voice to speak on their behalf among our allies. Toci, you could be that voice among the Hiigarans.

e_tanWin2023_Academy_win_5.en:: We would be grateful to have you aboard, Toci. Your people are always welcome among us.

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_intro_1.en:: Blessings, Hiigarans The People are relieved that you are here. The pilgrimage will begin moving to the conjunction point.

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_intro_2.en:: Greetings. We are ready to assist the convoy. All ships on full alert, keep your eye out for incoming pirates.

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_interlude_1.en:: Behold the splendor of the Maker's works. We are blessed that they have lasted this long after the cataclysm. Truly a timeless wonder.

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_arrival_1.en:: More pilgrim ships have arrived to see the conjuction. Bless the Makers.

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_deviation_1.en:: Chocoan what's going on? You're deviating from the path! We must protect the perimeter.

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_deviation_2.en:: It must be done. Our ways are... not to be questioned by outsiders. Please, maintain defensive positions.

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_attackA_1.en:: Hostiles incoming. Protect the pilgrims. Intercept the attackers!

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_attackB_1.en:: More attacks incoming. Chocoan, we need your help here!

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_change_1.en:: More hostile incoming. Chocoan, what the hell is going on? We need your help or civilians will die!

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_change_2.en:: I... I cannot... do this any longer. We are coming to your aid, and to the hells with the Elders and their ambition!

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_catequil_1.en:: So we meet again, Hiigarans. You won't stop me this time. I'll have that treasure, even if I have to rip it out of every ship I see! Do not let any of them escape!

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_catequilLow_1.en:: You won't always be so fortunate Hiigarans! A thousand curses upon you and your works!

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_win_1.en:: Perimeter is clear. The attack is over. The pilgrims are safe.

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_win_2.en:: Under the grace of the Makers, the pilgrims are safe with minimal casualties. Thank you, Commander.

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_conjunctionA_1.en:: The Conjunction is the clearest sign that our Makers were powerful and wise. The messages they left in the alignment of the stars are profound, even if their exact meaning is lost.

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_conjunctionB_1.en:: Though there are signs and portents of a great change coming, there is hope also in this change. Yes there is uncertainty, but the signs point to a great relief.

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_end_1.en:: Chocoan, what was going on back there?

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_end_2.en:: I can only confess. Our Elders pervert these pilgrimages with their own causes and ambitions. We rake the ruins of the Makers, scoop them into our hulls, for some reason.

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_end_3.en:: They're looking for some Progenitor technology in those asteroids, aren't they?

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_end_4.en:: It would seem to be so. The Elders will surely take retribution for my failure, so I am without a place for I surely cannot return. I am no longer Envoy, or shephard, of my people.

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_end_5.en:: You are always welcome among us, Chocoan. The warmth you showed your people could be a great asset to us as an envoy to the Yaot in the future.

e_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_fail_1.en:: Commander, we have Pilgrim ships going down. Critical mission failure. Abort immediately.

goalTxt_h_event_yaoSpr2024_Conjunction_g.en:: Escort the pilgrimage to the conjunction point.

desc_strike_01_PirateHideout.en:: A lot of pirate activity has been reported in this region. The local pirate faction must have a major base here. Our task is to find the base, and destroy any pirate vessel and structure in this sector.

desc_RaidMission001-H.en:: A lot of pirate activity has been reported in this region. The local pirate faction must have a major base here.

desc_strike_01_PirateHideout_heroic.en:: A lot of pirate activity has been reported in this region. The local pirate faction must have a major base here. Our task is to find the base, and destroy any pirate vessel and structure in this sector.

Raid001_start_1.en:: We have new intelligence revealing a pirate hideout.

Raid001_start_2.en:: But their main fleet is not anywhere on sensors.

Raid001_start_3.en:: We should take this chance and wipe out this base before their fleet returns.

Raid001_boss_1.en:: The pirate fleet has returned! Let's finish them off!

Raid001_finish_1.en:: The pirate fleet has been destroyed. Prisoners were collected among the survivors and we're collecting salvage.

Raid001_finish_2.en:: Great work! I think the locals will appreciate the one less pirate base in the area.

desc_strike_02_StationDefense.en:: Traders have requested our assistance in an upcoming attack by pirates.

desc_strike_02_StationDefense_heroic.en:: We have received intel that enemy forces are planning to attack a local trading station. In order to defend the station, we must immediately move our fleet into defensive position.

desc_strike_02_StationDefense_mythic.en:: We have received intel that enemy forces are planning to attack a local trading station. In order to defend the station, we must immediately move our fleet into defensive position.

Raid002_dialog_start_1.en:: It looks like we beat the enemy fleet here. We should get into position while we have the time!

Raid002_dialog_beacons_1.en:: The enemies have hijacked the nav beacons remotely. We cannot disable them in time, we have no choice but to destroy them!

Raid002_dialog_beaconsdone1_1.en:: One beacon has been destroyed. Three more beacons to go.

Raid002_dialog_beaconsdone2_1.en:: Two beacons have been destroyed. This should slow down the pirate fleet considerably.

Raid002_dialog_beaconsdone3_1.en:: Three beacons have been destroyed. Almost there.

Raid002_dialog_boss_1.en:: Something large has just emerged from hyperspace. It's the main pirate fleet! Defend the station!

Raid002_dialog_finish_1.en:: The invaders have been repelled. It may take some time to rebuild the nav beacons, but the station should be safe again.

Raid002_dialog_fail_1.en:: The station is lost. Fortunately most of the inhabitants evacuated during the battle.

desc_strike_03_PahrasRock.en:: The presence of a large Cangacian asteroid base in this area has been threatening the Hiigaran settlements. Our task is to perform an attack on this base, destroy it and any Cangacian fleet nearby.

desc_strike_03_PahrasRock_heroic.en:: The presence of a large Cangacian asteroid base in this area has been threatening the Hiigaran settlements. Our task is to perform an attack on this base, destroy it and any Cangacian fleet nearby.

desc_strike_03_PahrasRock_mythic.en:: The presence of a large Cangacian asteroid base in this area has been threatening the Hiigaran settlements. Our task is to perform an attack on this base, destroy it and any Cangacian fleet nearby.

Raid003_dialog_start_1.en:: This base belongs to a group called the Fleet of Rams. It's in a position to threaten any other Hiigaran fleets that arrive in the area.

Raid003_dialog_start_2.en:: Now that we're in contact with enough allied fleets, we can strike this base and wipe it out.

Raid003_dialog_hp80_1.en:: The Fleet of Rams is here. Proceed with caution.

Raid003_dialog_hp60_1.en:: Another group of pirates appeared on our flank!

Raid003_dialog_hp40_1.en:: It looks like their flagship just emerged from hyperspace. The enemy commander is identifying himself as... Catequil the devisor. Sounds pretentious.

Raid003_dialog_hp40_2.en:: Who? Hiigarans? I don't have time for this nuisance. Eliminate them!

Raid003_dialog_hp40_3.en:: Here they come, prepare for a fight!

Raid003_dialog_finish_1.en:: The enemy base has been destroyed and Catequil is on the run. We did it!

Raid003_dialog_finish_2.en:: You have my attention now, Hiigarans. You'll regret this on our next meeting!

Raid003_dialog_finish_3.en:: Any other Hiigaran refugees in the area will be in the clear, now. But we'll need to be wary of this Fleet of Rams... I have a feeling they'll be back.

desc_strike_04_Breach.en:: Sitting in a safe pocket inside an electromagnetic asteroid field, this station is a crucial base of operation. As it is heavily defended, we came up with the cunning plan to fill an old freighter with explosives and escort it to the base.

desc_strike_04_Breach_heroic.en:: Sitting in a safe pocket inside an electromagnetic asteroid field, this station is a crucial base of operation. As it is heavily defended, we came up with the cunning plan to fill an old freighter with explosives and escort it to the base.

st_breach_intro_1_1.en:: We've arrived at the target destination. This base is sitting in a crucial defensive position. Escort the freighter filled with explosives to the station to destroy it.

st_breach_intro_1_2.en:: Commander, be aware. The asteroid belt here produces strong electrical discharges that will damage our ships if we get too close.

st_breach_turrets01Destroyed_1.en:: Take out the second line of defense.

st_breach_turrets02Destroyed_1.en:: Take out the last line of defense.

st_breach_turrets03Destroyed_1.en:: All turrets down, let's begin the assault on the base!

st_breach_armExplosives_1.en:: Commander, you have to defend the ship while we arm the explosives!

st_breach_explosion_1.en:: Explosives armed, 10 seconds before she goes!

st_breach_fail_1.en:: The freighter has been destroyed, we must abort mission!

st_breach_win_1.en:: The enemy have been vanquished, great work!

goalTxt_h_strike_04_Breach_g_killTurrets.en:: Destroy the first line of turrets.
Destroy the second line of turrets.
Destroy the third line of turrets.

desc_strike_05_NightmareGulf.en:: A base used by Kiithless raiders has been located in this area of the Nightmare Gulf. A large attack force will be needed to destroy it and free the Progenitor assets held at this location.

str_nightmareGulf_dialog_engage_1.en:: Kidara doesn't seem to be here, but I wouldn't rule out an ambush. Begin the attack!

str_nightmareGulf_dialog_kidara_1.en:: I knew you arrogant Kiithid couldn't resist one last attempt to stop our plans. It will not matter, I will crush you and bring glory to Hiigara!

str_nightmareGulf_dialog_station_1.en:: You may destroy my station, but I will fight to the last!

str_nightmareGulf_dialog_reinforcements_.en:: Kiithless reinforcements have entered the area in response to their distress signal. We must destroy that base!

str_nightmareGulf_dialog_freeObserver_1.en:: The Observer awakens. Now we shall end this conflict, together.

str_nightmareGulf_dialog_destruct_1.en:: I curse you with my last breath, Kiithid! You'll die here with me. You will never see our Homeworld again!

str_nightmareGulf_dialog_end_1.en:: Kidara's defeated, the Observer has been freed, and the Kiithless have been routed. All objectives completed... mission successful.

goalTxt_h_strike_05_NightmareGulf_goal_d.en:: Destroy the Kiithless station to stop reinforcements.

Raid004_Intro.en:: We're detecting what looks like a Tanoch civilian vessel in the area. We should close in and investigate.

Raid004_TanPlead.en:: Hiigaran craft, this is the Opochtli, out of Xelasii. We are under attack by Yaot forces, they are demanding we surrender our VIP. Please help, we can't repulse them for long!

Raid004_MissionExplained.en:: If the Yaot capture this VIP there's no telling what kind of intelligence the Yaot can extract from him. We need to intervene.

Raid004_killCommands.en:: The Yaot are reinforcing their positions with their command ships. We should neutralize them so we have a chance to clear the area.

Raid004_boss.en:: Another enemy battlegroup has just entered the area. Stay alert!

Raid004_TanReachPos.en:: Thank you Hiigarans. Our hyperdrive is damaged, but repairs are in progress. Please keep the attackers off of us until our engines are repaired so we can jump to safety.

Raid004_VIPMoving.en:: Our engines are operational! Thank you Hiigarans, we are departing the area. Xelasii is in your debt.

Raid004_missionComplete.en:: Well done commander, the Tanoch are departing and the VIP is safe.

goalTxt_h_strike_x_CombatInvestigation_r.en:: Defend while the tanoch VIP escapes

desc_strike_x_DownTheWell.en:: A distress call is received from the edge of a hazard zone.

Raid005_Landing.en:: Hyperspace jump complete. The distress signal isn't too far away.

Raid005_Intro_1.en:: The Amassari ships are hailing us

Raid005_Intro_2.en:: Vessel! We are in need of assistance. Our command ship is stranded beyond the meteor shield. You have to help us, there are civilians onboard!

Raid005_Intro_3.en:: How do we pass through this shield?

Raid005_Intro_4.en:: Two pillars generate the meteor shield that keeps the asteroids contained. They will need to be disabled so that you can pass, but the barrier repairs itself quickly. Be warned also, the Kakahl Amassari do not take kindly to interlopers. Please hurry!

Raid005_Intro_5.en:: If we help them they may be able to give us some assistance in this region. We should split up, one command per each base. We'll have to time our assault to drop both bases at the same time to allow entry.

Raid005_Base_1.en:: There it is. The structure is Amassari make, a form of Gravity well Generator used to keep asteroids in place. This was probably a holding area for a large mining operation. We're being contacted.

Raid005_Base_2.en:: We do not welcome strangers on our mining grounds! Begone! or be destroyed!

Raid005_Base_3.en:: We need to rescue the command ship trapped within the field. If you can drop the barrier to rescue the ship, then we have no cause for conflict.

Raid005_Base_4.en:: Their fate is already sealed. We will not warn you again!

Raid005_DBase_1.en:: The field is disabled! The Amassari are already trying to get it online, move quickly to disable the other!

Raid005_DBase_2.en:: Both bases are down! The gravity field is disabled, we must move in and repair the command ship to escort it out of here!

Raid005_WreckShip_1.en:: Vessel, this is the Hiigaran fleet. Standby for assistance.

Raid005_WreckShip_2.en:: The creed delivers! We had given up all hope. We stand ready to receive you, Hiigarans.

Raid005_WreckShip_3.en:: Their hyperdrives will be repaired momentarily but they need to make it out of the asteroid field to activate them, lets stick around until then.

Raid005_LastBattle.en:: A large group of hostile ships is approaching!

Raid005_BossDead.en:: I think they can take it from here. Well done!

Raid005_GateUp.en:: We waited too long, the gate node is back online. I'm not certain if we'll be able to disable it again. We'll need to leave the area, there's nothing more we can do.

goalTxt_h_strike_x_DownTheWell_victim_es.en:: Protect the civilian ship while it escapes

Cinematic_001_001.en:: It is fifteen years into the age of S’jet

Cinematic_001_002.en:: Fifteen years since the warlord Makaan met his end at Balcora...

Cinematic_001_003.en:: ...and the Hiigarans claimed the mantle of wisdom left by the ancients.

Cinematic_001_004.en::
In this time of peace and rebuilding, the Hiigarans embraced the gifts of the Progenitors.
Guided by Sajuuk, new doors of understanding opened to them.

Cinematic_001_005.en:: However, as those with no Kiith gained power on Hiigara, the ancient clans turned their ambitions outward.

Cinematic_001_005b.en:: In spite of the pleas by Karan S’jet, each Kiith set out from Hiigara to forge their own destinies.

Cinematic_001_006.en::
Each Kiith and Clan began to construct their own fleets once again. Though the Hiigaran people were unified by destiny,
new ambitions began seeking different paths. All of the kiith were going their own way.

Cinematic_001_007.en:: All of them were chasing the lost dream of the Progenitors.

Cinematic_002_002.en:: Cast out of their world, the old Kiith clans departed. Some would never return.

Cinematic_002_003.en:: As the Age of S’jet dawned across the universe, the Clans became exiles once again. Among the stars, they sought a new destiny.

Cinematic_002_004.en::
The ancient hyperspace gates beckoned travelers towards new and uncertain worlds.
With desperation and hope, the Kiith cast their ambitions through the gates.

Cinematic_002_005.en:: What lay beyond would change their fortunes forever.

Cinematic_007_001.en:: This is my final order to you, Commander.

Cinematic_007_002.en:: Do not allow our people to die in this place.

Cinematic_007_003.en:: Find a way to return through the gates. Fight your way across the universe, if you must.

Cinematic_007_004.en:: Do not let the story of our clans end here among these unfamiliar stars.

Cinematic_007_005.en:: Bring our people home safely. Return to Hiigara. Farewell.

Cinematic_007_006.en::
There is no sign of the Riif-Sa. Or the Khar-Kaalad.
No Hiigaran signal traffic of any kind is detected.

Cinematic_003_001.en:: With great fanfare and jubilation, the Hiigarans were welcomed into the Palace of the Elder Sun.

Cinematic_003_002.en::
The young Emperor, Cazoma, greeted them with intense interest.
Assailing them with questions, he welcomed the Hiigarans as guests within his domain.

Cinematic_003_003.en::
But another resided as guests among the Tanoch. Introduced as a friend and fellow galactic traveller,
Cazoma revealed what could not be true.

Cinematic_003_004.en:: Jochik Kaan: Son of Makaan, and Lord of the Vaygr.

Cinematic_004_001.en:: The Vaygr's betrayal is complete. The Throne World of Tanoch is in flames. Cazoma, Emperor of the Tanoch people, is missing.

Cinematic_004_002.en:: In this desperate hour the remaining leaders of the Tanoch turn to the Hiigarans. Placing their trust in the Hiigarans, they share what they know about the Vaygr.

Cinematic_004_003.en:: The mounting evidence showed the Vaygr were here for a purpose, and they were close to seizing their objective....

Cinematic_004_004.en:: ...an ancient facility, containing what may be one of the only Progenitor super weapons in existence.

Cinematic_004_005.en:: We must stop the Vaygr before they can reach this facility and retreive the Progenitor weapon.

Cinematic_004_006.en:: Hiigara itself may depend on us to stop them.

Cinematic_006_001.en:: Recovered records from the Tanoch reveal little about the area of the Galaxy we are about to enter.

Cinematic_006_002.en:: Their knowledge ends at a zone, that they have called the Nightmare Gulf.

Cinematic_006_003.en:: The Zone is defined by a dense, dark nebula of enormous size.

Cinematic_006_004.en:: We have also detected unusual quantum phenomena, which blocks normal hyperspace travel.

Cinematic_006_005.en:: This kind of anomaly at this scale could have only been created by the Progenitors, possibly another scar from whatever cataclysm which destroyed their civilization.

Cinematic_006_006.en:: There is no information about what lies beyond the zone. Not even myths...

Cinematic_005_001.en:: I am Vice Admiral Kidara Sasan, commanding Task Force Amalek. Our objective is to locate the gate nexus in this galaxy, secure it for the Hiigaran Empire, and unlock travel between our galaxy and this one.

Cinematic_005_002.en:: I am convinced the ancient Amassari knew of its location. We have been scouring their structures in search of further evidence to point us in the right direction. Our next destination is their ancient capital of Hataldan.

Cinematic_005_003.en:: Vice Admiral, the Progenitor ruins and Amassari structures on them here belong to the Amassari. I can't abide further attacks on their sovereignty with military force.

Cinematic_005_004.en:: Your Kiith have the nerve to claim you respect the sovereignty of those who live here! The Amassari are in the way of the Hiigaran Empire. They will be swept aside, as all others have been, so we can claim our destiny.

Cinematic_005_005.en:: Must the road to Hiigaran ascendancy be paved with the blood of innocents? These are their homes, Vice Admiral!

Cinematic_005_006.en:: Where was this bleeding compassion when six hundred thousand Kushan invaders seized Hiigara? Your hypocrisy disgusts me. We are advancing on Hataldan. It's up to you if you want to follow.

skill_missileBarrage_desc.en:: Fires a volley of missiles at one target, dealing massive damage.

skill_ionCannonTriggering_desc.en:: Triggers a focused ion cannon shot that cripple's the targets weapon systems, slowing down rate of fire for a few seconds.

skill_kineticBurstAttack_desc.en:: Overclocks the ship's mass driver turrets, increasing firerate.

skill_heavyTorpedo_desc.en:: Fires a single torpedo with a heavier than normal payload.

skill_EMP_desc.en:: Fires an EMP capsule, disabling the target ship or squad.

skill_fusionMissile_desc.en:: Launches a single missile with a heavier than normal payload. Effective against capital ships.

skill_repairBurst_desc.en:: Controlled overload of repair module restores armor of nearby ships.

skill_pulseBurstAttack_desc.en:: Overclocks the ship's pulsar turrets, increasing firerate.

statMod_wpn_empeffect.en:: Disables target ship's engine and weapon systems.

missionExitedText.en:: You can make changes to your fleet before the next mission.

missionFinishedText.en::
Good job.
Here is your reward!

Change flagship?

missionFailureWarning.en:: Critical mission failure! Engaging emergency hyperjump.

miningStopWarning.en:: Storage capacity reached. Halting mining operations.

ejectItemConfirm.en:: Destroy this object? This action cannot be undone.

miningBlockOverburdened.en:: Our storage is over capacity. We cannot conduct further mining.

travelBlockOverburdened.en:: Our storage is over capacity. We cannot travel to this destination.

travelBlockTierRestriction.en:: Our fleet doesn't match the Tier of this location. We cannot travel to this destination.

buyBlockOverburdened.en:: Our storage is over capacity. We cannot purchase goods.

travelHyperjumpStrengthBlock.en:: Our hyperjump core is not powerful enough for this jump. We need to upgrade our drives or research hyperjump capacity technologies.

errorInsufficientStrikeTokens.en:: You do not have enough Code Fragments. Participate in strikes to earn more.

errorInsufficientLoyaltyPoints.en:: You do not have enough Prestige points. Complete Daily/Weekly assignments to earn more.

errorInsufficient_ac_resources.en:: You do not have enough Clan Credits. Complete clan assignments to earn more.

errorInsufficient_as_resources.en:: You do not have enough Clan Supplies. Complete clan assignments to earn more.

errorStrikeUnavailable.en:: Strikes are currently unavailable. Please try again later.

errorInsufficientRefinedElements.en:: You do not have enough refined materials of this type. Mine ore in asteroid clusters and refine it in your flagship's refinery.

deathStateDesc.en:: We must jump away to the nearest station immediately!

dialogNoFindNothingLeft_InSystem_dia.en:: There are no more signals in this system to detect. We should come back tomorrow.

dialogNoFindAtCurrent_InSystem_dia.en:: Our scanner's current detection power is not strong enough to find the remaining objects in this system.

dialogNoFindAtMax_InSystem_dia.en:: There are no more signals in this system we can detect with the current level of our scanner.

dialogNoFindNothingLeft_InGalaxy_dia.en:: There are no systems in range that could be detected. We should try to scan the galaxy from somewhere else.

dialogNoFindAtCurrent_InGalaxy_dia.en:: Our scanner's current detection power is not strong enough to find the systems within our current range.

dialogNoFindAtMax_InGalaxy_dia.en:: The level of our scanner is not sufficient to detect the systems within our current range.

commandInvalid.en:: [{@command}] is not a valid command. Type /help for more information.

commandHint_SwitchChannelIndex.en:: Switch to a different chat channel, from 1 to 99, Available only for Global and System channels.

facOfficeIntro_Tanoch.en:: Greetings commander. The Tanoch Empire has need of ships like yours to maintain security in this area of the galaxy.

facOfficeIntro_Yaot.en:: Welcome! The Yaot Federation is always willing to accept help resolving some of our outstanding tasks.

facOfficeIntro_Amassari.en:: We rarely see outsiders in this area of space, but our doors are open to you. Welcome!

Error_invalid_flagship_Body.en::
There was an error with your flagship and automated attempts to repair it have failed.

Please reach out to our customer support on our Discord server to get this issue resolved.

m_unequippedModules_body.en::
There was an error with your flagship. In order to repair it, some modules have been dismounted.

Please check your flagship and re-mount any wanted modules again.

m_liaisonUnlock_body.en:: The Iyatequa have opened their liaison office. You can contact them at the nearest trading station.

m_scannerQuest_battery_body.en::
Due to your past accomplishments, you have earned this item: An epic battery.

Use the battery on your scanner to recharge it once depleted or even overcharge it past 100%. An overcharged scanner is better at finding certain objects. Note that the battery is consumed after use.

m_internalModuleUnlock_body.en:: You can now configure the interior of your flagship using special internal modules.

m_factionWarUnlock_body.en:: You can now take part in the Sarassian Wars. Pledge to a faction and help it achieve victory to earn unique rewards.

m_hyperCap_t5_unlock_body.en::
Due to your past accomplishments, you have earned this research project: Hyperspace Jump Limit T5

Research it to access Tier 5 space.

m_unequippedOfficers_body.en:: The bridge configuration has changed, and as a result, one or more of your bridge officers has been unassigned. You can reassign them to your bridge like normal.

cancelProcessConfirm.en:: Do you want to cancel the current process? There will be no refund for your resources!

cancelConstructionConfirm.en:: Do you want to cancel the current construction? There will be no refund for your resources!

cancelFabricationConfirm.en:: Do you want to cancel the current fabrication process? There will be no refund for your resources!

cancelResearchConfirm.en:: Do you want to cancel the current research? There will be no refund for your resources!

cancelRefiningConfirm.en:: Do you want to cancel the current refining process? There will be no refund for your resources!

expl_HUD_navigationBar.en::
Navigation
Toggle between fleet view, star system map and galaxy map​.

expl_HUD_vMenu.en:: Flagship menu, use abilities and manage squads & weapons here​.

expl_HUD_hMenu.en::
Your Fleet
Double tap on ship to focus camera​.

expl_HUD_objectiveBox.en::
Current goals
Tap on upper right to open quest log​.

expl_HUD_sensor.en:: Tap during mission to open sensor view.​

expl_HUD_autoCombatConsole.en::
Auto combat console​
Allows you to manage your whole fleet behaviour during combat.

expl_HUD_outliner.en::
Target list​
Use the filters on the side to show different content​.

expl_HUD_communications.en::
Communication panel​
Important messages will display here​.

expl_Manufacturing_modules.en:: You can select a factory and check the progress of each with the tabs on the side​.

expl_Manufacturing_main.en:: Factory modules allow you to construct new strike craft, modules and other items.​

expl_Manufacturing_grid.en:: Here you can see a list of all your available blueprints.

expl_Manufacturing_context.en:: Set the number of items you want to fabricate and tap on manufacture to start the process​.

expl_Manufacturing_officer.en:: You can assign an officer to each factory module to increase its efficiency.​

expl_Refinery_modules.en:: You can select a refinery and check the progress of each with the tabs on the side​.

expl_Refinery_main.en:: Use the refinery to process your crude resources into usable materials for construction​.

expl_Refinery_grid.en:: Here you can see your crude resources​.

expl_Refinery_context.en:: Set the amount you want to refine and tap on refine to start the process​.

expl_Refinery_officer.en:: You can assign an officer to each refinery module to increase its efficiency.

expl_Shop_grid.en::
The shop lists all items for sale.​
​
Tap on an item to view its information.

Add it to your cart by tapping on the price button.

expl_Shop_cart.en:: When you add an item to the cart, it will show here.​

expl_Shop_buy.en:: When you are done, tap on purchase.​

expl_Research_modules.en:: You can select a laboratory and check the progress of each with the tabs on the side​.

expl_Research_main.en::
Research modules allow you to conduct research to create better blueprints or enhance your fleet.​

Tap a research project to select.​

expl_Research_researchPoints.en:: They also produce research points automatically. Collect RP frequently as a laboratory can hold only so much knowledge.​

expl_Research_researching.en:: While a laboratory is researching it will not produce research points.​

expl_Research_officers.en:: You can assign an officer to each research module to increase its efficiency.​

expl_Bridge_player.en:: This is you​. Tap to change your avatar.​

expl_Bridge_main.en::
Assign officers to your bridge to enhance your fleet in various ways. Each bridge officer slot has a different effect.​
As with other officer jobs, the quality of your officer determines the effect.​

expl_Bridge_activeSkill.en:: Bridge officers with​ active abilities will​ grant these to your​ flagship.​

expl_Bridge_firstOfficer.en:: Your first officer increases the efficiency of your entire crew​.

expl_Bridge_securityOfficer.en:: Your security officer enhances your weapon systems​.

expl_Bridge_scienceOfficer.en:: Your science officer enhances scanners and research​.

expl_Bridge_navigationOfficer.en:: Your navigation officer enhances your ship's engine​.

expl_ExternalsSideView_module.en:: Tap on a module to open the module details.​

expl_ExternalsSideView_main.en:: Your external modules are primarily used for combat purposes.​

expl_ExternalsSideView_outliner.en:: Use the target list​ to quickly navigate your modules and to switch between internal and external view.​

expl_Shipyard_main.en:: In the shipyard you can construct new escort ships and flagships.

expl_Shipyard_grid.en:: Select one of the available blueprints here​.

expl_Shipyard_manufacture.en:: Tap on manufacture to start the construction process.​

expl_InternalsSideView_storage.en:: Manage your inventory in the storage.​

expl_InternalsSideView_squads.en:: Manage your squads in the squad management.​

expl_InternalsSideView_factory.en:: Produce new items in the factory.​

expl_InternalsSideView_bridge.en:: Assign your bridge crew in the bridge.​

expl_InternalsSideView_research.en:: Conduct research in the research section.​

expl_InternalsSideView_refinery.en:: Refine your raw resources in the refinery.​

expl_InternalsSideView_outliner.en:: Use the target list​ to quickly navigate your modules and to switch between internal and external view.​

expl_InternalsSideView_main.en:: Your internal modules are primarily used for production and economic management.​

expl_Inventory_grid.en:: In the storage you can see the items you have stored in your flagship's cargo bay.​

expl_Inventory_details.en:: Details of a selected item are displayed here​.

expl_Inventory_officer.en:: Assign an officer to your storage to increase your storage space​.

expl_Inventory_filters.en:: Use the filters to search for specific types of items.

expl_Hangar_main.en::
You can manage the squads in your hangars here​.

Tap a slot to select it.

expl_Hangar_pilots.en:: Assign officers to each individual squad as a pilot. They will enhance that squad's combat capability.​

expl_Hangar_details.en::
Tap on [ADD] to define a new squad and ready it for the hangar​.

Tap on [DISBAND] to remove a squad and free the slot. The ships will be returned into your storage.

expl_Hangar_officer.en:: Assign an officer to strike craft control to slightly increase the combat capability of all of your squads.

expl_Escorts_main.en::
You can manage the escort ships in your fleet here​.

Tap a slot to select it.

expl_Escorts_officers.en:: Assign officers to each individual escort as captain. They will enhance the squad's combat capability.​

expl_Escorts_details.en::
Tap on [ADD] to add a new escort ship to your fleet.​

Tap on [DISBAND] to remove an escort ship and free the slot. The ship will still be available in the future from any trading station.​

expl_Externals_main.en:: In this menu you can mount new modules, upgrade them and assign officers.

expl_Externals_grid.en::
Here is a list of all your modules. Tap to select.​

Currently mounted modules are marked with a small green arrow.​

expl_Externals_details.en:: You can find the details of the currently selected module here​.

expl_Externals_mountUpgrade.en:: You can only mount or upgrade modules when you are docked to a trading station.

expl_Externals_officers.en:: Assign officers to each module. They will increase its efficiency.​

expl_Externals_outliner.en:: You can find the details of the currently selected module here​.

expl_Externals_module.en::
Here is a list of all your modules. Tap to select.​

Currently mounted modules are marked with a small green arrow.​

expl_GalaxyMap_main.en::
In the galaxy map you can see the various star systems you can travel to.​

Tap on a system to select it and then view to enter the star system map of that system.

expl_GalaxyMap_outliner.en::
Target list​
The categories can show all star systems or only those with objectives.​

expl_GalaxyMap_objectives.en:: Systems with objectives in them are marked as such on the galaxy map.​

expl_SystemMap_main.en::
In the star system map, you can see the various celestial bodies and other destinations of this system.​

Tap on a destination to select it and jump there through the information window.

expl_SystemMap_outliner.en::
Target list​​
The categories can show objectives, planets, asteroid clusters and trading stations.​

disclaimer_text.en::
Welcome to the technical test of Homeworld Mobile!
Since this is an early in development build, please be aware that the state of gameplay, content and user interface do not represent the final state of the game.

Please, no sharing or streaming!

nda_text.en::
Since this is a Technical Test we’re asking everyone to agree not to share information about the game with outside parties. To continue, please read and agree to the following Participant Agreement.

Closed Technical Testing Participant Agreement

By accepting this agreement with the [ACCEPT] button below, you (“You” or “Your”) agree to be bound by the terms of this Agreement as of this day (the “Effective Date”), between You, Gearbox Software, LLC (“Developer”) and Gearbox Publishing, LLC (“Publisher”), collectively known as “Gearbox.”

You are invited to participate in the upcoming pre-release version(s) of Homeworld Mobile (the “Game”) made available to You for testing (“Closed Technical Test”). As Gearbox's condition for providing You access to the Closed Technical Test, You acknowledge that You understand and agree to the following:

1. Confidentiality. The Closed Technical Test is confidential. During the Closed Technical Test, all elements of the Game are to be kept confidential, and You agree to keep everything related to the Game and Closed Technical Test secret from everyone who is not participating in the Closed Technical Test until Gearbox informs you that the Closed Technical Test is no longer confidential. This means (as an example), You will not discuss the Game or Closed Technical Test in blogs or online discussion groups, stream, take videos or screenshots of the Game, or email, share or otherwise distribute files containing screenshots of the Game. As an example, and not limitation, You agree that You will not disclose any of the following during the Closed Technical Test:
a. Information related to the Game, such as the Game’s look and feel, playable factions, combat, story, communication, game systems, non-player character interaction, upgrades, stability of the Game, etc.

2. Feedback. During and after the Closed Technical Test, You may be provided with an opportunity to give Gearbox Your comments, suggestions and impressions of the Game by using tools to supply feedback and bug reports, internal websites and forums, and other methods. The Game may also include a tool that will allow Your device to forward system information to Gearbox in the event of a crash. This tool will collect data from Your device related to the crash and allow You to forward a report to Gearbox via electronic mail. You accept and agree that Gearbox owns (and You hereby assign to Gearbox) all of Your right, title and interest in and to any and all such data that Gearbox may collect or You may volunteer during the Closed Technical Test.

3. Termination. Gearbox may terminate the Closed Technical Test at any time. When Gearbox terminates the Closed Technical Test, You must delete the pre-release version of the Game and all documents and materials you received from Gearbox in connection with the Closed Technical Test, and you may be asked by Gearbox to remove any elements of the Closed Technical Test from any hard drives on which the pre-release version of the Game has been installed. You agree and acknowledge that Gearbox’s termination of the Closed Technical Test will not be grounds for any refunds of any kind.

4. Remedies. You acknowledge and agree that (i) Gearbox would be irreparably injured in the event of a breach of any of Your duties and obligations hereunder, (ii) monetary damages would not be an adequate remedy for any such breach, and (iii) Gearbox will be entitled to equitable relief (including injunction and specific performance), in addition to any other remedies which it may have, in the event of any such breach. This Agreement (i) may only be modified by a written instrument which is executed by both You and Gearbox, (ii) sets forth the entire agreement with respect to the Closed Technical Test, and (iii) will be governed by the laws of the State of Texas. You irrevocably consent to the exclusive jurisdiction of the federal and state courts located in the County of Collin, Texas, in connection with any action brought hereunder and waive any objection to venue.

5. Acknowledgements. You acknowledge that the Game is a work-in-progress and may contain bugs which may cause loss of data and/or damage to the Your gaming platform. Gearbox is not liable in any way for this kind of loss of data or damage, interruptions of service, software or hardware failures, or loss of data or disruption of service. Gearbox may monitor and record any and all communications, electronic or otherwise, pertaining to the Game including, without limitation, packets, chat, email, message board postings, etc.

6. Disclaimer of Warranties. The Game and any accompanying documentation is provided to you “as is” without warranty of any kind. Gearbox disclaims all warranties whether express or implied including but not limited to any and all implied warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose.

7. Limitation of Liability. Gearbox is not liable to You for any damages of any kind including but not limited to direct, indirect, compensatory, special, incidental or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with this agreement and your participation in the Closed Technical Test.

8. Miscellaneous. If the terms of this Agreement are in conflict with any of the terms found in the Terms of Service, EULA and Privacy Policy found at www.gearboxpublishing.com, the terms of this Agreement will govern and supersede. Gearbox reserves the right to update, modify or change this Agreement at any time, for any reason, without notice to you.

By continuing to use this software you agree to this Closed Technical Participant Agreement, the End User License Agreement located at www.gearboxpublishing.com/eula, and the Privacy Policy located at www.gearboxpublishing.com/privacy.

thx4playing_text.en:: Thank you for playing the Technical Test of Homeworld Mobile! You've just seen a small peak of the new Galaxy, but you can continue to search for more missions in distant star systems. Please let us know about your journey in the feedback survey (can also be accessed in the settings).
