desc_pack_mohaava_pack.en:: Contains a fully built Repair Ship Mohaava and a small fleet of special gas collectors. The Mohaava is equipped with repair turrets making it a very versatile support flagship, especially useful for gas collecting.

desc_pack_carrierBundle_tX.en:: A ready-built carrier flagship with a set of collectors and interceptors. The high amount of squadron slots makes it perfect for mining - or overwhelming your foes with swarms of strike craft.

desc_pack_anniversary_newbie.en:: Contains an amount of Adamant and a number of already built epic ships: An assault Frigate, four Interceptor squadrons and two Resource Collectors. A great fleet to get started.

desc_pack_ship_equipment_t1.en::
Contains a rare operator officer and various modules and ships to bolster your fleet.

Officer perks: Kinetic Burst Skill & Escort Hull Damage per Hit (+12%)

desc_pack_ship_equipment_t2.en::
Contains a rare engineer officer and various modules and ships to bolster your fleet.

Officer perks: Flagship Hull (+6%) & Escort Hull (+6%)

desc_pack_ship_equipment_t3.en::
Contains an epic quartermaster officer and various modules and ships to bolster your fleet.

Officer perks: Fabrication Time (-8%) & Refining Time (-8%)

desc_pack_ship_equipment_t4.en::
Contains an epic gunner officer and various modules and ships to bolster your fleet.

Officer perks: Flagship Mass Driver Damage to Hull (+16%) & Flagship Mass Driver Damage to Armor (+16%)

desc_officer_sister_A.en::
A formidable commander and a significant figure in Kiith politics. Searches Nimbus for her sister, Amaala.
Assign this officer to a frigate or the bridge for a fleet-wide buff.

desc_officer_sister_B.en::
A capable strike officer and leader. Veteran of several conflicts, banished to Nimbus to draw her sister Esentra into exile.
Assign this officer to a strike-craft or the bridge for a fleet-wide buff.

desc_officer_adaHraal.en::
Former lead scientist of the second expedition to Nimbus. Veteran research specialist.
Assign this officer to a laboratory or the bridge for a fleet-wide buff.

desc_officer_brother_A.en::
Brave and headstrong hero of the front lines. Noted contempt for aloof flag officers.
Assign this officer to a refinery or the bridge for a fleet-wide buff.

desc_officer_brother_B.en::
Stately authoritarian commander with little patience for fools. Low opinion of other Kiithid.
Assign this officer to a refinery or the bridge for a fleet-wide buff.

desc_officer_lady.en::
Heiress to a Manaani fortune. A formidable woman with a commanding presence.
Assign this officer to a fabricator or the bridge for a fleet-wide buff.

desc_officer_shade_A.en::
Between the two Shades, she is the more administrative and diplomatic. She finds the targets and is a relentless tracker.
Assign this officer to the bridge for a fleet-wide buff.

desc_officer_shade_B.en::
Between the Shades, Thaed has no sense of mercy. He will allow his target to run his mouth but never changes his judgment- death.
Assign this officer to a strike-craft or the bridge for a fleet-wide buff.

desc_officer_tinker.en::
An expert on captured Vaygr technology. Makhaab's improvisation skills are a thing of legend. His biggest boast is claiming to send interstellar signals with a plasma bomb launcher and a coat rack.
Assign this officer to a strike-craft, an escort or the bridge for a fleet-wide buff.

desc_officer_preacher.en:: Calm and devoted, Aaven is one of the strongest believers in Karan S'jet's ascendancy to Godhood, having seen some of Karan's splendor with his own eyes, as he was an ensign aboard the Mothership responsible for some of the systems maintenance on Karan's chambers.

desc_officer_aristocrat.en:: Jereel eschews many of the parties and celebrations populairized by Manaani Aristocrats. Though Jereel maintains some of the pomp and circumstance, he’s much more trimmed and refined about it. He’s an investor, not a merry-goer, and a lot of his political push-power comes from negotiating deals and being very certain of carrying through with them.

desc_officer_yaotspring_2023.en::
Active Skill: Pulsar Burst

Elise started out as a beam weapon technician in the Hiigaran fleet, but climbed the ranks quickly after implementing Yaot technology into Hiigaran weapons. Today she is known as a friend to the Yaot - and an expert in pulsar weaponry.

desc_officer_amassariSummer_2023.en:: A rising star within the Hiigaran fleet, Hector Soban is leading the cause to require fleet gunners to cross train on exotic and foreign weapons systems.

desc_officer_anniversary_2023.en:: A young and gifted officer in reactor construction and power manipulation. Though his technical aptitude is indisputed, he has a domineering approach to assignments that many find offputting.

desc_pack_blackfriday_officers_A_2023.en:: Recruit the two legendary operators Esentra and Amaala, boosting the damage of your escort ships and strike craft respectively.

desc_pack_blackfriday_officers_B_2023.en:: Recruit the two legendary miners Pagraan and Mehemit. Each increases your mining yield from collectors and controllers respectively, as well as your rare earth production in the refinery.

desc_pack_blackfriday_officers_C_2023.en:: Recruit the two legendary officers Agnes Manaan and Makhaab Somtaaw. Agnes is a logistics officer who will speed up your fabrication processes while reducing their costs. Makhaab is an engineer who increases the hull of your escort ships and strike craft.

desc_intmed_module_large_tx.en:: Large machinery parts primarily used for the construction of modules.

desc_intmed_electronics_small_tx.en:: Circuits and transistors used for advanced engineering.

desc_intmed_electronics_large_tx.en:: Large batteries and accumulators used for advanced engineering.

desc_intmed_ship_small_t2.en:: Lightweight hull parts primarily used for the construction of strike craft chassis.

desc_intmed_ship_large_t2.en:: Heavy hull parts primarily used for the construction of large ships.

desc_intmed_weapon_small_t2.en:: Small barrel parts primarily used for the construction of small weapons.

desc_intmed_weapon_large_t2.en:: Large payload delivery parts primarily used for the construction of large weapons.

desc_intmed_module_small_t2.en:: Small machinery parts primarily used for the construction of modules.

desc_intmed_module_large_t2.en:: Large machinery parts primarily used for the construction of modules.

desc_intmed_ship_small_t3.en:: Lightweight hull parts primarily used for the construction of strike craft chassis.

desc_intmed_ship_large_t3.en:: Heavy hull parts primarily used for the construction of large ships.

desc_intmed_weapon_small_t3.en:: Small barrel parts primarily used for the construction of small weapons.

desc_intmed_weapon_large_t3.en:: Large payload delivery parts primarily used for the construction of large weapons.

desc_intmed_module_small_t3.en:: Small machinery parts primarily used for the construction of modules.

desc_intmed_module_large_t3.en:: Large machinery parts primarily used for the construction of modules.

desc_intmed_electronics_small_t3.en:: Circuits and transistors used for advanced engineering.

desc_intmed_electronics_large_t3.en:: Large batteries and accumulators used for advanced engineering.

desc_insig_r1.en:: Insignias needed to promote inexperienced Officers.

desc_insig_r2.en:: Insignias needed to promote intermediate Officers.

desc_insig_r3.en:: Insignias needed to promote experienced Officers.

desc_insig_r4.en:: Insignias needed to promote veteran Officers.

desc_insig_r5.en:: Insignias needed to promote high ranking Officers.

desc_questItem_relic_01.en:: An ancient Progenitor artifact that is particularly prized by collectors. It can be sold for credits, though it may have some other uses.

desc_questItem_progenitorRelic_tX.en:: An ancient Progenitor artifact that is particularly prized by collectors. It can be sold for credits, though it may have some other uses.

desc_questItem_alienProbe_tX.en:: Strange scanning device of unknown design. Corresponds to no known technological base encountered in Nimbus. These probes are sought after by Hiigaran science teams and prized on the black market.

desc_ticket_kiithChange.en:: A ticket that allows for changing Kiith affiliation. Consumed upon use.

desc_ticket_nameChange.en:: A ticket that allows for changing the captain's name. Consumed upon use.

desc_ticket_moveOrbital.en:: A ticket that allows for moving the starbase to a different location. Consumed upon use.

desc_unlockToken_colonies.en:: Allows clans to expand their territory by acquiring outpost beacons in order to claim systems.

desc_lic_bp_hgn_cf_assa_01_e_tx.en:: Unlocks the blueprint for the Assault Frigate of the same rarity and tier of the license for the clan market.

desc_lic_bp_hgn_sc_assa_01_e_tx.en:: Unlocks the blueprint for the Assault Corvette Squadron of the same rarity and tier of the license for the clan market.

desc_lic_bp_turret_hgn_ion_fs_m_01_u_tx.en:: Unlocks the blueprint for the Crimson-4 Array of the same rarity and tier of the license for the clan market.

desc_lic_bp_hgn_cd_dest_01_e_tx.en:: Unlocks the blueprint for the Destroyer of the same rarity and tier of the license for the clan market.

desc_lic_bp_turret_hgn_kinetic_fs_s_01_r.en:: Unlocks the blueprint for the K-A3 Turret of the same rarity and tier of the license for the clan market.

desc_lic_bp_im_factory_02_r_tx.en:: Unlocks the blueprint for the Parts Assembler of the same rarity and tier of the license for the clan market.

desc_lic_bp_hgn_cf_torp_01_e_tx.en:: Unlocks the blueprint for the Torpedo Frigate of the same rarity and tier of the license for the clan market.

desc_lic_bp_turret_hgn_pulsar_fs_s_01_e_.en:: Unlocks the blueprint for the LT-4 Mag Pointer of the same rarity and tier of the license for the clan market.

desc_lic_bp_hgn_cu_rcon_01_r_tx.en:: Unlocks the blueprint for the Resource Controller of the same rarity and tier of the license for the clan market.

desc_lic_bp_im_factory_02_r_t4.en:: Unlocks the blueprint for the Parts Assembler of the same rarity and tier of the license for the clan market.

desc_lic_bp_im_orb_gasMining_01_r_tx.en:: Unlocks the blueprint for the Gas Harvest Operations of the same rarity and tier of the license for the clan market.

desc_lic_bp_im_orb_moonMining_01_r_tx.en:: Unlocks the blueprint for the Crystal Mining Operations of the same rarity and tier of the license for the clan market.

desc_lic_bp_hgn_su_gcol_01_r_tx.en:: Unlocks the blueprint for the Gas Collector of the same rarity and tier of the license for the clan market.

desc_lic_bp_turret_hgn_flak_fs_s_01_r_tx.en:: Unlocks the blueprint for the X-LC Annihilator Turret of the same rarity and tier of the license for the clan market.

desc_lic_lic_bp_im_frigateFCR_01_u_tx.en:: Unlocks the blueprint for the Frigate Target Range Relay internal module of the same rarity and tier of the license for the clan market.

desc_lic_bp_im_destroyerThreat_01_u_tx.en:: Unlocks the blueprint for the Destroyer Ship Signature Extender internal module of the same rarity and tier of the license for the clan market.

desc_battery_c.en:: Can be used on the scanner to recover its charge or overcharge the scanner. An overcharged scanner can find rarer scannable objects.

desc_tr1_collectable_u_01.en:: These ancient coins are no longer in circulation. Their age is impossible to determine, nor are the identities of those depicted on them.

desc_tr1_collectable_r_01_tx.en:: These polished perfect glass spheroids are found across space, their origin unknown. They sell well as an interstellar curiosity.

desc_tr1_collectable_e_01_tx.en:: This box is said to accurately predict the future, but it does so only under specific circumstances. Nobody knows what those are.

desc_tan_collectable_u_01.en:: A revered and sacred symbol of the Tanoch Religion. This icon is artfully crafted.

desc_tan_collectable_r_01_tx.en:: Commanding banner of the early houses of the Tanoch Empire.

desc_tan_collectable_e_01_tx.en:: An royal icon bearing the sigil of the early conquest years of the Tanoch Empire. This was given to Imperial couriers and officials.

desc_yao_collectable_u_01.en:: Many firstborn sons were given these tokens as sign of their eventual right to rule. Many were lost in ancient wars.

desc_yao_collectable_r_01_tx.en:: These banners were given to unit commanders, some of them passed down for generations.

desc_yao_collectable_e_01_tx.en:: This helmet belonged to one of the Yaot heroes of a previous war, lost in Tanoch Space. They would reward you greatly for its return.

desc_p1_collectable_u_01.en:: A small, sentimental pattern woven into a complex blanket by a means lost to time. Even after being lost in space, it is warm to the touch.

desc_p1_collectable_r_01_tx.en:: This statuette depicts a God whose name is lost to time. The raised hands and angry expression might identify this as a war god.

desc_p1_collectable_e_01_tx.en:: This primitive ledger was made during and accounts for the flight from space now occupied by the Tanoch. It is priceless cultural information describing a lost people.

desc_ama_collectable_u_01.en:: A memento to one’s life accomplishments in the Hagthar Empire. Once prized by the nobility, they are now only curiosities.

desc_ama_collectable_r_01_tx.en:: One of hundreds of ornately decorated helmets from the Hagthar empire. Amassari trace their family lineage through such items.

desc_ama_collectable_e_01_tx.en:: This media projection module preserves a piece of culture from the Hagthar Empire. Very few remain intact into this time.

desc_kiithless_collectable_u_01.en:: This seal was taken from a downed Kiithless Hiigaran unit of unknown designation. The Kiith claim them as trophies.

desc_kiithless_collectable_r_01_tx.en:: This artwork depicts Hiigara, our home, and the Angel Moon which orbits it. These are rare reminders of the world we are trying to return to.

desc_kiithless_collectable_e_01_tx.en:: Our Homeworld depicted in a beautiful glass sphere. Once powered, cloud patterns move realistically across the surface and cities light up in the dark.

desc_kpr_collectable_u_01.en:: This Glass node contains iridescent colors when shifted in the hand. It is known to be a critical part of Progenitor AI constructs, but its exact function is uncertain

desc_kpr_collectable_r_01_tx.en:: Non-functional interface plate to a Progenitor console, with the beautiful pattern of buttons intact. A rare example of piloted Progenitor ergonomics.

desc_kpr_collectable_e_01_tx.en:: This stela is the among the only examples known of Progenitor culture. It is an untranslated poem etched into a metal plate

desc_rw_loot_p1_rcon_tX.en:: Salvaged from destroyed Cangacian mining vessels.

desc_rw_loot_hgd_rcon_tX.en:: Salvaged from destroyed Kiithless mining vessels.

desc_rw_loot_event_headHunt_box_tx.en:: Salvaged from an enemy vessel during a special event.

desc_rw_spaceContainer_tX.en:: An old freight container. It has been floating through space for a long time.

desc_im_refinery_01_tX.en:: A standard refinery module, essential in purifying and processing raw materials, and for finding rare earths.

desc_im_refinery_reeSorting_01_tX.en:: A highly-specialized refinery module, that chemically and mechanically sorts out more valuable rare earths, leaving behind only a fraction of the input as refined materials.

desc_im_factory_01_tX.en:: A standard fabricator module, used for on-ship fabrication for weapons and strike craft.

desc_im_factory_02_r_tX.en:: A non-standard fabricator specialized on assembling parts. Assembles parts faster than a regular fabricator but cannot fabricate any other items.

desc_im_factory_strikecraftFactory_01_tX.en:: This fabricator was converted into a specialized manufacture for producing strikecraft ships only, reducing both the time and cost.

desc_im_research_01_tX.en:: A standard laboratory module equipped with the necessary facilities to perform research and development.

desc_im_global_research_01_tX.en:: Here scientists will use the data gathered in laboratories to research new technologies.

desc_im_bpCrafter_01_t.en:: Used by engineers to create new prototypes and improve on our existing technology.

desc_im_shipyard_01_tX.en:: A stationary shipyard where larger craft can be constructed.

desc_im_researchBoost_RPCap_01_tx.en:: Increases the amount of research points able to be stored in the laboratory before retrieval.

desc_im_researchBoost_RPSpeed_01_tx.en:: Increases the generation speed of research points in the laboratory.

desc_im_storageSpace_01_tx.en:: Increases the amount of storage space.

desc_im_hull_01_tx.en:: A module that stores spare hull parts, able to be quickly replaced during combat, effectively increasing the flagship's hull lifetime.

desc_im_armor_01_tx.en:: A module that stores spare armor parts, able to be quickly replaced during combat, effectively increasing the flagship's armor lifetime.

desc_im_strCraftEvasion_01_tx.en:: Module that coordinates between the flagship's sensors and strike craft's board computers. Warns strike craft of incoming fire, increasing their chance to dodge.

desc_im_strCraftHull_01_tx.en:: An extension of hangar maintenance. Better maintained strike craft are able to withstand more enemy fire before being destroyed.

desc_im_strCraftHullDMG_01_tx.en:: Module storing ammunition specifically designed to improve anti-hull capabilities of fighters and bombers.

desc_im_strCraftArmorDMG_01_tx.en:: Module storing ammunition specifically designed to improve anti-armor capabilities of fighters and bombers.

desc_im_corvettesHullDMG_01_tx.en:: Module storing ammunition specifically designed to improve anti-hull capabilities of corvettes.

desc_im_corvettesArmorDMG_01_tx.en:: Module storing ammunition specifically designed to improve anti-armor capabilities of corvettes.

desc_im_frigateHullDMG_01_tx.en:: Module storing ammunition or capacitors specifically designed to improve anti-hull capabilities of frigates.

desc_im_frigateArmorDMG_01_tx.en:: Module storing ammunition or capacitors specifically designed to improve anti-armor capabilities of frigates.

desc_im_frigateFCR_01_tx.en:: Sensor relay that transmits flagship target data to fleet frigates, increasing their fire control range.

desc_im_destroyerThreat_01_tx.en:: Ship size signature decoy. Alters the size of the Destroyer ship signature making it more likely enemies will attack fleet destroyer.

desc_im_scannerSystemReliability_01_tx.en:: Scrubs solar interference from incoming scanning data, making the results more reliable.

desc_im_scannerSystemStrength_01_tx.en:: Increases the power of the scanner, allowing it to reach farther edges of the system and deeper into gas clouds and nebulas.

desc_im_scannerMaxCharge_01_tx.en:: Increases the capacitor charges to allow longer scanning duty.

desc_im_scannerRechargeSpeed_01_tx.en:: Better power generation on Flagships to recharge the scanner capacitors faster.

desc_im_visionRange_01_tx.en:: Sensor input computer is upgraded, allowing deeper processing of contact signals and increasing tactical sight range.

desc_im_engineSpeed_01_tx.en:: The engine core is enhanced with stabilizer rings forged from composite alloys, allowing for greater engine output and increased speed.

desc_im_massDriver_hullDMG_01_tx.en:: Coats mass driver rounds in special alloy that shatters on impact, dealing more damage to internal structures through shrapnel bursts.

desc_im_massDriver_armorDMG_01_tx.en:: Tips mass driver rounds with special alloy caps that allow rounds to penetrate deeper into armor plating.

desc_im_massDriver_cooldown_01_tx.en:: Absorbs and dissipates heat from flagship's mass drivers, allowing them to fire more rapidly.

desc_im_flak_hullDMG_01_tx.en:: Specialized high-explossive airburst rounds, designed to explode as close as possible to the targets hull plating. Larger explosive and shrapnel package deliver higher overall target damage.

desc_im_missileLauncher_hullDMG_01_tx.en:: Adjusts payload of missiles to contain materials that cause shrapnel explosions on impact, dealing more damage to internal structures.

desc_im_missileLauncher_range_01_tx.en:: Extends the ranged-missile-guiding system's signal, effectively increasing the range before missiles become inoperable.

desc_im_missileLauncher_critChance_01_tx.en:: Analyzes target data to increase the detection of vulnerabilities in enemy ships, increase the chance of critial hits.

desc_im_missileLauncher_cooldown_01_tx.en:: Absorbs and dissipates heat from flagship's missile launchers, allowing them to fire more rapidly.

desc_im_ionCannon_hullDMG_01_tx.en:: A particle capacitor is added to the ion column, increasing the density of ion output and allowing for greater hull penetration.

desc_im_ionCannon_armorDMG_01_tx.en:: The Ion column output is reconfigured to oscillate, increasing the scatter of the beam to easier ablate armor and exterior structures.

desc_im_ionCannon_cooldown_01_tx.en:: Absorbs and dissipates heat from flagship's ion cannons, allowing them to fire more rapidly.

desc_im_pulsar_hullDMG_01_tx.en:: Latter-stage stabilizers are replaced with more robust models, allowing higher precision for greater penetration.

desc_im_pulsar_armorDMG_01_tx.en:: Emitter nozzles replaced with pulsar with dispersion heads, increasing pulse scatter to disrupt armor cohesion.

desc_im_pulsar_cooldown_01_tx.en:: Absorbs and dissipates heat from flagship's pulsars, allowing them to fire more rapidly.

desc_im_torpedoBay_hullDMG_01_tX.en:: Adjusts payload of torpedoes to contain submunitions that cause secondary explosions on impact, dealing more damage to internal structures.

desc_im_torpedoBay_armorDMG_01_tX.en:: Provides torpedoes with a tip made of a hardened alloy that allows the torpedo to penetrate deeper into armor plating before exploding.

desc_im_torpedoBay_cooldown_01_tx.en:: A better revolver-like reload mechanism for torpedo launchers, allowing them to fire more rapidly.

desc_im_native_explorer_01.en:: Special energy distribution module for the Explorer-class flagships, allowing for a more efficient sensor and skill energy use.

desc_im_native_seeker_01.en:: Larger energy capacitor for Seeker-class sensor modules. Increases the efficiency and power of the sensor module.

desc_im_native_serviceship_01.en:: Improved repair systems for the Service Ship-class flagships allow a stronger armor repairing for the fixed repair modules.

desc_im_native_carrier_01.en:: Larger and more organized fleet coordination office for Carrier-class flagships offers better training for fighter and corvette pilots, thus increasing their efficiency in dealing damage to enemy ships.

desc_im_native_prospector_01.en:: More sophisticated mineral washing plants for Prospector-class flagships increase the overally payout of refined minerals and rare earths.

desc_im_native_commandship_01.en:: Improved fleet targeting link computer for Command Ship-class flagships. Sends improved targeting data to the fleet escort ships, increasing their damage.

desc_im_native_battlecruiser_01.en:: Larger ordnance locker for Battlecruiser-class flagships to increase the damage dealt by large turrets.

desc_im_native_juggernaut_01.en:: Electronic counter-measure device to increase the signature of the Juggernaut-class flagship, making it appear larger than a normal flagship on enemy sensors.

desc_im_orb_factory_01_tx.en:: Used to fabricate items. Can only be mounted on a starbase.

desc_im_orb_refinery_01_tx.en:: Refines raw ore into refined materials. Can only be mounted on an starbase.

desc_im_orb_laboratory_01_tx.en:: Produces research points. Can only be mounted on a starbase.

desc_im_orb_storageSpace_01_tx.en:: Increases the starbase's stash. Can only be mounted on an starbase.

desc_im_orb_shipyard_01_tX.en:: Used to construct capital ships like frigates, destroyers and flagships. Can only be mounted on a starbase.

desc_im_orb_oreMining_01_tX.en:: Will send out mining fleets to gather ore from local asteroid belts. The amount of ore gained are dependent on the number of asteroid clusters in the system. More clusters result in higher yields.

desc_im_orb_moonMining_01_tX.en:: Will send out mining fleets to gather crystals from local celestial bodies. The amount of crystals gained are dependent on the number of moons in the system. More moons result in higher yields.

desc_im_orb_gasMining_01_tX.en:: Will send out harvester fleets to gather gas from local celestial bodies. The amount and types of gas gained are dependent on the number of jovians in the system.

desc_im_orb_reeMining_01_tX.en:: Will send out mining fleets to gather rare earths from local celestial bodies. The amount of rare earths gained are dependent on the number of asteroid clusters in the system. More clusters result in higher yields.

desc_im_adMining_01.en::
Can be mounted on both the flagship and the starbase.

Extracts trace amount of adamant from progenitor wrecks and compresses it into shards.

Produces 200 Adamant in 24 hours.

desc_engine_hgn_explorer_01_ion_01_t1.en:: Small engine for an explorer flagship ripping off electrons of xenon gas to create a stream of charged particles.

desc_engine_hgn_explorer_01_ion_02_t1.en:: Engine for an explorer flagship ripping off electrons of xenon gas to create a stream of charged particles.

desc_engine_hgn_explorer_01_ion_03_t1.en:: Enhanced ion engine for an explorer flagship ripping off electrons of xenon gas to create a stream of charged particles.

desc_engine_hgn_explorer_01_ion_04_t1.en:: Advanced ion engine for an explorer flagship ripping off electrons of xenon gas to create a stream of charged particles.
